93a1(mdo 'grel): yang mi shis pa yin no/ /zas btsos snum za tshang 'thung dang/ /skyugs dang khru ba rmi ba dang/ zhes bya ba la/ yang de bzhin du kha zas btsos pa dang/ snum bag za ba dang/ chang mang du 'thungs ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ 'khru ba rmi ba yang mi shes
93a2(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /lcags dang gser dag rnyed pa dang/ /btsongs dang rtsod la phan pa dang/ zhes bya ba la/ rmi lam du lcags dang gser gnyis rnyed pa dang/ btsongs ba dang/ rtsod cing 'thab pa las pham? par 'gyur pa rmis na yang mi dge'o/ /'chil
93a3(mdo 'grel): lham gnyis ni stor ba dang/ rkang bags lhung ba rmi ba dang/ zhes bya ba la/ lham ma ma mchil lham gnyis stor pa rmis pa 'am/ de bzhin du rkang ba gnyis kyi lag pa sa la lhung bar rmi ba yang mi dge ba yin no/ /shin tu dga' dang rab khros
93a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /shi ba'i gnyen gyi spyos pa dang/ zhes bya ba la/ rmi lam du shin tu dga' zhing rangs pa dang/ rab tu khros shing 'khrugs pa'i sngon chad shi ba'i nye du pha ma la sogs pa yis spyos par rmis pa yang mi dge'o/ /mar me gza' dang
93a5(mdo 'grel): skar ma dang/ /so mig lha'i gzugs rnams ni/ /lhung ba 'am 'jig pa rmis pa 'am/ ri bo ral bar gyur pa dang/ zhes bya ba la/ rmi lam gyi nang du mar me la sogs pa lhung zhing 'gyel ba 'am/ 'jig cing brlag bar rmis pa
93a6(mdo 'grel): yang shin tu mi dge ba yin no/ /de bzhin ri be ral zhing 'jig pa rmis pa yang mi shes pa yin no/ /nags tshal 'bar ba'i nang dang ni/ /sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang/ /ro bsregs pa dang mun par zhugs/ /ma yi mngal du zhugs
93a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ zhes bya ba la/ nags tshal me tog dmar ba'i nang du 'jug pa dang/ /de bzhin du rkun po la sogs pa sdig can gyi khyim du 'jug pa dang/ de bzhin du ro bsregs pa'i gnas dang/ mun par zhugs cing chud pa dang/ me'i?
93b1(mdo 'grel): mngal? du slar zhugs shing gnas par rmis pa yang rmi lam mi dge ba yin no/ /brag? dang khang pa sa lhung dang/ /de bzhin nya yis ming pa dang zhes bya ba la/ brag gi rtse dang khang pa rtsegs ma dang/ gzhan yang de lta bu'i gnas mthon po nas lhung ba rmis pa dang/
93b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du nyung? ming cing/ zos pa rmis pa yang shis pa ma yin no/ /chos gos gyon pa'i mi srun dang/ /gcer bu pa dang dbyug thogs dang/ /mig dmar ba kha dog gnag pa dang/ /mthong ba nam yang shis ma yin zhes bya ba la/ gos tshon can gyon
93b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gzugs shin tu mi sdug pa dang/ mi srun par ston pa dang/ gcer bu gos med pa dang/ lag na dbyug pa thogs pa dang/ skyes bu mig dmar zhing kha dog shin tu gnag pa'i gzug rmi lam mthong ba ste/ de dag ni nam yang bkra
93b4(mdo 'grel): shis shing dge bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /bud med sdig can gdong nag dang/ /skra dang sen mo nu ma ring/ /gos dang phreng ba dmar po thogs/ /rmis ba dus mtshan yin par 'dod/ /ces bya ba la/ rmi lam gyi nang du bud med sdig can mi srun pa'i
93b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin ras can snag tsha ltar gnag pa/ /skra dang sen mo dang nu ma ring zhing 'chang ba/ gos la sogs pa dmar po gyon zhing thogs pa rmi lam du rmis pa ni dus mtshan te/ de na gshin rje'i 'khor dus mtshan zhes bya ba yin par slob dpon
93b6(mdo 'grel): dag 'dod do/ /nad ni stobs dang ldan pa yis/ /yid 'jug bu ga bkag pa'i phyir/ /mi bzad rmi lam mthong gyur te/ nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nad med the tshom bcas 'gyur zhing/ 'ga' zhig mthar par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/
93b7(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gyi nad kyi dri ma stobs dang ldan zhing shin tu shas cha bar gyur pas/ yid ces bya ba sems gang du 'jug cing rgyu ba'i bu ga'i rgyun srad nad kyis bkag cing/ gang pa'i phyir mi bzad cing gnod pa skyed la/ bkra mi shis
94a1(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur la/ de lta bu gang zhig mthong ba des nad kyis nyam thag pa'i nad pa ni 'chi bar 'gyur la/ /gang zhig nad med cing tha mal par gnas pas rmi lam de lta bu mthong bar 'gyur na/ dus
94a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan zhig na nad kyis btab nas 'chi ba gtol med pa'i the tshom dang bcas par 'gyur la/ de bas kyang 'ga' zhig ni rmi lam ngan bzhi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu bsten pa'i shugs kyis 'chi las thar par 'gyur zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin no//
94a3(mdo 'grel): mthong dang thos dang nyams myong dang/ /gsol ba btab dang bzlogs? pa dang/ /'byung bar gyur dang nad las byung/ /rmi lam rnam pa bdun du bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ rmi lam gyi dbye ba ni mthong ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas rnam pa bdun
94a4(mdo 'grel): du yod de/ /de la mthong ba'i rmi lam ni gnyid kyis ma log pa'i gnas skabs su mig gis mthong zhing nyams su myong ba de rmi lam gyi gnas skabs su de 'dra ba'i rnam par rmis shing mthong ba'o/ /thos pa ni rna ba'i dbang pos sgra tsam du
94a5(mdo 'grel): thos pa'o/ /nyams su myong ba ni rigs pa'i tshul gyis nyams su myong ba'o/ /gsol ba btab pa ni don du gnyer zhing yid la 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab pa'o/ /brtags pa yid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du/ brtags shing yid la byed
94a6(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba ni phyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad las byung ba ni rlung dang/ khris pa dang bad kan las byung bar gyur pa'o/ /de las dang po lnga po dang/ rang gi rang bzhin nyin mo brjed/ /shin tu ring thung 'bras bu med//
94a7(mdo 'grel): cha 'dres pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba la/ rmi lam de dag gi nad nas/ dang po'i rmi lam lnga po mthong ba la sogs pa lnga ni 'bras bu med cing mi bden pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rang gi rang bzhin gyi nad gzhi las byung ba dang rjes su
94b1(mdo 'grel): mthun ba de yang 'bras bu med pa yin te/ rlung gi rang bzhin can la rlung gi rang bzhin dang mthun pa rmis pa'i rmi lam dang/ mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can la/ rlung gi rang bzhin dang/ mthun pa rmis pa'i rmi lam/ mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can la mkhris
94b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rmi lam nas/ ma 'dras pa'i rang bzhin rmi lam rmis pa yang don med pa yin no/ /de bzhin du nyin mo rmis pa yang rmis nas brjed pa dang/ shin tu yun ring pa dang/ shin tu yun ring thung pa yang 'bras bu med pa yin no//
94b3(mdo 'grel): mtshon stong rmi lam 'bras bu ring/ /mthong ba chung ngu byed pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ mtshan stod phyed pa yan chad rmi lam rmis pa ni/ de'i 'bras bu thag ring ba yin la/ mthong ba de yang shas chung zhing mthong ba zhan pa yin no/ /nang par mthong
94b4(mdo 'grel): dang gnyid ma log /mi mthun gtam gyis bar ma chod/ /de yi nyin par 'bras chen 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ nang par ba lang bzas? la gtong ba'i tshe/ /rmi lam mthong ba de ni/ de'i nyin par nyid 'bras bu chen po mthong ba yin no/ /yang rmi lam
94b5(mdo 'grel): de mthong nas gnyid kyis ma log cing rmi lam gzhan gyis bar ma chod pa dang/ de bzhin du de dang mi mthun pa'i tshig gis chod par ma gyur na/ de de'i nyin par mthong zhing 'bras bu dang yang bcas pa yin no/ /sbyin dang sbyin bsreg la sogs
94b6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /rmi lam 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gal te rmi lam ngan pa zhig rmis na de'i rjes la/ de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin bsrag la sogs pa byas na/ rmi lam ngan pa de 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ro/ /sogs bar smos pas ni
94b7(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs dang gtsang sba? dang sems nang du 'du zhing bsam gtan la mnyam bar 'jog pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ bkra shis kyi cho ga byas pa la sogs pa bsdu'o/ /gang zhig rmi lam ngan? mthong nas/ /slar yang gnas skabs de nyid du//
95a1(mdo 'grel): rmi lam bzang po mthong gyur na/ /'bras bu bzang po nyid thob 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gang zhig gis rmi lam ngan cing mi dge ba mthong zhing rmis nas yang gnas skabs de nyid du rmi lam ngan pa'i rjes la/ rmi lam bzang shing
95a2(mdo 'grel): dge bar gyur pa mthong na/ /skyes bu des 'bras bu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ /rmi lam ngan pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /lha dang bram ze khyu mchog dang/ /ba lang rgyal po mdza' ba shes gson/ /skyes bu dam pa grags ldan dang/ /me 'bar
95a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ dang ba'i mtsho/ /bu mo khye'u ser ba dang/ /gos dkar gyon zhing mdangs ldan dang/ /skyes bu bza' dang lus 'bar dang/ /khrag gis lus kun byugs pa dang/ gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba la/ lha la sogs pa'i rmi lam
95a4(mdo 'grel): bzang po 'di lta bu gang gis mthong ba de tshe ring ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha ni brgya byin dang chu lta la sogs pa'o/ /mdza' ba shes ni mdza' bo ste de yang gson pa'o/ /skyes bu dam pa ni chos dang ldan pa'i dang tshul
95a5(mdo 'grel): can ??/ /grags ldan ni snyan pas kun tu khyab pa'i mi'o/ /me 'bar ba ni shing mang po dang bcas shing 'bar? ba'o/ /dang ba'i mtsho ni rnyog pa med pa'i mtsho'o/ /bu mo dang khye'u ni na tshod dang po la gnas pa ste/ de yang kha dog sar pa dang/ /gos
95a6(mdo 'grel): dkar po gyon? zhing mdangs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang ba'o/ /skyes bu zab? ni mi'i zas za ba'o/ /lus dbang? ba ni lus me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba'o/ /khrag gi lus kun bsgos pa khrag gis bsgos shing byugs pa ste/ /de lta bu'i rnam
95a7(mdo 'grel): pa gang gi rmi lam du mthong ba de ni dge ba yin no/ /gdugs sogs sha rlon me long dug /sna ma dkar po'i gos dang ni/ /mi gtsang gis byugs 'bras bu rnyed/ ces bya ba la/ yang skyes bu gang zhig rmi lam gyi nang du gdugs la sogs
95b1(mdo 'grel): pa rnyed pa rmis pa des kyang/ /tshe ring ba la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dug ni ha la ha la 'am bcan lnga sogs pa'o/ sna ma'i me tog dkar po ni bar bar na kha dog rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /mi gtsang pas byugs pa ni bshad pas lus la byugs
95b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /'bras bu ni a mra'i shing tog dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ sta rka'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'o/ /ri bo khang bzang 'bras bcas shing/ /'dzeg dang seng ge glang chen rmi/ /rta dang ba lang dag la zhon zhes bya ba la/ rmi lam du ri bo 'dzeg pa la sogs pa
95b3(mdo 'grel): rmis pa yang bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /ri bo ni brag ri'o/ /khang bzang ni khyad pa rtseg ma'i steng ngo/ /'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing ni shing tog phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ de dag la 'jog? pa dang/ chu bo la sogs mtsho phran rgya mtsho brgal zhes bya ba
95b4(mdo 'grel): la/ yang mi gang zhig rmi lam du chu bo la sogs pa la brgal zhing thar par rmis pa de yang bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /shar dang byang du 'gro ba dang/ bgrod min bgrod dang shing ba dang/ zhes bya ba la yang mi gang shar ram byang gi lam du rmi lam du 'gro
95b5(mdo 'grel): ba rmi? ba dang/ bgrod min 'grong ba ste/ rang dang ris mi mthun pa 'am/ gdol ba la sogs pa la spyod pa rmis pa dang/ bdag nyid shi bar rmi ba de yang tshe ring ba la sogs thong bar 'gyur ro/ /nyam pa las thar lha rnams dang/ pha mas? mngon par bstod
95b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /du dang lhung las ldang pa dang/ /dgra bo pham par byas pa dag/ gang rmis tshe ring nad med dang/ nor mad po ni rnyed par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ yang gang zhig nyam nga zhing dogs pa'i gnas las thar zhing byung ba dang/ de bzhin du lha dang pha ma la sogs
95b7(mdo 'grel): bas rmi lam gyi nang du bstod pa dang/ /bkur ba rmi ba dang/ yang gang zhig du zhing mchi ma 'byin pa dang/ de bzhin du sa la ltung zhing 'gyel ba las ldang ba dang/ de bzhin du ldang bar sems pa'i dgra bo pham par byas pa'i rmi lam skyes bu dang zhig
96a1(mdo 'grel): rmis par byas pa de tshe ste srog gnas pa dang/ nad med pa ste bde bar gnas pa dang/ nor dang 'byor pa mang po rnyed cing thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog 'khor ni/ bkra shis cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /dad ldan rjes su mthun pa
96a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /nor mang bsdus par 'gyur pa dang/ /snying stobs mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing/ sman pa bram ze sogs la gus/ /gso dbyad rnams la skyo ba med/ /de ni nad med mtshan nyid do/ /zhes bya ba la/ yang de bzhin du nyid du dang/ chung ma dang bran la sogs pa'i
96a3(mdo 'grel): g.yog 'khor yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ bkra shis shing dam pa'i spyod pa'i cho ga'i rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ nad pa dang ldan zhing sman dpyad byas pas/ de'i nad legs par sos so zhes yid ches pa
96a4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa dang/ de bzhin sman pa'i man ngag dang rjes su mthun par byed cing gus pa dang/ de bzhin du nor mang du bsdus shing yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ snying stobs kyi mtshan nyid gtsang sgra? dang/ yod par lta ba la sogs pa dang
96a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa dang/ de bzhin du sman pa dang/ bram ze la sogs pa la 'ang gus shing 'dud pa dang/ de bzhin du gso dpyad kyi sbyor ba sman btung ba la sogs pa la skyo zhing spyid lug pa mad? pa ste/ 'khor dang rang gi yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin
96a6(mdo 'grel): pa de ni nad med cing bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang rtags yin no/ /rtag tu shis pa sdud pa dang/ bkra mi shes pa rnam par slong/ /'di dag de nyid mthong ba yis/ /drang srong rnams kyis shis par bshad/ ces bya ba la yang
96a7(mdo 'grel): dus rtag tu bkra shis par 'gyur ba'i dngos po sdud cing nye bar bsags pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spong zhing 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ sdud pa dang spong ba 'di dag ni de kho na nyid mthong zhing
96b1(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bkra shis shing dge bar 'gyur bar bshad pa des kyang nad med pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad do/ /de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'chi/ /mtshan nyid gang phyir bshad pas na/ de phyir lus kyi gnas yin pas/ /'di ni?
96b2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi gnas su bshad/ ces bya ba la/ de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rdzogs pa ste/ lus kyi gnas 'dir lus de'i skye dang 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa gang gi phyir bshad cing bstan pas na/ rgyu de'i phyir lus kyi gnas kyi skye ba dang 'chi ba
96b3(mdo 'grel): yin pas/ gnas 'di ni lus kyi gnas yin no zhes bshad cing bstan pa yin no/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba la/ lus kyi
96b4(mdo 'grel): gnas kyi le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa ste// //lus kyi gnas te gnyis pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //de nas thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'di brtsams pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin te
96b5(mdo 'grel): gong du ni lus thams cad bshad pa yin la/ de la ni rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur pas/ de rnams par 'jig pa'i nad gzhi'i gnas bshad pa yin no/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to/ /nad kyang yin la
96b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyang yin pas na nad thams cad do/ /rgyu gang gis nges par 'byin cing skyed la/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni nad gzhi ste/ de lta rna nad thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de bshad par bya'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas rgyun
96b7(mdo 'grel): shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra yang/ nad dang si? ga pa rim gnod byed/ /'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma zhu'i skyon/ /zas byed 'tsho dka' 'khun gnod skyed/ /ming gi
97a1(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs sgras bshad do/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad la sogs pa'i sgra ni gcig gcig bshad pa'i rnam grangs tshig don gcig ston par byed pa yin te/ ci'i phyir nad ces bya zhe na/ sdig pa la sogs pa'i ming gi rnam pas sdug bsngal
97a2(mdo 'grel): ba la sogs pa'i don gyis na nad ces bya'o/ /nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni/ /de bzhin tshul phyed gom byed dang/ /dkyil 'gyur shes par byed ba ste/ /nad ni rnam pa sngar shes bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad rnams kyi tshul ni/ nad gzhi las dkyil du gyur
97a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i bar du rnam ba lngar? shes shing rtogs par bya'o/ /de dag gi tshul yang ji lta bu zhe na/ gzhi dang rgyu dang skye mched dang/ /rkyen dang slong bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhir bshad/ ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs kyi sgra 'di dag gi
97a4(mdo 'grel): dang po nad gzhi ni mtshan nyid drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no/ /gang gis sngar byung tshul bshad pa/ /nad ni 'byung bar 'dod 'gyur la/ /bye brag phyed bar ma gyur ba/ /nad kyi tshul ni ci bzhin par/ /chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal
97a5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ sngar byung ba'i tshul lam rtags gang gis nad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul shes shing rtogs par 'gyur pa'i ni nad 'byung zhing phyis mi ldang par ni 'dod par 'gyur la/ nad rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi bye brag phyed cing gsal bar ma gyur
97a6(mdo 'grel): la/ rims la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshul phyis ji lta bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/ /de'i rtags dang mtshan nyid mi gsal zhing mngon du mi snang ba de ni star byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur ba/ /tshul phyed ba zhes bya bar
97a7(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ sngar byung ba'i tshul de nyid gsal zhing bye brag byed par gyur pa la ni/ nad kyi tshul phyed bar zhes bya bar bshad do/ /dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtogs dang ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams yin no/ zhes bya ba la/ nad kyi
97b1(mdo 'grel): tshul phyed ba de'i ming ni rnam grangs sgra'i tshul gzhan gyis bstan pa ni/ /dbyibs dang gsal ba la sogs pa'o/ /rgyu dang na dang mi mthun zhing/ /mi mthun pa'i don byed pa'i/ /sman dang zas dang spyod lam rnams/ /nye bar bsgyur pas bder?  'gyur? ??
97b2(mdo 'grel): rtas byed par shas bya ste/ de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad ces bya ba la/ goms shing rten bar byed pa na goms pa ste/ nye bar bsgyur ba'i gang gis lus bde bar 'gyur ba de la/ drang srong rnams kyis goms pa zhes bya bar bshad do/ /gang gi nye bar sbyar
97b3(mdo 'grel): pa goms pa zhes sman la sogs pa ste sman ni a ru ra dang/ sle tres la sogs pa'o/ /zas ni sA lu rtsa snar la sogs pa'o/ /spyod lam ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par te rtsol ba dang/ gnyid ma log pa dang/ glu dang
97b4(mdo 'grel): kha ton 'don pa dang bsam gtan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de dag kyang rang kyi rgyu dang nad dang? mi mthun pa'i don byed cing/ nad gzhir 'gyur ba'i tshul las go bzlog pa dang/ de bzhin du nad kyi rgyu de dang mi mthun pa'i don byed pa'o/ /nad kyi
97b5(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang mi mthun par bsten pa la/ rgyu dang mi mthun pa ni dper na/ rtas par byed pa las byung ba'i nad la nyam dmad pa dang/ nyam dmad? pa las byung ba la rtas par byed pa dang/ rtsub pa las byung ba snum pa dang/ snum pa las byung brtsub
97b6(mdo 'grel): par bya ba dang/ spyod lam mi mthun pa'i ni/ /gnyid log pa las byung ba la gnying ma log par bya ba dang/ gnyid ma log pa las byung ba la/ gnyid log par bya ba dang/ 'dug pa las byung brtsol bar bya ba dang/ rtsol ba las byung ba la/ 'dug par
97b7(mdo 'grel): bya ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rgyu dang mi mthun pa'o/ /nad dang mi mthun pa ni dper na/ rims nad la gla sgang dang/ ba rba ta la sogs ba sbyin pa dang/ gcin nad la skyed pa dang nas thug la sogs pa sbyin pa lta bu dang/ spyod lam ni snum
98a1(mdo 'grel): gyi cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra bar thams cad go bzlog pa'o/ mi mthun pa'i byed pa ni dper na chang las gyur ba'i nad la chang nyid byin na/ chang las byung ba'i nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ sman du 'gyur ba dang
98a2(mdo 'grel): zas ni dper na nad pas 'khru ba'i nad la/ nas dang mA Sha dang rgya ne'u la sogs pa phyin pas zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ spyod lam ni dper na mes tshig pa la mel ba sro? ba nyid phan pa lta bu dang/ gzhan yang dper na skyugs pa'i nad la skyugs sman
98a3(mdo 'grel): btang ba dang/ /bzas kyang de 'byin par byed pas sA lu la sogs pa byin pa dang/ spyod lam ni sod mo dang/ utpa la'i chu la sogs pas glon du gzhug pa lta bu de la ni nye bar bsgyur bas bde bar 'gyur ba'i goms pa zhes bya ste/ gang
98a4(mdo 'grel): gi phyir de nyid goms pa ni nad zhi bar byed pas na goms pa zhes bya'o/ /de la bzlog pa'i ma goms nad/ mi 'phrod nad ces bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ gong ma de las bzlog pa ma gtog ba ste/ goms pa'i mtshan nyid ji skad du
98a5(mdo 'grel): brtan ba nyid bar bsgyur ba de dang mi mthun pa dang/ sman la sogs pa bsten pas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing bzhi? ba las nyams par byed pa de la ni mi 'phrod pa zhes bya ste/ de nyid ni ma goms pa'i nad ces bya'o/ /gang gi gnad
98a6(mdo 'grel): ni dkyel? gyur bas/ ji bzhin rjes su 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur pa/ skyes shing 'ongs par dkyel 'gyur yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rnam pa gang gis rlung la sogs pa'i nad dkyel du gyur cing gsogs pa dang
98a7(mdo 'grel): ji ltar gzhan du rjes su 'phel zhing shas cher skyes par gyur pas nad kyi tshul lam dbyibs kyi khyad par so sor skyes shing nad rnams rdzogs par gyur nas/ mngon du gyur ba de la ni dkyil skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /yang de nyid ni skyes shing
98b1(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya ste/ de nyid mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni grangs brtag gtso bo dang/ /stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin zhes bya ba la/ dkyel skyes pa ni grangs la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lngar gyur yin no/ /grangs ni ji ltar 'di nyid las/ /rims?
98b2(mdo 'grel): ni brgyad du bshad ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ dbye ba de yang ji ltar na nad gzhi bstan pa 'di nyid las rim pa rnam pa brgyad yod par bshad pa lta bu'i ra zhig grangs kyi rnam pa bshad pa yin te/ de yang de bzhin du khrag dang mkhrig pa ni rnam pa gsum?
98b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ lud ba ni rnam pa lnga'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grangs yin par shes par bya'o/ /nad rnams spyir ni bsdus pa las/ /cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad tha mi dad pa spyir gcig tu bsdus pa las
98b4(mdo 'grel): cha shas su dbyi zhing cha re re bsgos pa ni brtag pa zhes bya'o/ /rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni/ /nad rnams gtso bor bshad pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rang dang gzhan gyi dbang du zhes bya ba rjes su 'brel pa yod pa dang/ rjes su 'brel ba med
98b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul rnam pa gnyis las nas rnams la gtso bor gyur pa zhes bshad pa yin no/ /rgyu sogs ma lus phyogs gcig las/ /stobs ni che chung shes par bya zhes bya ba la/ nad kyi rgyu ni nad gzhi sngar byung ba'i tshul dang tshul phyed pa dang/ goms
98b6(mdo 'grel): ba rnams ma lus ba 'am/ phyogs cig las stobs che chung gi bye? brag tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ nad gzhi la sogs pa bzhi po de dag las ma nus pa'i khyad par tha dad par 'gyur ro/ /nad re re zhing bstan bcos rtsom par byed pas nad
98b7(mdo 'grel): kyi rgyur bshad pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad nad thams cad du ma lus par nad bskyed par byed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin nam 'on te phyogs gcig gis kyang nad skyed par 'gyur/ de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa thams
99a1(mdo 'grel): cad rdzogs pa yin nam/ /ma rdzogs pa yod ces rtogs na/ de'i phyir smras pa ni/ nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos chas/ /nyes ba ji bzhin nad kyi dus/ zhes bya pa la/ nyin mo mtshan mo dang dus dang zas zos bral/ /nyin
99a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan dus dang zas zos pa zhes bya ste/ de rnams kyi cha ni cha shas te/ de ba nyes pa ji ltar 'byung ba ni nad kyi dus yin par shes par bya ste/ de ltar na dus kyi khyad par gyis phye ba yin no/ /de ltar nad gzhi'i don bshad nas/ zhes bya ba la/
99a3(mdo 'grel): de ltar mdor bsdus pa'i rnam pa 'dis nas gzhi zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don bshad cing bstan pa yin no/ /de ni rgyas bar bshad par bya zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi'i don de 'og nas gzhung rtsom bar byed pas rgya cher ston cing 'chad ba yin no/  
99a4(mdo 'grel): nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi ni/ /nad ni 'khrugs par gyur ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gnod par gyur ba'i nad ma lus pa kun gyi rgyu 'am gzhi ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan te nad kyi skyon gsum po 'khrugs shing g.yos par gyur pa
99a5(mdo 'grel): las ldang zhing 'byung ba 'gyur ba yin no/ /de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs ba/ /bsten bas ldang bar 'gyur ba bshad ces bya ba la/ de rnams ldang ba'i rgyu ni zas dang spyod lam la sogs gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsten pas rlung
99a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i nad ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsum pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum/ /gnod 'gyur sder ni bshad pa yin zhes bya ba la/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum bo'i sbyor ni rnam pa gsum po chung ba dang log pa dang/ grags
99a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i mtshan nyid gnod par 'gyur ba sdang mdo'i gnas kyi skabs su bshad pa yin/ /kha dang cha dang bska cung zad/ /rtsub dang bcud med bra? pa dang/ /bkag dang nad kyis bcir ba dang/ /mtshan mo mi nyal skad cher smra/ /spyad pa'i sbyor drags mya ngan
99b1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs/ /sems las drags/ /so ga nyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes?/ /rlung gi nad ni ldang bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ de la rlung gi nad ni kha ba dang tsha ba la sogs pas ldang zhing 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /chung ngu za ba ni cung zad za'o/ /bcud?
99b2(mdo 'grel): med par zwa ni brda? zhing ba bu? ba'i dus las yol ba'i 'bru gang yin pa de ni bcud med ba zhes bya ste/ de yang lud las/ 'bru ni ma smin thal ches ba/ /bcud med zas ni yin zhes bshad pa yin no/ /brkag pa ni bshang gci la sogs pa'i 'byung ba'i thugs?
99b3(mdo 'grel): bkag pa'o/ /nan gyis bcir ba ni de rnams nyid mi 'byung bzhin du gcir ba'o/ /mtshan mo mi nyal ba ni/ mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa'o/ /skad cher smra ba ni gsang che zhing ngo chen po dang smra ba'o/ /spyad pa'i sbyor ba drags ba ni slon snan? la sogs pa'i sbyar ro bdrags?
99b4(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /mya ngan ni yid gdung? ba ste/ de dag la sogs pas rlung nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang dus ni so ga'i rjes te/ dbyar gyi dus dang/ de bzhin du'i na mo'i rjes te dgongs ga dang/ mtshan mo'i rjes te tho rang dang/ zas zhu ba'i rjes te kha zas zhu zin
99b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rdzes la rlung gi nad ldang zhing 'khrug par byed do/ /mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang rno/ /lan tshwa bro dang lud tsha dang/ /ston gnyin mtshan phyed dang/ /tsha ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa'i nad ni sman tsha dang sgyur ba la sogs pas ldang zhing
99b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba'i dus su ni kha zas tsha zhing smin te sngar? por gyur pa'i skabs la bya'o/ /mdang? skyab?  lan tsha snum pa dang/ /lci dang bad kan skyed bsil dang/ /'dug dang bde dang gnyid ma zhu/ /nyin par gnyid log brtas drags dang/ /slon sogs sbyor?
99b7(mdo 'grel): ba nyes pa dang/ /thos? ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus/ /snga dro mtshan srong bad kan ldang/ zhes bya ba la bad kan gyi de dang dpal sor ba'i? ldang zhing 'khrug par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dug bzhin pa ni las kyi bya ba spangs te gnas pa'o/ /slon pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nyes pa ni log par
100a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /zos ma thag bra? ni zas zos nas mngar bor gyur ba'i skabs dang/ dbyid la sogs pa'i dus su lang bad kan ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dres pa las ni ldan pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ sngar bshad pa'i rgyu de
100a2(mdo 'grel): dag cha 'dres par gyur pa las ldang ba ste/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan la sogs pa 'dren ma ldang ba yin no/ /thams cad bsten las 'dus par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ sngar bshad pa'i rgya khab? dang tsha ba dang mdar ba la sogs pa thams cad ma lus
100a3(mdo 'grel): bar bsten pa las rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gzhan yang 'dres mar zos/ /ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang/ /lhag par zos pa la sogs dang/ /chang dang btung ba nyes pa dang/ tshod ma skam dang
100a4(mdo 'grel): la phug rjen/ /til tshigs sa zhag so ba'i chan/ /sha rus she skam sha ring rnams de dag de yis nyes gsum skyed/ /de bzhin kha zas spos pa dang/ /dus tshigs log pa bdun gyi rlung/ /gdon zhugs dug dang dbyig dug zos/ /be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri
100a5(mdo 'grel): rtsar gnas/ /bcas? skad la ni gza' zhugs dang/ /lag par sbyor ba thams cad dang/ /sdig pa'i las la brten pa dang/ /bud med bu btsas log par byung/ /gsol ba log par byas las ldang zhe bya ba la/ yang de bzhin du sngar bshad pa'i de
100a6(mdo 'grel): dag bsten cing spyad? ba las 'dus ba'i nad ldang bar 'gyur bar ma zad kyi?? 'dren mar zos pa la sogs pa 'di dag gis kyang 'dus pa'i nad la dang bar 'gyur ro/ /zos ni tshig kun dang?  sbyar te 'dren mar za ba ni 'phrod pa dang mi 'phrod pa dang
100a7(mdo 'grel): gnod pa dang dri ma can zos pa'o/ /ma zhu ba ni kha zas snga ma ma zhu bar zos pa'o/ /mi snyoms par zag ni zas kyi dus la bab pa 'am/ dus las yol? pa 'am/ tshad? las lhag pa 'am/ chang las chung? du zos ba'o/ /mi 'phrod pa ni ri bong gi
100b1(mdo 'grel): sha dang la phug rlon? ba dus cig zos ba'am/ nya dang 'o ma lhan cig zos pa la sogs pa'o/ /zas lhag par za ba ni 'drangs shing zos pa'i rjes la zos pa'o/ /nyes pa'i chang ni kha dog dang dri dang ro la sogs pa'i nyes pa ste/ phal cher dul cing dri mi zhim
100b2(mdo 'grel): pa la so g.ya pa'o/ /de bzhin du btung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang rul cing kha dog la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang ldan pa'o/ /tshod ma skam po ni rgya sne'u la sogs pa'i tshod ma skam po'o/ /til tshigs ni til gyi 'ba' cha'o/ /sa zhag dang so ba'i chang ni sa
100b3(mdo 'grel): dang so ba 'dres pa las chad du byas pa'o/ /yang sha'i rnam ba rul cing zhig pa dang/ skam zhing khu bcud med ba dang/ ring pa ste ras pa dang rtsa rgyu btsam? lus pa zos pa dang/ gzhan yang 'dir ma smos su zin kyang de lta zu'i nad skyed par byed pa'i rnam pa 'di
100b4(mdo 'grel): dag dang/ cha 'dra ba dag gis kyang des pa gsum 'dus pa ces bya ba'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du kha zas spos pa ste sngar gang la goms pa'i kha zas spos pa ste sngar gang la goms pa'i kha zas spangs nas gzhan zos ba'o/ /de bzhin dus tshigs? log ba ni ngad man pa dang log pa'i sbyor
100b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang ldan pa'o/ /mdun gyi rlung ni mdun phyogs nas ldang ba'i rlung ngam shing? nas ldang ba'i rlung ngo/ /de bzhin du gdon zhugs pa ni lha dang lha ma yin dang bri za la sogs pa'i gdon lus la zhugs shing kun tu 'dzin pa'o/ /yang de bzhin du dug
100b6(mdo 'grel): dang dbyig dug ste/ ma? sbyar ba dang sbyar ba'i dug zos pa'o/ /de bzhin du ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs kyi nad 'khrugs shing ldang ba dag ri'i rtsar gnas shing 'dug pa dang/ btsas ba'i tshe skar ma ga la bab pa la/ nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' zhugs shing?
100b7(mdo 'grel): gnod par byas pa dang/ de bzhin du kha zas log bad zos pa la sogs pa log pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs bsten pa dang sdig pa'i las srog gcod pa dang/ rku ba la sogs pa bsten cing spyod ba dang/ bud med bu btsas pa'i dus su log par byung ba la sogs
101a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang/ de bzhin du gso ba log par byas shing legs par ma bcos pa dag las kyang nang du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar so so'i nang ldang ba/ nad kyi gnas su 'gro byed pa/ /rtsa spubs rnams su byin pa dang/ /nad rnams lus
101a2(mdo 'grel): la myur du bskyed/ /ces bya ba la/ de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rnams pas nad so so tha dad par ldang zhing 'khrugs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams lus la myur du bskyed cing byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci zhig byas pas nad skyed ce na/ nad kyi gnas gang yang rung bar
101a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar byed pa'i nad nges rtsi'i spubs bcud rgyu ba'i sar song zhing phyin nas/ gnod pa bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ dngos su nad kyi gnas bcud rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsar gnod pa de dag zhugs pas nad ldang bar byed pa yin no/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
101a4(mdo 'grel): po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'i rnam par 'grel ba'o// //de nas rims nad kyi nad bzhi bshad par bya'o//
101a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i 'og tu rims kyis nad gzhi bshad pa'i dgos pa ni/ rims de nas kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/ nad rnams kyi gtso bo ni rims yin no zhes bshad pas so/ /rims ni nad bdag sdig can dang/ /
101a6(mdo 'grel): 'chi bdag mdangs za 'chi byed yin/ /khros pas myur ba'i mchod sprin klag /drag po dbral ba'i mig las byung/ /skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed dang/ /mi 'phrod sna tshogs bsten las byung/ /mi bzad ming ni sna tshogs pas/ /skye gnas du ma rnams la
101a7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ zhes bya ba la/ rim de ni nad kyi bdag po ste/ /nad thams cad kyi rgyal po'am gtso bo yin no/ /sdig can sdig pa'i rang bzhin can no/ /'chi bdag ni srog chags thams cad 'chi ba la sbyor ba'o/ /mdangs za ba ni lus la yod pa'i
101b1(mdo 'grel): mdangs za zhing spyod pa'o/ /'chi bar byed pa ni srog chags rnams zang rtsing mthar phyin par byed pa'o/ /khros pa ni lha chen po khros pa'i dpral ba las byung ba'o/ /myur ba'i mchod sbyin klog pa ni skye dgu'i bdag po myur ba zhes bya ba'i mchod sbyin klag cing
101b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzag par byed pa'o/ /de yang lha chen po drag po'i mig gsum pa las byung bas/ khros pa'i dpral ba'i mig las byung zhes bya'o/ /skye dang 'chi zhes bya ba ni bcas pa na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe ste/ /de dag gi skabs su rmongs par byed cing/ dang po skyes pa
101b3(mdo 'grel): rjod par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa mi 'phrod pa sna tshogs shin tu mang po bsten pa las byung ba yin la/ yang de ni mi bzad cing mnags par dka' ba yin zhing nad kyi ming sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis
101b4(mdo 'grel): rta dang glang po la sogs pa skye gnas du ma tha dad pa rnams kyi lus la gnas te/ glang po che'i lus la ni smin ma 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la/ rta'i lus la ni si si zhes bya ba dang/ lug gi lus la ni rdal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gi gnas
101b5(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /de ni nad rnams so so 'dres/ /'dus dang blo bur las brgyad 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rim de ni rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/ de yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so dang/ de bzhin du 'dres pa ste/ gnyis gnyis 'dres pa'i
101b6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa dang/ nad gzhi gsum char 'dus shing tshogs pa dang/ de bzhin du glo bur gyi rims ni brgyad pa yin no/ /de ltar na nad gzhi so so'i gsum dang/ 'dres pa'i gsum dang/ 'dus pa'i gcig dang/ glo bur ba'i gcig ste brgyad du 'gyur ro/ /
101b7(mdo 'grel): de la nad rnams dang rang ni/ /rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang ba yin/ /ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs gyur pa/ /lhan cig gnas nas rtsa sgo bkag /zhu ba'i gnas nas me drod ni/ /phyi rol tu ni 'byin par byed/ /de dang lhan cig mngon khyab na/ /lus kun tsha bar
102a1(mdo 'grel): byed pa yin/ /yan lag shin tu tsha byed par/ /rims ni de yis skyed par byed/ ces bya ba la/ de la nad gzhi rnams ni nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byed cing/ rims bskyed cing 'byung bar byed do/ /de yang rang rang gi rgyu ji skad bshad pa las snang?
102a2(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs shing g.yos par gyur pa las ldang zhing nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba na/ rgyu des ma zhu ba'i gnas su song nas/ ma zhu ba lus rdungs kyi dang po dangs ma zhes bya ba/ ma smin pa'i nang du zhugs nas de dang lhan cig gnas te/ /dangs ma dad du la rgyu bar
102a3(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i rtsa sgo rnams kyi kha bkag cing/ bcang nas zhu ba'i gnas lte ba'i phyogs nas khong pa'i me drod gang dag yod pa de phyi rol tu 'byin par byed cing phyung nas me'i drod de dang lhan cig tu mngon par rgyu zhing khyab par byas nas/ lus ma lus
102a4(mdo 'grel): pa kun tshabs khyab par byed cing/ kun tu gdung la lus shin tu dro zhing tsha ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro/ /des na yan lag rnams kyang shin tu tsha bar byed cing lus dang yan lag thams cad shas cher tsha ba bskyed pa'i rims su nad kyi dri ma des skyed
102a5(mdo 'grel): bar byed cing/ dkyel rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu/ /rdul ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad de rtsa'i sgo bkag cing gags byas pa'i phyir/ de'i 'og gam rjes la/ lus tsha yang rdul phyi rol tu mang du mi 'byung ngo//
102a6(mdo 'grel): de yi sngon tshul sgyid zhan dang/ /nyams mi dga' zhing lus lci la/ ro mi tshong zhing yi ga 'chus/ /glal 'byung mig 'khrul mchi mar bcas/ /yan lag na zhing 'ju stobs chung/ /nyam chung gnyid ni che ba dang/ /spu ldang bya rmyang byed 'dod dang//
102a7(mdo 'grel): byin pa'i nywan lus snyom dang/ phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro/ /skyur dang dro dang tshal srid/ /kha zas ma dang po la mi dga' / /byis pa la sdang skom dang che/ /sgra med grang lhags rlung dang chu/ /grib mnyi tshan rgyu med par/ /dga' dang mi dga' 
102b1(mdo 'grel): dag tu byed/ /de rjes rims ni gsal bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rims de'i sngon du 'byung ba'i tshul ni mi gsal ba'i rtags te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ ngal zhing sgyid ngan par 'gyur ba dang/ nyams mi dga' ba ste/ stan dang gnas la sogs pa la
102b2(mdo 'grel): gcig tu sems mngon par dga' ba med cing sems so na mi gnas pa dang/ lus khong lci zhing 'deg par dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang/ khas ro mi tshor zhing ben por gyur pa dang/ kha zas yi gar mi 'ong zhing sred ba med pa dang/ glal zhing la
102b3(mdo 'grel): gdangs pa dang/ mig /'khrugs shing mi sdug la mchi ma 'byung ba dang bcas pa dang/ yan lag na ba ste yan lag rnams gcus pa snyam du sems pa 'am/ brdungs pa 'am bsdams pa snyam du sems pa dang/ kha zas 'ju ba'i stobs chung zhing 'ju
102b4(mdo 'grel): mi nus pa dang/ nyams stobs chung zhing nus pa zhan pa dang/ gnyid che zhing bying ba dang/ ba spu rnams ldang zhing gshong ba dang/ de bzhin du yan lag rnams skyong ba la sogs pa'i bya rmyangs byed 'dod pa dang/ byin pa gnyis kyi btsir ba ltar na ba dang
102b5(mdo 'grel): lus snyom zhing lci ba dang/ zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa phan par bsten pa'i gdams pa mi bzod cing khra ba dang/ ro skyur ba dang/ tsha ba la sogs pa'i bye brag la dga' ba dang/ kha zas mngar po la sogs pa rnams la mi dga' zhing
102b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa med pa dang/ de bzhin du byis? bcu zho 'thung ba skye bo ma lus pa'i yid dge bar byed pa dag la yang khro zhing 'khrug pa dang/ de gshan du skom dang che zhing skom dad kyis shin tu gdung ba dang/ de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa'i yul rnams la rgyu
102b7(mdo 'grel): med cing dgos pa med par tshad 'ga' ni 'ga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ tshad 'ga' ni mi dga' bar byed de lan 'ga' nyan pa 'dod na yang zhe sdang bar byed la/ lan 'ga' ni 'dod pa skyed par byed pa dang/ me la sogs pa la yang rgyu med par ched 'ga' brten par
103a1(mdo 'grel): dga' la/ ched 'ga' ni brten par mi dga' sde/ de lta bu'i mtshan nyid byung nas de'i rjes la rims kyi mtshan nyid gsal zhing dkyel skyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rims thebs 'byang nye'i tshe nad tshabs/ /chung zhing tsha ba mi snyoms la/
103a2(mdo 'grel): yan lag de dang der 'pho zhing/ /na ba de dang der g.yo 'gyur/ /rkang pa bem po rengs pa dang/ byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang/ /tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems/ /brla dang rked pa na ba dang/ /rgyab ni brdungs pa ltar sems dang/ /lte ba btsir ba snyam sems
103a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rus pa bcad pa snyam pa dang/ /rtsib ma lhag par na ba dang/ /snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug /brad du btsugs pa lta bur gzer/ /phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung ba ni/ /bcom snyam sems shing sgrog rus na/ /'gram pa kha zas ldang mi nus//
103a4(mdo 'grel): skad 'gyur rna bsgra dang bcas/ /mur 'grams zug cing mgo bo na/ /lce'i ro ni mi tshor dang/ /yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur/ /dri ma rnams ni sri ba dang/ /pags mig kha dang sen mo dang/ /bshad sogs rtsub cing dmar ba dang/ /mchil mang yi ge 'chus
103a5(mdo 'grel): srad chung/ /zas mi 'ju zhing rdul mi 'byung/ /gnyid yar mchu dang gre bskams/ /skom dad che zhing lud pa skams/ /lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa snyams/ /sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ldang/ /pags pas dag brtsi ba dang/ /rkang lag 'dar zhing sprid pa
103a6(mdo 'grel): thogs/ mgo 'khod tshigs ni sla ba dang/ /dro bag la dga' bya rmyang byed/ /rlung gi rims su shes par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung gi rigs kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma 'am rtags ni 'di dag yin te/ /rims kyis thebs pa ni dang po mgo zug pa ste/
103a7(mdo 'grel): tsha ba la sogs pa 'byung bar mgo rtsom pa'o/ /'byang du nye ba ni 'bral zhing 'byang bar bskyod pa'o/ /nad tshabs ni nad kyi tshul sna tshogs pa'o/ /chung ba ni shugs dal ba'o/ /mi snyoms pa ni rims kyis thebs pa la sogs pa/ /de dag gi tshul mi
103b1(mdo 'grel): snyoms cing rnam pa tha dad par gnas pa'o/ /yang na de dag mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der rnam par 'tshor bar 'gyur zhing/ 'og nas bshad pa'i nad kyis tshor ba de dang de dag rnam par g.yo zhing mal gcig na mi gnas par
103b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa bems po ni tshor ba med cing sems dang bral ba ltar gnas pa'o/ /rengs pa ni lus shing ltad dengs shing gyod ba'o/ /byin snying na ba ni btsir bsnyam pa 'am/ brung ba snyam sems pa'o/ /ngal ba ni dub pa'o/ /tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur
103b3(mdo 'grel): sems pa ni/ gnyis su gshegs pa ltar sems pa'o/ /sla ba ni rang gi bya ba mi nus shing zhum pa'o/ /sked pa na? ba ni mnan pa 'am zags pa snyam ga? sems pa'o/ /rgyab brdungs pa snyam sems pa ni grugs pa snyam sems pa 'am/ phyir btags pa
103b4(mdo 'grel): 'am? du sems pa'o/ /lto ba btsing ba snyam sems pa ni lag pas btsir zhing nan pa ltar sems ba'o/ /rus pa bcad pa ltar sems pa ni mtshon gyis bcad pa ltar tsha zhing na ba'o/ /de las kyang khyad par du rtsib logs su btogs pa'i rus pa
103b5(mdo 'grel): bcad pa snyam sems shing lhag par na ba dang/ snying ga btsir zhing bsdams pa lta bur sems shing nang du zug pa'i tshul gyis na ba dang/ brad du lcags yu btsugs pa lta bur sems shing gzer ba dang/ yang gzer ba de nyid kyi phrag
103b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyogs khyab cing na ba dang/ dpung pa'i phyogs tho bas bcom pa lta bur sems shing na ba dang/ sgogs dus kyi phyogs su til btsir ba'i 'khrul 'khod kyis gtsir ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyis btsir ba ltar sems shing na ba dang/ 'gram
103b7(mdo 'grel): pa? bzas ldeng mi nus shing nyam chung ba dang/ kha gdangs pa dang bcas pa'i glal dang/ bya rmyang byod 'dod pa dang/ rna ba 'bod pa lta bu'i sgra dang bcas pa dang/ mur 'gram gnyis su khab kyis btsigs pa ltar na ba dang/ mgo bo'i phyogs
104a1(mdo 'grel): gzer zhing na ba dang/ lces ro mi tshor ba ste/ lces ro'i khyad par mi shes pa dang/ yang de bzhin du kha ro bska ba'i brag tu bro ba dang/ bshad pa dang/ gci ba dang/ rdul la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams sri ba dang/ pags pa la sro?
104a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i kha dog dmar zhing rtsub par 'gyur ba dang/ mchil ma mang zhing bad kan 'dzag pa dang/ yi ga 'chus shing zas la sogs pa'i blo mi skye ba dang/ sred pa chung ba ste zas la sogs pa la lhag par dga' ba med pa dang/ kha zas mi 'ju ba ste/ zos pa'i
104a3(mdo 'grel): zas kyang 'ju ba'i stobs chung pa dang/ rdul mi 'byung zhing phyi rol du mi thon pa dang/ gnyid yar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ lud pa nas skyugs pa'i bar skam zhing kha zas la sogs pa mi 'byung ba dang/ sems zhum
104a4(mdo 'grel): zhing sdug bsngal bas yid zhum pa dang/ lus kyi ba spu ldang zhing bshor ba dang/ pags pa dang so btsags pa snyam shing brtse ba dang/ rkang lag 'dar zhing 'gul ba dang/ sprid pa thogs shing mi thon pa dang/ mgo 'khor zhing 'khor lo bskor ba
104a5(mdo 'grel): ltar sems pa dang/ tshig bla ba ste/ 'brel pa med pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang/ drod bag la dga' ba ste/ me dang nyi tshan bsten 'dod ba dang/ bya rgyang? byed pa yan lag brkyang zhing sdud 'dod pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ de dag ni rlung
104a6(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i rims nad kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /lus kun cig car khyab pa dang/ /bla zhing kha'i ro kha ba dang/ bsil 'dod kha snar thor bu 'byung/ /mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga' / /bshang sla mkhris pa slon pa dang//
104a7(mdo 'grel): mchil ma khrag bcas sgreg pa skyur/ /thor bu dmar po 'byung ba dang/ /pags pa la sogs ser rtsa sngo/ /rdul 'byung dbugs ni mnam pa dang/ /skom dad rab che mkhris pa'i rims/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi
104b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma ni/ /lus kun cig car khyab pa/ zhes bya ba la/ mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag dang/ lus kun tsha ba 'ur 'ur bos cig car dus gcig tu khyab te na ba dang/ de bzhin du bla zhing tshig 'tshal ba dang/ kha'i nang kha bro bar 'gyur ba dang/ bsil ba ?
104b2(mdo 'grel): cing grang ba la dga' ba dang/ kha dang sna'i nang na thor bu 'byung zhing zhi ba smin pa dang/ brgyal zhing 'bog pa dang/ myos pa ste 'og nas chad? nad kyi skabs su bshad la lta bu'i myos pa dang ldan pa dang/ sems mi dga' ba ste blo mal na mi gnas shing 'phyo
104b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ bshang ba sla zhing 'khru ba dang/ mkhris pa rlon zhing skyug pa dang/ kha nas mchil ma khrag dang bcas pa 'byung ba dang/ sgrags pa ro skyur por 'byung ba dang/ thor bu 'am 'brum phran dmar po til til 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ pags pa dang lce
104b4(mdo 'grel): dang gdong dang gcin gyi mdog ser zhing rtsa sde? ba dang/ lus rdul 'byung zhing cha ba dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i dri mnam zhing rul ba dang/ skom dad kyi shas shin tu che ba 'byung ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa ni mkhris pa'i rims yin no/ /lhag pa yi
104b5(mdo 'grel): ga 'chus shing rmangs/ /bu ga bkag cing ri las shugs dal/ mchil ma kha nang mngar bar bro/ /rang kha lci zhing dbugs mi bde/ /cha ma btab snying na skyugs pa 'gyur/ /lus pa lus rangs pags sogs skya/ /yan lag thor du grang mo 'byung/ /snyom
104b6(mdo 'grel): zhing lus 'dar bad kan rims/ zhes bya ba la/ rims thams cad las bad kan gyi rims kyi mtshan nyid ni/ lhag par ram khyad par du yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang/ sems rmongs bab tu 'gyur zhing bying ba dang/ bu ga'i tshogs 'gags shing dri
104b7(mdo 'grel): ma rnams 'byung ba thogs pa dang/ rims kyis shu las ngal zhing nad tshabs chung pa dang/ mchim ma mang zhing ljan ljin che ba dang/ /ba'i dang? ro mngar ba bro ba dang/ snying ga lci zhing dang kha mer mer 'dug pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang//
105a1(mdo 'grel): cham pas btab cing sna chu 'dag pa dang/ snying na zhing 'khyil ba dang/ skyags pa 'byung zhing lod pa dang/ lud pa lu ba dang lus kyi yan lag rengs par 'gyur ba dang/ pags pa la sogs te/ pags pa dang/ sen mo dang/
105a2(mdo 'grel): gdong dang/ lce dang/ bshang ba dang/ gci ba rnams skya zhing dkar ba dang/ mgo dang lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams thor bu 'am 'brum bu bad kan gyi rang bzhin can grang mo 'byung ba dang/ snyom pa ste gnyid kyis non pa ltar yul
105a3(mdo 'grel): rnams nges par 'dzin par mi nus pa dang/ lus 'dar ba ste grang lhags kyi lus kyi khong 'dar bar gyur pa'o/ /de yang chu bsil dag gis reg pa dang/ /khyad par du ni dgun dus su/ /grang bas nyen te skrangs gyur pa/ /bad kan las byung lus
105a4(mdo 'grel): 'dar yin/ zhes bshad pa yin te/ mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa ni bad kan gyi rims yin no/ /rang gi dus su thams cad ni/ /'byung zhing 'phel ba nyid gyur pa/ /nad gzhir bshad pa'i mi mthun bsten/ /bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin/ zhes
105a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ rims nad rang rang gi dus nyid mo dang mtshan mo dang/ zas zos pa'i skabs dang/ 'brel pa'i dus dang rang rang gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rims thams cad 'byung zhing skye ba dang/ 'phel zhing rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang/
105a6(mdo 'grel): nad bzhi nyid du bshad pa'i ma bris pa'i rims la tsha ba la sogs pa mi mthun pa bsten pas ni sdug bsngal bskyed par byed pa yin la/ de bsgyur zhing bde ba dang/ 'brel par byas pas ni/ bde bar byed pa yin no/ /rang rang mtshan ma 'dres
105a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi ldan pa'i rims yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ sngar smos pa'i rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dres par gyur pa las ni de'i mtshan ma ldan pa'i rims te/ nad gnyis gnyid lan byung ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /des na rlung dang mkhris pa'i
105b1(mdo 'grel): rims kyi mtshan ma 'dren ma dang ldan pa ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i rims yin par shes par bya'o/ /rlung dang bad kan gyi mtshan ma gnyis ka dang ldan pa ni rlung dang bad kan gyi ldan pa'i rims yin la/ mkhris pa dang bad
105b2(mdo 'grel): kan gnyi ga'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pa'i rim yin par shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang ni/ mgo na brgyal slon lus tsha rmongs bag 'gyur/ /gre ba kha skams mi dga' lus tshigs na/ /gnyid mang mgo 'khor spu
105b3(mdo 'grel): ldang skom dang che/ /kha glal tshig mang rlung mkhris 'dres pa'i rims/ /zhes bya ba la/ gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba ste/ rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni mgon ba la sogs pa yang yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i don no/ /mgon pa ni mgo ltad
105b4(mdo 'grel): ltad? por na zhing zug pa'o/ /brgyal ba ni mi dran pa'o/ /slon ba ni skyug pa'o/ /lus tsha ba ni yan lag tshig 'ur 'ur pir 'dug pa'o/ /rmong bag ni sems blod pa'o/ /gre ba dang kha skams pa ni rlan med pa'o/ /rus tshigs na ba ni brdungs pa snyam du sems pa'o//
105b5(mdo 'grel): tshig mang ba ni bla ba'o/ /tsha med yi ga 'chus shing glang tshigs na/ /cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde bshad sri/ /khod bsil rmongs bag rab rib mgo 'khor rmya/ /bad kan rlung 'dras rims kyi mtshan ma yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhan yang bad kan rlung 'dres pa las
105b6(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i ldan pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ni/ tsha ba med pa la sogs pa yang yin par shes par bya ste/ /tsha ba med pa ni rims kyi tsha ba'i gdung ba chung ba'o/ /gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/ /lus rdul rengs dang cha bsil sor mi gnas/ /skom dang lud pa bad
105b7(mdo 'grel): kan mkhris bag 'byung/ /rmongs bag rmya dang kha bro bar dri chags/ /bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa'i rims kyis rtags/ /zhes bya ba la/ gzhan yang bad kan dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i ldan pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ lus rdul ba dang khong rengs pa la
106a1(mdo 'grel): sogs pa las shes par bya'o/ /rengs pa ni yan lag rengs pa'o/ /tsha ba dang bsil ba dus la mi gnas pa yan lag grang zhing lan 'ga' tsha ste/ rgyud gcig tu mi gnas pa'o/ /khar dri ma chags pa ni ljan ljin gyis gos pa'o/ /kun la
106a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba rtags kun ldan/ /'dir yang thad re tsha ba dang/ /de bzhin grang dang nyin mo ni/ /gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid med chung pa 'am/ /rtag par gnyid yod pa 'am yang na yang/ /rdul cher 'byung ba 'am rdul mi 'byung/ /glu dang gang dang rgod sogs
106a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing/ mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag dang bcas/ /zhu ma zhing rdzi ma 'khrugs par snang/ /byin snying rtsib logs na ba dang/ /mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor/ /rna ba sgra dang nad bcas dang/ /mgul ba gra mas gang snyam sems
106a4(mdo 'grel): lce rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang/ /lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems/ /mchil mar khrag mkhris bad kan 'byung/ /mgo bo yo zhing skom dang che/ /thor bu 'brum phran mdza' 'khor ba/ /dmar zhing gdag pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /snying na bshang
106a5(mdo 'grel): gci bsri ba 'am/ /yang na nyung ba 'am rab mang 'gyur/ /kha ni snum zhing nyams stobs chud/ /gtse ma chung 'gyur zhing bla ba dang/ /nad min dga' zhing rmugs pa dang/ /rgyun du gre ba 'dzer ba ni/ /'das pa'i rims te mngon rmugs byed/ /de ni
106a6(mdo 'grel): mdangs 'brog ces kyang bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ nad gzhi thams cad las byung ba yin pas na/ kun las byung ste/ de ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rims kyi mtshan nyid du bshad pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin la/ 'dus pa las gyur
106a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rims 'dir mtshan nyid gzhan yang skad cig gam thad cig re re zhing yang dang yang du lus tsha bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du thad cig re re zhing grang bar 'gyur ba dang/ nyin mo ni gnyid cher 'ong zhing shas cher 'thibs par 'gyur ba dang/ /
106b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo ni gnyid med cing yang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na nyin mtshan rtag par rgyun du gnyid 'od ba 'am/ nyin mtshan rtag par gnyid med par 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang de bzhin du rdul shas cher 'byung zhing mang du 'dzag pa cung zad tsam gyis rdul ??
106b2(mdo 'grel): mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ glu la sogs pa'i spyod pa dan cing dman pa la 'jug par dga' ba dang/ mig kha dog dmar ba dang/ mchi ma'i rgyun 'dzag pa dang bcas shing mi sdug par snang ba dang/ zhum zhing yo ba dang/ rdzi 'khrugs shing mig gi
106b3(mdo 'grel): spu g.yos par snang ba dang/ byin snying la sogs pa na ba dang/ rna bas sgra grag pa dang bcas shing na zhing gzir ba dang/ mgul pa ste gre ba gra ma'i tshogs kyi gang zhing khyab pa snyam du sems pa dang/ lce tsher ma ltar rtsub pa dang/ /kun nas bsregs shing
106b4(mdo 'grel): tshig pa ltar snang ba dang/ lus kyi khod lci ba dang/ yan lag gi tshogs bye zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang/ mchil mar khrag dang mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gyi rnam par 'byung ba dang/ mgo bo'i g.yo zhing 'dar ba dang thor bu dang 'brum phran mgo bo
106b5(mdo 'grel): pags pa mdza' 'khor ba zlum po 'byung zhing/ de yang mdog nag ba dang/ dmar bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ snying na zhing gzer ba dang/ bshad lci la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams sri zhing mi 'byung ba 'am/ /yang na nyung zhing cung zad 'byung ba 'am// 
106b6(mdo 'grel): shin tu mang zhing shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ kha'i nad snum zhing 'byil ba dang/ nyam stobs chung zhing zad pa dang/ /gcom chud zhing mda' ba dang/ bla zhing tshig 'chol ba mang du smra ba dang/ nad smin par dka' zhing yun ring na 'byod ba dang//
106b7(mdo 'grel): shas cher rmugs pa dang/ rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu gra ba 'dzer zhing sgra mi gsal ba dar dar por 'byung ba ste/ mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa ni 'dus pa'i rims shes bshad pa de/ de nyid la ni ming gi rnam grangs su mngon par rmugs par byed
107a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mdangs 'brog par byed pa zhes bshad cing btags pa yin no/ /nad kyis bkag cing me drod nyams/ /mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs gyur pa/ /gsor mi rung ste de las gzhan/ /gos dka' 'am dbang po mtshar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba
107a2(mdo 'grel): la/ rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang bshad pa dang/ gci ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi skyon gyis 'byung ba'i rgyun bkag cing me drod nyams par gyur pa dang/ de bzhin du ji skad smos pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par gyur na/ gsor mi rung
107a3(mdo 'grel): ste/ gso bar mi nus pa yin no/ /de las gzhan pa 'dus pa'i rims de nad kyi tshabs chung zhing mtshan nyid ma rdzogs na/ de gso dka' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang ba ste lus ngag gi las kyi rten nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'dus
107a4(mdo 'grel): pa las byung ba/ /gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas pags pa 'am nang grol tsha ba dag /'debs pa 'am tsha ba snga phyis 'byung/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa la gyur pa'i rims ldam las mtshan nyid gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus
107a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rims gang las mkhris pa logs shig na gnas shing lan 'ga' ni pags par gnas pa 'am/ lan 'ga' ni nang grol na gnas nas tshab skyed par byed pa sngar byung ba la/ phyis 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can ni gso dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin
107a6(mdo 'grel): bad kan rlung grang ba/ zhes bya ba la/ yang de bzhin du rlung dang bad kan logs shig tu tha dad par gnas shing/ snga phyir grang bar byed pa ni/ gso dka' ba ma yin no/ /de gnyis tsha snga gso? dka' yin/ zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa'i nad de gnyis las tsha ba sde'i?
107a7(mdo 'grel): nad ni gso dka' zhing/ btsos bar dka' ba yin no/ /grang sde der ni mkhris pa yis/ bad kan gsher ba skams pa dang/ /grang ba zhi byas kha skyur brgyal/ /myos dang skom dad skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ grang ba sngar byung ba'i 'dus pa'i rims der
107b1(mdo 'grel): ni mkhris pa'i tsha bas bad kan gyi gsher bag skams par gyur pa dang/ skyur ba la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba bzhir 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du grang ba zhi bas kyang gzhi bo de dag nyid skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba snga na de rjes la rmugs slon mchil mgo? bor? snyoms
107b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ dang po tsha ba skyes par gyur pa'i 'dus pa'i rims la ni/ tsha ba de'i rjes la rmugs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /glo bur drag shul las gyur dang/ /mngon zin byang byas dmod byung bzhi/ /zhes bya ba la/ rims brgyad po glo bur ba
107b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la ni/ drags shul las byung ba dang/ mngon par zin pa dang/ byang byas pa dang/ dmod pa las byung ba'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de la rmas bcad mas tshig rtsogs/ /ngal ba drag shul las byung yin/ zhes bya ba la/ glo bur ba'i rims kyis
107b4(mdo 'grel): brag shul las byung ba zhes bya ba 'dir mtshon gyis rmas shing bcad pa la sogs pa las/ rims 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du ngal zhing lam gyis dub pa las byung ba'i lus nyon mongs pa las drag shul las byung ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /der ni
107b5(mdo 'grel): phal cher rlung nad kyis/ /khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas/ /na bcas mdog nyams skrangs dang bcas/ /zug zer bcas pa'i rims bskyed 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ drags shul las byung ba'i rims der ni phal cher rim mang du rlung gi nad kyi dbang gis
107b6(mdo 'grel): khrag la gnod pa'i byas shing rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ba las na ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i rims skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon zhugs so sman gyis dri dang dug /khros 'jigs mya ngan gdon las byung/ /mngon par zin las byung rims yin/ zhes
107b7(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ gdon zhugs pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i rims ni mngon par zin pa 'am/ gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rims yin no/ /gdon ni lha la sogs pa'i 'og nas bshad pa rnams so/ /'dir gdon rgyu med rgod cing du/ /zhes bya ba la/
108a1(mdo 'grel): rims kyi gnas skabs 'dir lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i gdon gyis ni/ rgyu med par glo bur du chad 'ga' ni rgod pa dang/ ched 'ga' ni du bar 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi dri skyes rgyal ba dang/ /sprid ba klang nas skrangs par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la sman
108a2(mdo 'grel): gyi dril ba skyes pa'i blo bur pa'i rims ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dug las brgyal dang tshad bar 'khru/ /mdog nag lus tshad snying nad 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ 'dir dug las byung ba'i rims ni brgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
108a3(mdo 'grel): can 'gyur bar 'gyur ro/ /khras las lus 'dar klad nad 'gyur ro/ zhes byar la/ shin tu khras pa las ni lus 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang/ de bzhin du klad nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan 'jigs las bla bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ mya ngan 'jigs pa las byung ba'i
108a4(mdo 'grel): rims ni bla zhing bab col mang du smra bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod la mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus tsha/ /ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ 'dod pas gdungs pa las skyes pa'i rims pa khol? dog pa dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ lus dang snying ga tsha bar
108a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du ngo cha shes pa dang/ gnyid dang blo gros dang/ brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba de dag nyams shing zad par 'gyur ro/ /gdon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rims/ khros pas 'jigs tshogs gsum gyi rlung gi rims khros pas pa khris pa ldang bar
108a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ gdon la sogs pa zhes ba gdon dang sman dang dus las byung ba'i rims gsum gyis ni nyes pa gsum 'dus pa'i rims su 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang mya ngan dang 'dod pa gsum las byung ba'i rims kyis ni rlung 'khrugs pa'i rims
108a7(mdo 'grel): su 'gyur ro/ /khros pa las byung ba'i rims kyis ni mkhris pa ldang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /dmod ba byang byas las byung gang/ /'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad ba/ de ni shin tu bzod dkang bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ dmod pa dang byang byas pa las gyur ba'i
108b1(mdo 'grel): rims gang yin pas ni 'dus pa'i rims mi bzod cing rno ba dang/ shin tu bzod par dka' zhing mnags pa'i nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes sman dpyad kyis gzhung rtsom pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa 'am/ bdag gi slob dpon la sogs kyis bshad do/
108b2(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'o/ de la byad byas sngags kyis ni/ /sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du bya/ /thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus/ /da nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom/ /tsha bcas brgyal bas zin gyur pa'i/ /rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'di dag gi nang
108b3(mdo 'grel): nas byad byas pa'i sngags ni srid srung gi rig byed la sogs pa las bshad pa'i bram ze'i sngags la sogs so/ /sbyin sreg byas shing bsregs shing bsregs shig ces smras bzhin du me la sregs rdzas 'jud ba na/ /gang la byas pa de thog ma kho
108b4(mdo 'grel): nar de'i sems la 'bab cing tsha ba nyams su myong bar byed la/ de'i 'og tu ni lus tsha bar byed cig tsha ba'i rims kyis 'debs la/ de nas thung ngu dang/ mgo 'khor ba la sogs pas zin cing rims de ni nyin cig bzhin du 'phel bar rgyas par 'gyur ro/
108b5(mdo 'grel): de ltar rims ni brgyad du bshad/ ces bya ba la/ de ltar rnam pa de dag gis nad gzhi dang glo bur ba las byung ba'i dbye bas rims ni grangs brgyad yod par che'i rig byed la mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad cing bstan pa yin no/ /de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te/
108b6(mdo 'grel): lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni/ /grang dang tsha ba dang phyi nang gnas/ /rang bzhin dang ni gyur pa dang/ /gsor rung gso ru mi rung dang/ /smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ /yang rims 'di ni rnam pa gnyis yod/ /lus kyi rims dang sems kyi rims
108b7(mdo 'grel): shes bya ba gnyis dang/ grang ba dang tsha ba gnyis dang/ phyir rol gnas pa dang/ nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang/ rang bzhin dang gzhan du gyur pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang/ gsor rung ba dang gsor mi rung pa zhes bya ba gnyis dang/ smin pa dang ma smin
109a1(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ba gnyis so/ /lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed/ /sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ lus kyi rims ni thog mar te/ dang por lus tsha bar byed la/ de'i 'og tu ni snying tsha bar 'gyur ro//
109a2(mdo 'grel): sems kyi rims kyis ni dang por snying tsha bar byed la/ de'i 'og tu ni lus tsha bar byed do/ /rlung dang bad kan cig car ni/ /'byung che phrad pa'i rims su 'gyur/ /mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste/ /'dres pas 'dres pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la/
109a3(mdo 'grel): rlung ni zung du 'jug pa yin bas/ bad kan dang lhan cig tu gnas shing/ cig car 'byung ba'i dus na ni/ /grang ba'i rims 'gyur la/ de bzhin du mkhris pa dang/ rlung mnyam du 'jug cing mkhris pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na tshe ba'i
109a4(mdo 'grel): rims su 'gyur/ /'dres pa ste bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis dang/ rlung 'dres pa'i tshe na ni rlung de zung du 'jug pa yin la ched 'ga' tsha par 'gyur ro/ /ched 'ga' grad bar 'gyur ro/ /nad gnas ba/ rims nad dkyel ni skyed gyur nas/ nad
109a5(mdo 'grel): na na sha'i bshang gcig sri zhes bya ba la/ nad na gnas pa'i rims na nad du chud cing rten pa yin pas nad kyi dkyel skyed cing 'phel bar 'gyur nas/ nad de nyid na mi bzad par na ba dang/ bshad ba la sogs pa'i dri ma sri par 'gyur ro//
109a6(mdo 'grel): phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang/ /phyi rol la gnas gso bar bla/ /zhes bya ba la/ phyi rol gyi rims ni tsha ba'i dngos po yang phyi rol na gnas pa yin gyi/ /nad na gnas pa ma yin la/ de nyid ni gso bar sla zhing bcos par sla ba yin no/ /tshig
109a7(mdo 'grel): 'dis ni gnad na gnas pa'i rims kyi don gyi shugs kyis dka' ba yin no zhes ston to/ /dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su/ /rlung sogs rims 'byung rang bzhin rims/ /zhes bya ba la/ dbyang la sogs pa'i dus gsum du rims
109b1(mdo 'grel): ba ci lta ba bzhin du rlung la sogs pa'i rims bzhin du 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyi rims zhes bya ste/ dbyar gyi dus su ni rlung gi rims rang bzhin gyi rims yin no/ /ston ni mkhris pa'o/ /dpyid ni bad kan gyi'o/ /gzhan du gyur pa de
109b2(mdo 'grel): gso dka' / phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims/ /yin yang gso par dka' ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ de ltar bshad pa las rnam pa gzhan pa de ni 'gyur ba'i rims zhes bya ste/ de yang dngos su na dus tshigs rnams su rims bzhin du
109b3(mdo 'grel): ma byung ba ste/ dper na dbyar gyi tshe mkhris pa dang bad kan las byung ba dang/ ston gyi tshe rlung dang bad kan las byung ba dang/ dbyid kyi dus su rlung dang mkhris pa las byung bar gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin du dus tshigs thams cad du yang rlung
109b4(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i zhes bya ba/ rang bzhin las gzhan du gyur pas de dag ni gso bar dka' ba yin la/ de las phal cher rlung las gyur pa'i rims ni rang bzhin gyi rims yin yang gso dka' yin na/ de las gzhan du gyur
109b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rims lta smos kyang ci dgos/ phal che zhes pa ni ma lus par de ltar ma yin pa'i don te/ la lar ni bsod nams kyi dbang gis rlung las gyur pa yin yang gso sla ba ni yod do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /dbyar dus rlung nad ldang
109b6(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ /mkhris pa bad kan ldan pa'i rims su 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus su rlung nad ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur nas rims skyed par byed ba de'i tshe/ mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan pa rims su 'gyur gyi dang
109b7(mdo 'grel): mi ldan pa ma yin te/ de'i tshe rims de rlung las gyur pa yin du zin kyang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang ldan bas mngon par ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i don no/ /ston ka mkhris pas nad stong ste/ bad kan de'i grog byed 'gyur/ /
110a1(mdo 'grel): de ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang/ /gnod par gyur ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba la/ ston ka'i dus su mkhris pa 'khrugs nas rims skyed par byed la/ rims skyed par rtsom pa'i mkhris pa de'i stobs sam grogs skyed pa ni
110a2(mdo 'grel): bad kan yin pas de grogs byas nas skye bar 'gyur te/ rims ni ma zhu ba'i gnas la brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /des na gnas skabs der ni bad kan dang mkhris pa gnyis ni smyung bar byas pas/ gso bar bya zhing bcas
110a3(mdo 'grel): dgos pa yin pas na/ gnas skabs 'dir smyung ba byas pa las gnod cing nang du 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa yod pa yin no/ /bad kan dpyid ldang de yang ni/ /de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung/ /zhes bya ba la/ dpyid kyi dus su ni bad kan
110a4(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs shing ldang nas rims bskyed par byed pa yin la/ bad kan yang de'i rjes la rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis grogs byed cing stobs skyed par 'gyur ro/ /nyams stobs tshe zhing nad tsha bas chud/ /brla brnyan med rims
110a5(mdo 'grel): gso bar sla/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa la sogs nyams stobs che ba dang/ de bzhin du nad tshabs kyi dkyel chung pa dang/ lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i bla brnan med pa'i rims nad gang yin
110a6(mdo 'grel): pa de ni myur du bde bar bya bar nus bas na/ gso sla ba yin no/ /rnam kun 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba/ gsor mi rung bar sngar bshad do/ /zhes bya ba la/ yod e rnam pa thams cad du lus kyi 'gyur ba shes par bya ba'i lus kyi gnas su
110a7(mdo 'grel): gsor mi rung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rims sngar bshad de/ /rims ni tshab che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi sngar bshad pa yin no/ /rims kyis na de tshabs che zhing tsha/ /khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang/ bshang sri kha 'das? ma
110b1(mdo 'grel): 'ju la/ /bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid/ /ces bya ba la/ rims ma smin pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di dag yin te/ rims kyi nad tshabs gnad dang chags tshigs la sogs pa na ba'i tshabs che zhing de bzhin du khong shin tu mya zhing nyam
110b2(mdo 'grel): chung ba yin te/ stobs dang spro bar bcas pa gcin mang du 'byung ba dang bshang gci sri zhing mi 'byung ba dang/ kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa dang/ bkres pa med cing zas mi 'dod ba ste/ 'di dag ni rims ma smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin par
110b3(mdo 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /rims shugs stobs che skom dang che/ /bla zhing mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa'i/ /smin par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rims smin pa'i nye bar mtshan ma
110b4(mdo 'grel): ni rims kyi shugs drag cing stobs che ba dang/ de nyid kyis na skom dang che ba dang/ bla zhing tshigs 'chang ba dang/ bshang gcig bde bar 'byung zhing mi bri ba dang/ nad skyong cing slongs ba ltar snang ba yin no/ /ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang/
110b5(mdo 'grel): zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ rims smin cing nad med pa'i mtshan nyid rims nad tshabs che ba la sogs pa las go bzlog pa las shes par bya ste/ rims nad kyi tshabs chung ba bri ba dang/ khong rmya zhing nyam chung pa
110b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ gcin nyung ba dang/ bshang ba bde bar 'byung ba la sogs pa ni/ rims ma zhu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar rmyung bar byas pa las rims de smin cing 'thu ba nyid du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /de yang
110b7(mdo 'grel): drang srong ci ra kas/ lus zungs kun gnas nad rnams ni/ /zhag bdun gyis ni smin par 'gyur/ /rims nad phal cher nad rnams ni/ /spyod bya smin pa yin zhes bshad/ /ces bshad pa yin no/ /rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni/ /stobs chung che
111a1(mdo 'grel): las rnam lngar bshad/ /phal cher 'dus par gyur pa yi/ /rims su mang du 'byung bar bshad/ /rgyun dang rtag pa nyid gcig pa/ /nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ rims nad kyi grangs ni 'og nas bshad pa'i
111a2(mdo 'grel): rgyun la sogs pa'i rnam pas lnga yod do/ /zhes drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do/ /de gang las ji ltar zhe na/ dus dang yul dang stobs che chung las 'gyur te/ rlung la sogs pa'i rims nad stobs che ba dang/ stobs chung
111a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbang gis sam/ /yang de bzhin du rim nad 'gyur pa'i nad gzhi 'khrugs pa'i dus dang/ /lus? stobs chung ba dang/ /stobs che ba'i dbang gis sam/ /yang na nad rnams kyi dus yin pas na/ /nod kyi dus ste/ nyin mo
111a4(mdo 'grel): dang mtshan mo dang/ dus tshigs dang zas zos kyi cha de'i stobs che chung las/ nad zad pa dang/ 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin la/ de yang rnam pa lngar bshad do/ /de las kyang 'dus pa'i rims ni phal cher rim
111a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'du nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las phal cher 'dus pa'i rims su 'gyur bar bshad do/ /phal cher zhes smos pa ni/ rnam par 'gyur ba yod pa'i don to/ /de yang gzhung gzhan yas rlung las phal cher rtag par
111a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyus /mkhris las phal cher nyid gsum pa/ phal cher bad kan las nyin cig /'dus pa las ni gzhi pa yin/ zhes bshad pa yin no/ /rgyun dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga po'i ming bstan pa yin no/ lus zungs
111a7(mdo 'grel): bags gci rgyu ba yi/ /bu ba nad kyi khyab pas na/ /lus kun tsha bar gyur na ni/ /gnod bya sogs dang mnyam par 'phel/ /stobs cha lus lci rkang lag rengs/ /khyad par du ni dang mar gnas/ /gnyen pos bcas
111b1(mdo 'grel): dka' bzod par dga' / /rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pa ni shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur zhing skyed par byed do/ /de yang lus zungs la sogs pa ?
111b2(mdo 'grel): zhing 'phro bar byed pa'i bu ga rnams/ nad kyis khyab par byas shing kun tu phyin par byas la/ der nad de lus ma lus pa kun tu rims kyi tshabs che bar gyur cing tsha ba'i gdungs pas gzir bar byas pa dang/ de bzhin du gnod
111b3(mdo 'grel): par bya ba dangs ma dang/ dus tshigs dang/ yul dang/ rang bzhin de dang cha mnyam par 'khel zhing rgyas par byas pa ste/ /gnod bya ni lus zungs bdun dang de ma rnams/ /dus tshigs ni dbyar la sogs pa'o/ /yul ni
111b4(mdo 'grel): rlan can la sogs pa'o/ /rang bzhin ni bdun ni/ /de yang stobs che ba ste/ nus pa dang ldan pa dus yul ring mor la sogs pa dang/ de bzhin du ldi zhing ? dka' la/ lus kyis mi theg pa snyam du sems pa dang
111b5(mdo 'grel): yan lag rnams rangs shing bskyod mi nus pa dang/ khyad par du yang lhag par dangs ma zhes bya ba'i lus zungs la gnas pa gnyen pos bcos par dka' zhing gso ba'i thabs cis kyang bzlog tu med pa ste/ gnod bya la sogs pa
111b6(mdo 'grel): dang cha mnyam pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de bzhin du zog pa la rab tu dga' ba ste/ sdug bsngal zhing mnags par mi nas pa'i rims la ni rgyun gyi rims zhes bya ste/ de lta bur 'gyur ba yin no/ /de'i drod kyi dri ma dang/ lus zungs
111b7(mdo 'grel): myud du zad par byed/ /de 'og rnams kun lus zungs sogs/ /dag pa 'am ma dag rims kyis ni /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhag /bdun nam bcu 'am bcu gnyis gnas/ phal cher mtshams las ni 'da' ba ste//
112a1(mdo 'grel): 'che 'am 'chi ma dag tu byed/ /ces bya ba la/ rims nga'i dros kyi tsha bas dri ma te bshad ba la sogs pa dang/ dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa'i rgyus rims des dri ma rnams
112a2(mdo 'grel): zad par byed pa 'am/ lus zungs rnams kyang zad par byas nas de'i 'og tu rnam pa kun tu ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad du lus zungs bshang ba dang gci ba dang bcas pa dag ste/ rims kyi tshabs dri ma med par byas pa 'am/
112a3(mdo 'grel): yang na 'ga' lus zungs la sogs pa ma dag cing ljan ljin dang bcas pa'i rims kyis grangs ji lta ba bzhin du rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi las zhag bdun nam bcu 'am bcu gnyis kyi bar du phal cher gnas pa'i mtshams sam
112a4(mdo 'grel): dus kyi nges pa las mi 'da' bar rjes su gnas te ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus de tsam gyi nang du 'chi ba'am/ rims kyi gtong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi zhing gsod par 'gyur te/ nyin zhag 'di tsam gyis gtong ba 'am gsod par
112a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de yang gang rlung shas che ba las byung ba de ni phal cher zhag bdun gyis gtong ba 'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mkhris pa shas che ba las byung ba ni zhag bcus so/ /bad kan shas che ba las byung ba ni bcu
112a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi mi bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba ni rims kyi sbyar ba'i don no/ /de skar ma bzhin 'jug gis bshad/ ces bya ba la/ de lta bu de ni sman dpyad kyi gzhung rtsom par byed pa drang srong me bzhin 'jug ces bya ba bshad pa'i
112a7(mdo 'grel): gzhung yin no/ /ljan sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung/ /mdun pa nyid ldab 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin dug dang bcu gcig ldab/ /'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyi tshigs/ /'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ drang srong
112b1(mdo 'grel): ljan sngon zhes bya bas bshad pa'i gzhung ni 'og nas bnyad ba'i tshul 'di ltar ston pa yin te/ bdun gnyis ldab du brtsi ste/ rlung gi rims kyis zhag bcu bzhin dangs ma la sogs pa dang ma dag pa yang yin yang rung ste/ rnam pa
112b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad du zhag bcu bzhis 'tsho ba 'am 'chi bar 'gyur ba bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba yin/ /gnyis pa ni zhag dgu ba ste/ de yang gnyis lnga bsdu brtsis la zhag bco brgyad du bya ste/ /mkhris pa shas che ba'i rims ni zhag bco brgyad kyis
112b3(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba 'am/ 'chi ba'i phye brog byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gsum pa ni zhag bcu gcig ba yin te/ 'di ldab du byas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis bad kan gyi shas tsha ba'i rims kyis bye brag phyed par 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni nad gzhi
112b4(mdo 'grel): gsum las byung ba'i rims kyi dus tshig kyi bye brag rnam par bzhag pa yin te/ /rims dus dag dang ma dag las/ yun rings dus su gnas pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ de la dag pa ni nad dang bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs par smin brtse zhil zhing ma smin
112b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i skyon med pa yin la/ de las go bzlog pa ni smin pa yin te/ dag pa dang ma dag pa de gnyis cha 'dras ba ni dus yun ring mo zhig tu gnas shing sngar bshad pa'i dus las yun ring du gnas te/ gang gi tsha lus zungs kyi dangs ma la ni dag cing smin/ la
112b6(mdo 'grel): la ni me dag cing smin par gyur na/ de'i tshe rgyun gyi rims 'byar zhing 'don par mi 'gyur gyi/ yun ring du gnas pa kho nar 'gyur ro/ /nad brtse zhil ba nyam chung dang/ /kha zas mi 'phrod sogs bsten pas/ /nad dkyel chung yang gnod byad
112b7(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /rten te stobs chen nyid gyur las/ /gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'bri bcas/ /mi bzad ba ni nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad kyi ce zhil zhing nad las thar pa'i skyes bu nyams chung zhing lus 'di par gyur pa dang/ kha zas mi
113a1(mdo 'grel): 'phrod ba la sogs pa bsten pa ste/ zas dang skom dang sman dang spyod lam mi mthun zhing mi 'phrod pa bsten pa rgyas rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba dkyel chung zhing stobs shin tu zhan pa yin yang mi bzad pa'i
113a2(mdo 'grel): rims rgyud gya rims la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /de yang tsha ba mi bzod ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'debs pa na mi bzad ba'i rims zhes bya'o/ /de yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ gnod bya la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la brten cing gnas
113a3(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ lan 'ga' ni gnod bya la sogs pa khrag la sogs pa gang yang rung ba brten la/ lan 'ga' ni nyin mtshan la sogs pa'i dus la brtan la/ lan 'ga' ni rlung la sogs pa'i deng bzhin la brten te/ de ni tshabs chen por
113a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur pa'i stobs dang/ nus pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang gnyen po dang bcas pa yin zhing bcos ba'i thabs yod pa ma yin la/ yang de ni 'phel pa dang 'bri ba gnyis po la brten cing gnas pa yin no/ /de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs
113a5(mdo 'grel): rang gis dus su rim stobs bskyed/ /ces bya ba la/ nyams chung ba la sogs pa'i rnams kyi rang gi dus nyin mtshan dang/ dus kyi cha na mtshan nyid can du rims kyi stobs skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /slar yang de dag bcos
113a6(mdo 'grel): thabs kyi /stobs cha chad las ldog bar byed ces bya ba la/ mi bzad pa'i rims kyi rtsom pa de slar ldog bcing rang gi bya ba 'gags par 'gyur ba ni bcos thabs kyi stobs che chung las ldog par 'gyur te/ bcos thabs ni gnyen po
113a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ lus zungs dang dus la sogs pa cha mi mnyam pa ni gnyen po 'am/ bcos thabs kyi stobs yin la/ de stobs chung bar byas pa ni nus pa zad par byas pa ste/ rgyu des ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nad zad rims ni phrad gyur pa/ bcud
113b1(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa 'di la thim/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad zad pa ni nad kyi nus pa ni bri bar gyur la/ /rims ni phra zhing shes par dka' bar gnas pa ni dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs nyid la thim zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /thim bas lus ring shi mdog nyams//
113b2(mdo 'grel): rmong dag la sags de yis bskyed/ /ces bya ba la/ rims de lus zungs la this pas ni/ lus rims la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bskyed cing 'byung bar byed do/ /nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir/ dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo nas/ lus kun myur du khyab pa ni/ /nad kyis
113b3(mdo 'grel): skye bar byed pa yin/ /des na rgyun du rtag rim 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rtsa sgro bar gang nye bar gnas shing kha bye bar gyur ba nyid kyi phyir/ dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo rnams las rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung bas lus kun khyab cing phyin par/ byas
113b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ nad des lus thams cad khyab pa'i phyir rgyu des rims de rtag cing rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin la/ de yang tshab la sogs pa'i rgyun ma chad par rgyun du 'byung bas na/ rgyun gyi rims pa 'gyur ba yin no/ /de las bzlog pas tshul mi
113b5(mdo 'grel): 'dra/ /mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa /bya ba'i dus min mnyan yun ring/ zhes bya ba la/ de las bzlog ba ni snga ma rgyun gyi rims de las bzlog pa ste/ cha ba'i rgyun bar du chad pa la sogs pa'i tshul mi 'dra ba bzhi las rtag pa'i rims su
113b6(mdo 'grel): bzhag ste/ tshul mi mthun pa ni ring zhing shin tu ring ba dang/ kha bye zhing shin tu bye ba dang/ dangs ma bcud rtsa'i sbubs su nad kyis lus ma lus pa la myur du khyab par mi byed ba ste/ tshul de dag gi rgyun de dag gis rtag pa la sogs pa'i
113b7(mdo 'grel): rims kyi mtshan nyid rnam par bzhag pa yin/ /de yang rtag pa la sogs pa'i rims de dag ni cha mi snyoms pa yin te/ rgyu gang gis mi snyoms pa yin zhe na/ rtsom pa mi mnyam pa'i phyir te/ dus kyi 'gyur ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir dang/ rtsom
114a1(mdo 'grel): pa mi mnyam pa de yang mkhris ba dang rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa lta bu dang/ /bya ba mi mnyam pa ni sha dang tshil gyi nus par ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o/ /dus mi
114a2(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa ni rims kyis 'debs pa'i nyin zhag ste/ de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang/ /gzhan dag nyin re lan de yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ la sogs pa de yang lan 'ga' ni nyan me ldang/ lan 'ga' ni mtshan mo/ /lan 'ga' 
114a3(mdo 'grel): ni nyi ma phyed/ lan 'ga' ni dgongs ka ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ni yun ring du 'brel pa can yang yin pas na yun ring ste/ lus ring zhig tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don na/ /phal cher nad ni khrag la brten/ /rtag pa'i rims
114a4(mdo 'grel): ni byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang/ /zhes bya ba la/ phal cher zhes bya ba mang du rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung ba khrag la brten cing gnas nas rtag pa'i rims bskyed cing 'byung bar byed par 'gyur
114a5(mdo 'grel): la/ de yang nyin mtshan cig gi nang du lan gnyis ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'dir nyin par lan gnyis ldang la/ na tshan mo lan cig ldang ngo zhes bya ba'i nges pa yod pa ma yin la/ gzhen du lan 'ga' ni nyin cig la lan
114a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis ldang bar 'gyur la/ lan 'ga' ni nyin mtshan gnyis la re re ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang/ /de ni sha yi rtsa la brten/ zhes bya ba la/ rims nyin gcig pa ni nyin zhag gcig gi nang du lan re
114a7(mdo 'grel): re zhig ldang bar 'gyur la/ nyin cig dang rims de ni sha'i bcud kyi dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa la brten cing gnas pa yin no/ /gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas/ /zhes bya ba la/ rims nyin gsum pa'i nad ni tshil gyi rtsa'i nad
114b1(mdo 'grel): la gnas pas rims nyin gsum pa bskyed bar byed do/ /mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'jig/ /bad kan mkhris 'gyur sum mdo na/ /rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin/ /de ni zhag gcig gis ched yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ rims nyin
114b2(mdo 'grel): gsum pa las gyur pa yin du zin kyang/ mkhris pa dang rlung gnyis shas che ba ni spyi bo ste mog nas 'dzin pa yin la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa shas che na ni sum mdo zhes bya ba dpung pa gnyis dang/ gnya' ba 'dus pa'i
114b3(mdo 'grel): mtshams sun zhing de nas zug bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang bad kan shas che na ni rgyab nas na zhing de nas 'dzin pa yin no/ /yang rims nyin gsum pa de ni zhag gcig gis chod ba yin te nyin zhag re res chod pa yin no/ /
114b4(mdo 'grel): nyin bzhi pa yi rims tshil dang/ /rkang dang rus ba'i nad na gnas/ /gzhan dag cha la nyid la gnas zer/ /de yi nus pa bstan pa ni/ /bad kan gyis ni phyin gnyis na/ /rlung gis klad par na bar byed/ /rus rkang ga'i
114b5(mdo 'grel): gang zhugs pa yi/ /nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o/ /nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na/ /nyin cig na bar mi byed de/ /zhes bya ba la/ rims nyin bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad rkang dang nus pa gang yang rung
114b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i gnas su 'dug cing brten nas/ nad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lan 'ga' ni rkang la gnas nas skyed do/ /lan 'ga' ni rus pa la gnas nas nad skyes pa yin no/ /yang snan pa gzhan dag ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyi gnas kyang nyin
114b7(mdo 'grel): gsum ba dang 'dra bar tshil nyid la gnas nas ldang ngo zhes zer ro/ /rims nyin bzhi ba de'i nus pa'i mthu ni rnam pa gnyis yod par bstan te/ gang gi tshe bad kan gyi shes che ba de'i tshe ni dang po byin pa gnyis nas zug cing nad bar
115a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur la/ de rlung gi shes che ba yin na ni dang por klad pa na bar byed pa yin no/ /de yang res 'ga' 'i rus pa la gnas la/ res 'ga' ni rkang la zhen cing gnas pa yin no/ /res? nyang khang dus
115a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang nad gnyis ga la zhugs te gan la pa yin la gnyi gar zhugs pa de'i mtshan nyid ni nyin bzhi ba cig shes las go bzlog pa yin no/ /de yang nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du rgyun gyi 'chad pa nas de'i 'og tu nyin cig na bar mi
115a3(mdo 'grel): byed la/ //de ltar nyin cig na ba med nas yang nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du na bar byed ba yin no/ /'dis ni mtshan nyid gcig bstan ba yin la/ de las go bzlog pa'i rnam pa gzhan ga na nyin
115a4(mdo 'grel): cig rims nad de thu nas nyin gcis kyi bar du cung chad bya ste/ nyi ma gsum pa la yang thu bar byed pa'i rims kyis na ba yin te/ de ni gnyis pa'o/ /nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung/ /zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing/ /
115a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni/ /yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ yang du ma dang de'i tshe/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyi stobs sam mthu che chud las la byung ba dang/ zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa
