115a6(mdo 'grel): las rims nad du 'gyur la/ de bzhin du yid kyis stobs che chung dang/ las sngon chad spyod pa'i stobs che chung las rims rnams skye bar 'gyur la/ /de yang lan 'ga' ni rtag pa'i rims su 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' ni nyin
115a7(mdo 'grel): gcig pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ de las go bzlog pa rab tu yang 'gyur la/ ched 'ga' ni nyin bzhi bar gyur nas/ nyin gsum pa de ba nyin gcig pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis lus
115b1(mdo 'grel): zungs dkrugs gyur ba/ /nad sos nye tshe zhus bar 'gyur/ /de tshe nad pa dbugs drag rdul/ /tha khun zhing slon byed 'gre ba dang/ /lus 'dar tshig mar tsha ba dang/ lus grang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang/ /dran stor rims kyis shugs kyis
115b2(mdo 'grel): gzar/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis blta ba dang/ /bshang ba nad dang sgra bcas dang/ /bla ba shugs drag 'gyur pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ sogs pa'i nad gang yang rung bas dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs dkrugs shing glongs par gyur pa'i
115b3(mdo 'grel): rims de nad sos pa dang nye ba'i tsha na lus zungs de nyid la/ thim zhing zhu bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas nad de zhu ba'i dbang gis de'i tshe nad pa de la dbugs kyi rngam pa cung rmad drag tu 'byung zhing rdul te pa spu'i bu ga rnams las chu 'dzag pa dang/
115b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du 'khun zhing sgra mi gsal bar 'don cing slon ba ste/ bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa skyug par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du mal lam sa'i steng du 'gre zhing lus 'gyur ba dang/ lus 'dar zhing g.ye ba dang/ tshig mang
115b5(mdo 'grel): por smra ba ste/ dgos pa yod pa de bgos pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang/ lus tshab dang grag pa'i rnam par dus gcig tu smra bar 'gyur ba dang/ mdog nyams shing gzi me dang mang pa dang/ dran pa stor zhing gzi ma dang ming pa ded//
115b6(mdo 'grel): dran pa stong shing 'du shes mi gsal ba dang/ de bzhin du rims kyi shugs kyis gzir cing rims nad kyi shugs ltag par skye ba ltar byed pa dang/ khros shing 'brugs pa lta bu'i tshul du sdang mig gis lta bar byong ba dang
115b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du bshad pa yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad dang rlung gi sgra dang bcas pa sman bag tu shugs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /lus ni yang zhing rgya dang rmong bag tsha ba med/ /kha na mtheng bu 'byung dang dbang po rtas gzhi de//
116a1(mdo 'grel): yid ni sor gnas rdul sbring bder 'byung yi ge 'byed/ /mgo bo g.ya' ba rims nad byad pa'i mtshan ma yin/ zhes bya ba la/ mtshan ma de dag gi rjes la rims nad byang ba nyid
116a2(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni lus yang par 'gyur zhing/ khong lci ba'i bag med pa dang lus rmya ba dang/ rmong bag dang tsha ba med pa ste/ rmya zhing nyam chung ba dang/ rmod bag gis 'du shes stor ba dang/ tsha zhing rno bar gyur pa'i
116a3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa dang dral bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du kha'i nang du thor bu smin pa phra mo 'byung ba dang/ mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams rtas shing rang gi las kyi bya ba bde blag tu byed par nus pa dang/ lus bde zhing nad kyi tshor ba
116a4(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ yid so la gnas pa dang/ sems kyi rang bzhin sngon chad snying stobs la sogs pa gang gi shas che ba de/ de bzhin du ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du rdul dang sbrid pa bde blag tu thon cing 'byung ba dang/
116a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du bkres shing zas la 'dod ba skye ba'i yi ga 'bye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ mgo bo g.ya' zhing 'khrug 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni rims nad byang ba'i stags sam mtshan ma yin no// //
116a6(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// //
116a7(mdo 'grel): de nas khrag dang mkhris pa dang lud pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o /zhes bya ba la/ rims kyi tsha ba la khrag mkhris skye bar 'gyur bar bshad pas de'i phyir de myur du gsod pa yin pas rims kyi nad gzhi'i le'u'i 'og tu/
116b1(mdo 'grel): khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad gzhi brtsams pa yin no/ /lud pa yang khrag dang mkhris pa dang 'dra bar gnod pa myur du skyes pa yin pas de yang le'u 'dir bshad pa yin no/ /rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur/ /lan tsha la sogs tsha pa
116b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /khre rgod ud ba la yi zas/ /de bcas shin tu bsten drags dang/ /mkhris pa can gyi mkhris nad ni/ /gsher dang khrag rgyas nad du 'gyur/ /de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur pas/ /lus kun khyab par byed par
116b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ zas dang spyod lam shin tu dro zhing tsha ba'i shas che ba dang/ rab tu rno zhing drags pa dang/ skyur pa'i ro shas cher bsten pa dang/ lan tsha'i de la sogs pa ro rno ba'i shas cher bsten ba dang/
116b4(mdo 'grel): tsha bag la gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du khre rgod la sogs pa'i zas brten bar drags shing shas che ba dang/ yang de bzhin du cha zhing rno ba la sogs pa mkhris pa skyed pa'i kha zas skoms tshad las lhag par bsten cing zos
116b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i mkhris pa'i nang gsher ba dang/ khrag gi nad rgyas shing ldang bar 'gyur la/ khrag dang mkhris pa de gnyis phan tshun gcig la gcig 'dres shing gcig bur gyur pa dang/ khrag gi mdog can nyid du gyur nas
116b6(mdo 'grel): lus mgo nas rkang gi bar du ma lus bar kun khyab cing byed par 'gyur ba yin no/ /mkhris pa khrag las gyur pa dang/ /'dres dang gnod bya las kyang gcig /mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas/ /khrag gi ming du bstan
116b7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa gang yin pa de khrag gi ming du bstan te/ khrag dang mkhris pa gso ba las/ khrag ni thur song zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa'i tshul gyis de'i ming du 'gyur ba yin te/ /
117a1(mdo 'grel): gang gi phyir mkhris bzhi khrag las gyur pa yin zhing khrag las skyes pa yin no/ /de yang gzhung 'di nyid las/ gang mkhris dri ma bu ga ru/ rdul dang sen mo ba spu dang/
117a2(mdo 'grel): snum dang mig dang pags pa tshil/ rims bzhin lus zungs dri ma yin/ zhes smos pa yin pas na/ /de'i phyir khrag gi rnyigs ma ni mkhris pa yin la/ /de bzhin du 'dres pa ste/ gcig la gcig cha 'dras
117a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnad dang/ de bzhin du gnod bya las 'byung ste/ gang gi phyir mkhris pa nyid kyis myur du gnod par 'gyur ba yin la/ /de bzhin du khrag gis mkhris pa la gnod par gyur pa yin te/ de la gnas pa'i
117a4(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /de yang gzhung 'di nyid las/ /'phel dang zad? par bya ba'i sman/ /gcig gi gang yin de gzhan yin/ zhes bshad pa yin no/ /mdog dang dri yang de gnyis rjes su mthun pas yin te/ mkhris pa de ni/
117a5(mdo 'grel): kha dog dang dri yang khrag dang brjes su mthun pas de'i phyir/ mkhris pa dang dri dang kha dog khrag dang mtshungs pas khrag gi ming bstan cing bshad pa yin no/ /de ni khrag gnas mchin pa dang mcher ba las ni 'byung bar
117a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ khrag dang mkhris pa de gnyis ni khrag gi gnas te/ khrag dang mkhris pa rgyu ba'i rtsa sdubs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du mchin pa dang mtshor ba yang khrag gi gnas yin pas de gnyis
117a7(mdo 'grel): las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo bo lci zhing yig mchus/ /bsil 'dod skregs pa dung can skyur/ /skyug cing skyug mdog brtsog pa snang/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor/ /khong snyom khrag dmar nya dri bro/ /kha dri mi
117b1(mdo 'grel): zhim skad 'gags la/ mig la sogs pa'i kha dog ni/ /dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang/ /rmi lam du yang kha dog de/ /'dir ni mthong? par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad 'di phyis 'byung bar 'gyur
117b2(mdo 'grel): na/ /nad kyi snga 'byung pa'i tshul mgo bo lci ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo bo lci ba ni dang po mgo mi theg pa snyam du sems pa'o/ /sgregs pa du ba can ni sgregs pa du ba ltar dku ba 'byung ba'o/ /skyur ba ni sgregs pa'i
117b3(mdo 'grel): ro skyur pag tu 'byung ba'o/ /skyug pa ni slon pa'o/ /skyugs pa'i mdog btsog pa ni kha dog mi sdug pa dang/ dri nga pa dang/ ro mi zhim par snang pa'o/ /gzhan ni go bar zad do/ /khrag de nya dmar po lo hi ta zhes bya ba'i dri ltar shin tu
117b4(mdo 'grel): dri mnan pa 'am/ khrag nyid kyi mdog dmar la drid bar snang ba dang/ kha'i dri mi zhim zhing mnan pa sngar byung ba'i tshul las de shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du skad 'gags shing subs pa dang/ de bzhin du mig
117b5(mdo 'grel): dang pags pa dang/ gdong dang lce dang bshang ba dang/ gcin la sogs la kha dog dmar ba dang/ dus pa ltar ljang ba dang/ ser por snang ba las shes par bya la/ yang de bzhin du rmi lam gyi nang du yang kha dog
117b6(mdo 'grel): dmar po dang ljang khu dang/ ser por mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /stod du sna min rna ba kha/ /smad bshang sko dang pho mo'i mtshan/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang/ /khrag rab rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/
117b7(mdo 'grel): khrag dang mkhris pa nad de stod du sna dang mig dang rna ba dang kha'i sgo 'dun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ smad du bshad sgo dang pho mtshan dang mo mtshan te/ bu ga gsum las 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du ba spu'i
118a1(mdo 'grel): bu ga ma lus pa kun las kyang 'byung ste/ rdul 'byung ba'i rtsa sgo thams cad las kyang 'byung ba ste/ khrag rgyas pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i sgo ni de dag yin no/ /stod kyi bad kan yin
118a2(mdo 'grel): gso sla/ /de bzhin bkru sman btang pos gso/ /sman mad yod cing mkhris pa yi/ /sman gyi mchog ni bklu sman yin/ /zla la yod pa'i bad kan kyang/ /der ni de yis sbyang byas 'gyur/ /'di la sman ni mngar der bska/ /
118a3(mdo 'grel): bad kan can dag la phan na/ /gang ldog gang gis bad kan sel/ /kha dang bska ba smos ci dgos/ /zhes bya ba la/ stod kyi cha byung ba'i bad kan dang mkhris pa gang yin pa de ni bad kan rgyas pa las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir/
118a4(mdo 'grel): gso sla zhing bcos par sla ba yin la/ de yang bkru sman btang bas lam bsgyur te gso dgos pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sman yang med du yod pa ste/ sman ro mngar ba dang kha ba dang bska ba rnams phan pa'i phyir ro/ /yang stod
118a5(mdo 'grel): du 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris la mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i sman bya ba ni sman gyi mchog yin te/ stod du 'byung ba'i khrag dang mkhris pa'i zla ba bad kan yod pa de bkru sman byas pa gang yin pa des sbyar zhing dag par 'gyur
118a6(mdo 'grel): ro/ /bad kan sbyangs shing dag pa'i mas bu 'di la sman mngar ba rnams kyi khu ba la sogs pa rnams kyang bad kan la phan pa yin te/ don du bad kan la gnod pa'i mngar ram/ bad kan la phan par gyur na bad
118a7(mdo 'grel): kan 'ba' zhig yod pa de la rang bzhin gyis bad kan sel bar byed pa'i sman kha ba dang bska ba dag byin na phan par 'gyur zhing bsngags pa yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos thur du 'byung ba rlung yin/ /de na skyug sman btang
118b1(mdo 'grel): bas gso?/ /mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung ba yin/ /skyug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin/ /zla la yod pa'i rlung nad kyang/ /de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur/ /de ni ro ni mngar bskol pa/ /'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin/ zhes
118b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ thur du 'byung zhing ro smad kyi lam nas 'bab pa'i khrag dang mkhris pa ni rlung nad shes che ba las byung ba'i phyir/ /de ni gso ba tsam du byas pa las gtan bsal bar dka' ba yin la/ de yang skyug sman btang bas gso
118b3(mdo 'grel): zhing slon du gzhugs pa ni de'i gso ba yin no/ /khrag dang mkhris pa de ni sman shin tu nyung ba yin zhing mngar ba 'ba' zhig gis gso dgos pa yin la/ lam bsgyur ba'i skyugs sman btang  ba de ni mkhris pa'i sman gyi mchog
118b4(mdo 'grel): kyang ma yin la/ zla ba yod pa'i rlung nad gzhan du dbang du byed pa de yang skyug sman gyis zhi bar mi 'gyur la/ /'og tu 'bab pa'i khrag dang mkhris pa de la ni/ /snga sman ro mngar ba dang bskal ba la sogs phan pa
118b5(mdo 'grel): yin gyi/ kha ba'i sman khu ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te/ de rnams kyi rlung skyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa yin/ /gnyi gar 'byung ba las so dkar ste/ /bzlog par yangs ni mad phyir dang/ /
118b6(mdo 'grel): sman yang yod pa ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba la/ khrag dang mkhris pa gang bad kan dang/ 'dres pa'i nad las byung bar gyur nas lus kyi stod dang lus kyi smad gnyis kar 'byung ba de ni shin tu bcos par dka' ba yin
118b7(mdo 'grel): te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzlog par mi nus pa yin te/ de'i phyir bzlog cing nad kyi lam bsgyur nas bcas pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir dang/ /de bzhin du de lta bu'i nad 'tsham zhing gnyi ga las mi 'byung ba'i sman yod pa
119a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin pas/ gsor mi rung ba yin no/ /'di las bzlog par bya ba'i thabs/ /sbyangs pa'ang yod pa ma yin no/ /spyad pas bzlog par bya ba dang/ sman pa khrag mkhris
119a2(mdo 'grel): gso ba yin/ zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir khrag dang mkhris ga'i nad rgyas te byung ba 'di la smyung pa bya ba sman dpyad kyi thabs yin na/ spyang ba des na gang zhig btang na gnyi ga nas 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris bad kan blud
119a3(mdo 'grel): 'dres par gyur pa de dus gcig tu 'am gzhan du khrid cing sel par byed pa de lta bu'i bzlog par bya ba'i thabs su gyur pa'i spyad pa gang yang yod pa ma yin la/ khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad la ni spyad pas mi mthun par bzlog
119a4(mdo 'grel): cing lam bsgyur ba nyid kyis sman pas btsos dgos na/ lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba bde ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir thur du 'bab pa las bltos te/ skyug sman btang na ni stong du 'byung ba bzlog par
119a5(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur la/ stod du 'byung ba las ltos te bkru sman btang na ni thur du 'byung ba'i ma zlogs pas btsos pa'i thabs med pa yin no/ /mkhris pa nye bar zhi ba yang 'di la yod ye yod ma yin 'dres par gyur pa'i nad la ni/ /
119a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad sel ba'i zhi bya phan/ zhes bya ba la/ 'di la spyad pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs rnam pa thams cad du med pa de bzhin du zhi bar bya ba'i thabs kyang yod pa ma yin te/ gal te stod du 'byung ba bad kan dang 'brel
119a7(mdo 'grel): pa la ldan par gyur? pa kha dang bska ba la sogs pa'i sman btang na ni/ de rlung la gnod pas thur du 'byung pa'i 'phel par 'gyur la/ gang smad du byung ba'i rlung las gyur pa la phan pa sman mngar ba byin na ni/ de bad kan
119b1(mdo 'grel): la gnod pas stod du 'byung ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris 'di la ni spyad pa dang 'dra bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs kyang yod ye rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no/ /de yang gang gi phyir
119b2(mdo 'grel): nad 'dres par gyur cing phyogs gcig tu gnas 'khya ba gcig rtsom par 'gyur ba'i nad la ni thams cad sel ba ste/ nad gzhi gsum tshar sel ba'i zhi bar bya ba phan pa yin na/ stod smad kyi lam gnyis ka nas 'byung ba'i khrag dang
119b3(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa la ni nad gzhi gsum char sel bar 'gyur ba'i sman yod pa ma yin te/ nad gzhi gsum tha dad par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de la nad dang rjes mthun pa'i/ /gtar ga gtab ste brtag par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ khrag
119b4(mdo 'grel): dang mkhris pa'i nad de la ni gtar ka btab ste khrag phyung la/ khrag 'di ni rlung 'khrugs pa yin no/ /'di ni mkhris pa 'khrugs pa yin no/ /'di ni bad kan 'khrugs pa'o/ /'di ni 'dres pa 'am ldan pa 'am 'khrug pa'o/ /'di ni 'dus pa las
119b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yin no/ /zhes gtar gas bton pa'i khrag nyid las brtag par bya ste/ rlung khrag gnag dang dmar dang rtsub ces bya ba la sogs pas ni rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag mnam zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mkhris
119b6(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa dang/ bad kan khrag ni 'jam la skya zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bad kan las gyur pa nas/ nyes gsum dri ma rnyog pa can zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'dres pa dang 'dus pa las gyur par shes par bya'o/ /
119b7(mdo 'grel): bla gnyen byung bar gyur pa dang/ /'gyur ba shes las rtogs par bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ khrag dang mkhris par? bla gnyan byung bar gyur pa dag ni/ lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u las//
120a1(mdo 'grel): khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar/ /yang na gnag pa 'am tshon rtsa nam?/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa las rtogs par bya'o/ /de la lud pa myur gnod med/ /de phyir de nyid bshad par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ nad de rnams kyi nang nang nas lud pa ni
120a2(mdo 'grel): gnod pa myur du skyed cing khyad par du mi bde bar byed pa yin pas/ de'i phyir lud par ri mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa bshad par bya'o/ /lud pa rlung mkhris bad kan dang/ /glo rdol glo gcod las lngar bshad/ ces bya ba la/ /lud pa ni rlung las
120a3(mdo 'grel): gyur ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yod do/ /zhes lha'i mig dang ldan pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do/ /thams cad ma gsos zad byed 'gyur/ phyi ma bzhin du stobs chen yin/ zhes bya ba la/ lud ba de dag thams cad gsos shing btang
120a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms su gzhag na mthar zad byed kyi glo gcod chen por 'gyur ba 'am mthar 'chi gnyid du 'gyur la/ lud pa de rnams kyang phyi ma bzhin da? globs cha ste rlung gi lud pa las ni mkhrig pa'i lud pa stobs che la/ de bas ni bad kan gyi lud ba stobs che
120a5(mdo 'grel): de bas ni glo brdol ba'i lud pa stobs che/ de bas ni glo gcod zad byed kyi lud pa stobs che zhing shugs drag pa yin no/ /de rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags/ /gra ba g.ya' zhing yi ga chus/ /gre nad gra mas gang snyam sems/ zhes bya ba la/
120a6(mdo 'grel): lud par rnams phyis 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye ba la sogs pa'i rtags sam mtshan ma ni ga ba g.ya' zhing yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ba dang/ gre ba'i nad thams cad nas gyi gra mas gang ba snyam du sems shing rtsab? pa'i gyur ro/ /de la thad
120a7(mdo 'grel): rgyu'i blud gnod 'gyur rtod du rdzo? ste brang du phyin/ /de tshe mgul pa'i nang du zhe na/ /mgo bo'i rtsa rnams ba gang nas ni/ /de nas yan lag 'debs pa ltar/ /g.yangs byed mig rdol tsam du na/ /rgyab brang rtsib logs ni zhing zug /kha ru byung 'di rgyud na
120b1(mdo 'grel): lud ba snod chag 'dra'i sgra 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ de la lud pa thams cad la thur du rgyu ba'i rlung gnod pa dang bcas shing/ thur du 'byung du ma ster bas de stong du song ste/ brang du phyin par gyur pa la/ de tshe de'i shugs brgal ba la/ mgul ba yan chad kyi bar du zhen
120b2(mdo 'grel): cing/ gnas nas mgo bo'i rtsa sgo rnams nas zhugs te/ gnas de dag bkang zhing khyab par byed la/ de nas de'i 'og tu lus kyi yan lag rnams gyen du bskyod cing 'degs pa ltar byed pas rnam par g.yengs par byed la/ de bzhin du yig gnyis phyung zhing rdol brtsam
120b3(mdo 'grel): du na ba dang/ rgyab dang brang dang rtsib logs kyi phyogs rnams kyang na zhing zug pa dang bcas pas rlung de'i kha'i sgong rgyu zhing 'byung bar byed de/ de'i tshe lud ba snod chags pa'i sgra 'byung zhing khar phog gcig pa'i sgra dang bcas pa 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi
120b4(mdo 'grel): dbye bas nad kyang ni/ /tha dad shugs dang bcas pa yin/ /nang gang sgra ni mi snyoms pa/ de lus lud pa 'byung ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi'i rgyu'i bye brag gi dbye bas rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir lud pa'i nad kyang rnam pa tha dad cing/ /rlung de shugs sam stobs dang
120b5(mdo 'grel): bcas pa yin la/ des na lus po'i nad gang yin pa'i sgra yang mi snyoms shing/ /sgra che ba la sogs pas lud pa de 'byung ba yin no/ /de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ de la rlung ni rang bzhin gyi shugs dang bcas pa yin la/ shugs de yang rgyu sna tshogs
120b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbang gis che ba 'am/ chung bar 'gyur la/ gang de dang phrad pa'i sgra yang rgyu'i khyad par gyis dbang gis gnod sna tshogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /rlung nad skyed pa rlung 'khrugs pa/ /brang dang gre ba kha skams shing/ /snying brang rtsib logs klad pa
120b7(mdo 'grel): bzer/ /rlod bag khong 'khrugs skad 'gags shing/ /lud pa sam po 'byung byed cing/ na ba'i shugs drag sgra cher 'byung/ /lus kun brtse bcas bad kan skam/ /'thon par dka' zhing nyung du 'byung zhes bya ba la/ /rlung nad skyed par byed pa'i kha zas
121a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ spyod lam cu? bcing grang pa la sogs pa bsten pa dang/ lam dang bud med la sogs pas dub pa dag gis rlung nad de'i 'khrugs shing ldang par gyur na brang dang gre ba dang/ kha shin tu skams par byed pa dang/ snying gal? sogs
121a2(mdo 'grel): par gzer bar byed pa dang/ lud pa skam po bad kan dang mchil snabs med par 'byung bar byed ba dang/ de bzhin du rna ba'i tsha bas che ba dang/ shugs 'byung ba drag po dang/ sgra chen po 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin no/ /yang lud pa don lus
121a3(mdo 'grel): dang yan lag brtse ba dang bcas pa dang/ bad kan nam ma ni la snabs nang nas 'thon pa shin tu dga' bas 'byung zhing nyung zhig 'byung ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las mig bad kan ser/ /kha nang kha zhing rims mgol bor/? /khrag khris slon zhing
121a4(mdo 'grel): skom dad tshe/ /skad 'gags dur 'dra skyur ba dang/ /lud pa'o shugs kyi rgyun 'byung ba/ /skad mnga' 'phro ba lta bur snang ngo/ /zhes bya ba la/ lud pa mkhris pa las gyur pa las ni mig? ser dang/ /bad kan 'byung ba ser bar 'byung ba dang/
121a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du kha'i nang khra bro ba dang/ rims la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang lud pa dud pa 'dra ba 'byung zhing dri skyur ba 'byung ba dang/ lud pa 'byung ba'i shugs kyi rgyun rtag tu 'byung zhing shes mda'i tshogs 'phro ba ltar mthong bar
121a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur pa'am rma bya'i sgra ltar/ kha dog sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan las brang nad tsha bas chung/ /mig lce snying ga gang snyam sems/ /gre bar bskus 'dra snyom par byed/ /cham 'debs zas skyug yi ga 'chus/ /spu brtse lud pa skam
121a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /snum zhing dkar ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ brang du zug cing na ba dang/ na ba'i tsha bas chung ba dang/ mgo bo lci zhing bem bem por 'dug ba dang/ snying ga mer mer por gdab snyam du sems
121b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ gre bar chags shing 'dam pa bsgus pa snyam du sems ba dang/ lus dang yan lag snyom zhib lti ba dang/ cham bas 'debs pa dang/ kha zas skyug cing bslon pa dang/ sra?  bshor zhing rtse ba dang/ lud pa skam pa dang/ snum pa dang/ dkar bar 'byung ba ni
121b2(mdo 'grel): bad kan gyi mtshan nyid yin no/ /stobs 'gyed la sogs drag shul rnams/ /mi nus bzhin du byas dang de/ rlung gis brang nas glo dral la/ mkhris pa rjes 'brangs dkyal gyur pa/ /'khrugs te lud pa lu bar byed/ /des ni bad kan khrag bcas pa? dang
121b3(mdo 'grel): sar zhing gnag la skam ba dang/ /ril ril po mnam mang du 'byung/ /'byung che gra ba na ba dang/ brang ni dral ba snyam du sems/ khab ni rnon pos phug ltar sems/ /gzer gyis 'debs por byed pa dang/ /tshigs 'byi mas dang dbugs mi bde/ /skad
121b4(mdo 'grel): 'gags lus 'dad? skom dad che/ /phug ron lta bur 'khum 'byin no/ /rtsibs logs gzer gyur de nas na/ /rims kyis stobs dang me drod dang/ /nus pa nyams shing 'bri bar 'gyur/ /zad byed kyis gcin khrag dang bcas/ /rgyab dang
121b5(mdo 'grel): rkang pa na bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ stobs 'gyed pa ni lag stobs 'gyed cing rtsal spyod pa la sogs pa'o/ /la sogs pa zhes smos pas ni/ /bud med bsten drag pa dang/ khur dang las kyis dub pa dang/ glang po che dang rta 'dul ba la
121b6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i drag shul rnams mi nus bzhin du byas pa dag bsdu'o/ /de ltar stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i drag shul mi nus bzhin du nan gyis rtsom par byed bsten par byas pa'i rgyu rnam pa mang po de dang des rlung 'brugs pas brang gi nang
121b7(mdo 'grel): gi gla dral zhing gtses par byed pa yang rlung de na bris pa 'bres zhing/ mkhris pa rjes su 'brangs ba zla la yod na de skyobs skye zhing dkyel du gyur pas lud pa lu bar byed pa yin no/ /de nas lud par bad kan khrag dang bcas pa
122a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ kha dog ser ba dang/ rtsa gnag pa dang/ skam zhing ljan ljin med pa dang/ ril ril por gnas la/ mnam pa dag mang du 'byung zhing/ slon la 'byung ba'i tsha gre ba'i nang na zhing gzer ba dang bcas pa'o/ khrang ni phyogs dral zhing
122a2(mdo 'grel): bshags pa snyam du sems pa dang/ yang brang de nyid khab rnon pos phug cing bcags pa snyam du sems pa dang/ gzer nad kyis 'debs pa dang/ ji lta bu'i tshul du 'byung zhe na/ tshigs bye ba snyam du sems pa la sogs pa'i gnod ba dang bcas
122a3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba dang/ yang de bzhin du phug ron ltar sgra mi gsal ba'i tshig tu 'khun 'byin pa dang/ rtsib logs kyi phyogs gzer ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lud pa can gyi skyes bu de dus kyi rims kyis lus kyi stobs la
122a4(mdo 'grel): 'bri bar 'gyur ro/ /de la stobs ni khu chu'o/ /me drod ni zas 'ju zhing smin par byed pa'i tho ba'i med do/ /nus pa ni nyams stobs so/ /de gzer cing nyams bas cir 'gyur zhe na/ gcin khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyab dang rkang ba mi
122a5(mdo 'grel): bzad par na bar 'gyur ro/ /gtso bo rlung ni 'khrugs pa yi/ /lus zungs zad byed nad rgyal po/ /glo gcong gi ni gnas byed yin/ /lud pa lu zhing bad kan 'byung/ /rnag 'dra mnam zhing ser ba dang/ /rul zhing rtsa sdro dmar ba dang/ /rtsib le
122a6(mdo 'grel): slogs gton pa ltar sems shing/ /snying ni lhung la snyam du byed/ /rgyu mang dro dang drang pa 'dod/ /zas mang za zhing nyams stobs zad/ /bzhin ni snum zhing dang bar snang/ /mig ni mdangs ldan lta sdug 'gyur/ /de nas de la zad bye 'gyur/ thams cad
122a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ glo gcong dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la ni rlung gtso bor gyur pas/ 'og nas bshad pa'i glo gcong gi nang gyi rgyu rnams kyis 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la/ des lus zungs rnams zad par byas nas
122b1(mdo 'grel): nad kyi rgyal po zang byed dam/ glo gcong zhes bya ba'i gnas dang gzhir byung la/ /rgyu des na lud ba lu gar 'gyur ro/ /de nas skyes bu de bad kan 'byung zhing slon par phal cher rnag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtsib logs bton pa ltar
122b2(mdo 'grel): sems pa ni gnas de dag bskul zhing phyung ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /yang de bzhin du snying ga ltung ba snyam du byed pa ste/ glo gcong gi lud pa can de snying gnas nas ltung zhing 'byung ba snyam byed pa dang/ rgyu med par glo bu? ? tsha ba dang/ grang bar 'dod cing rten pa
122b3(mdo 'grel): dga' bar byed de/ grang bas nyen pa mang bar dro ba 'dod pa dang/ tsha bas nyen pa med par grang zhing bsril ba 'dod par 'gyur ba dang/ kha zas mang du zos su zin kyang nyams stobs 'bri zhing chung bar 'gyur ba dang/ bzhin ras snum zhing chung zad dang pa dang ldan/
122b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ mig mdangs dang ldan zhing lta na sdug pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lud pa can gyi skyes bu de la zad byed kyi tshul thams cad de gcod chen po'i mtshan nyid ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar glo rdol las byung lang
122b5(mdo 'grel): nyam chung lus ni 'jig byed de/ stobs ldan gso ba tsam du rung/ glo gcod las byung de dag 'dra/ /zhes bya ba la/ sdang bshad pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar na/ glo rdol pa las byung ba'i lud pa ni 'di ni skyes bu nyam chung zhing stobs zad pa'i lus 'jig cing 'joms
122b6(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa yin la/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa la ni re zhig gso ba tsam du rung ba yin no/ /glo gcod las byung ba'i lud pa yang glo rdol gyi lud pa dang tshul 'dra ba yin no/ /de gnyis gsar byung mgon ldan 'grub/ /glo rdol ba dang glo bcod las byung ba'i lud pa
122b7(mdo 'grel): da gnyis gsar du byung zhing nad kyis btab nas ring po ma lon pa yang yin na/ /mgon dang ldan pa de gso ba'i yan lag bzhi char ldan pas legs par gsos na 'grub cing 'chor rung ba yin no/ /nad gzhi tha dad gsum gsor rung/ zhes bya ba la/ lud pa de dag
123a1(mdo 'grel): gi nang nas nad gzhi tha dad pa'i lud ba rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan las byung ba ni gsar rung ba yin no/ /gnyis 'dres kun kyang rgan po ni/ /na tshod zad btab 'tsho ba tsam/ zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i
123a2(mdo 'grel): lud pa gang yin pa ni gso ba tsam du byar rung ba yin la/ yang lud pa gsor rung bar bshad ba/ nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba dag kyang mig na? ba la byung zhing/ na tshod dengs shing zad pa la btab na/ re zhig gso ba tsam du byar rung ba yin na/ /lud
123a3(mdo 'grel): ba yal bar bor ba las/ /dbugs mi bde ba dang zad sbyad? so/ skad 'gags la sogs nad 'byung 'gyur/ /de phyir de ni myur du gso/ /zhes bya ba la/ gang gi phyir lud ba yal bar 'or zhing ma bcos pa las/ dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad
123a4(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ /de'i phyir lud ba gsar ba de myur du gas zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par bya'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel ba/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par
123a5(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o// //de nas dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bus btab pa'i nad bzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te/ dbugs mi bde ba ni
123a6(mdo 'grel): lud pa las 'byung ste/ 'di nyid las lud pa 'phel ba las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar gzhung rtsom pas bshad pa yin no/ /de bas na 'di'i 'og tu dbugs mi bde pa'i nad gzhi bshad pa yin la/ skyigs bu yang de'i rkyen gyis 'byung bas dbugs
123a7(mdo 'grel): mi bde ba'i zhar la skyigs bu yang bshad pa yin no/ /lud ba 'phel ba 'am ? nad gzhi/ 'khrugs las dbugs mi bde 'byung 'gyur/ /ma zhu tshad 'khrug slon dug 'thungs/ /skyabs rbab rims btab las kyang 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ lud pa la 'phel ba
123b1(mdo 'grel): ni lud ba shad cher rgyas pa ste/ de las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad pa'i skabs su sngar bshad pa'i nad gzhi kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang dro ba'i bag zos ba las nad gzhi 'khrugs bas dbugs mi bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur
123b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pa las dbugs mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs mun can chad pa dang/ /chen po gyen 'byung rnam pa lnga/ zhes bya ba la/ dbugs mi bde ba ni phran tshegs la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yod de
123b3(mdo 'grel): bad kan gyis ni rgyun lam bkag rlung ni sna tshogs khyab par gnas/ srog dang zas skom rgyu ba'i lam/ /spu gu nad kyis bkag pa nas/ ma zhu'i gnas nas 'byung ba'i dbugs/ /brang nas dbugs mi bde bar byed/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung gang bad kan gyis rgyu ba'i lam
123b4(mdo 'grel): gyi sgo bkag nas/ rlung de sna tshogs par thams cad du khyab ste/ gnas nas ldang bar 'byung la/ yang rlung de srog la sogs pa rgyu pa'i lam gyi bu ga nad kyis 'khrugs par byas pas ma zhu ba'i gnas nas byung ba'i dbugs gang yin pa de brang na gnas
123b5(mdo 'grel): 'di? bsten nas dbugs mi bde bar byed pa yin no/ /nga yi? sngon tshul snying rtsib logs / /gzer zhing srog rlung mi mthun rgyu/ /spos dang mur 'gram na ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ de'i sngon tshul ni dbugs de'i sngar byung ba'i nad kyis lam rtags ni/ snying ga
123b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa gzer ba dang/ srog ces bya ba'i rlung mi mthun pa rgyu zhing phyin ci log tu 'gro ba dang/ lto spos pa dang mur 'gram gnyis su na zhing zug par 'gyur ba yin no/ /der ni drag shul? 'drangs drags pa/ /bskyod pa'i rngam pa phran tshegs 'gyur/ /de ni
123b7(mdo 'grel): ?? nyid zhi bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ de la dbugs mi bde ba rnams kyi nang nas phran tshegs mi drag shul la sogs pas bskyod pa'i rlung las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la drag shul ni lus dub par byed pa'i las khur 'degs pa la sogs pa'o/ /'drangs drags
124a1(mdo 'grel): pa ni chad las lhag par mang du zos pa'o/ /de dag gis bskyod pa ni ldang bar byed pa ste/ de lta bu'i rngam pa ni phran tshegs yin la/ chung ngu phran tshegs de ni gso ba'i sman dpyad mi dgos par dus cung zad cig ngal bso ba tsam gyis rang
124a2(mdo 'grel): nyid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang gis rtsa spubs log rgyu byed/ /bad kan slongs par gyur nas ni/ /klad pa mgul pa'i nad song ste/ /grang dang? rtsibs logs na bar byed/ /lud pa'i ngar sgra 'dzer mi dran/ /cham pa mi zad yi ga 'chus/ /mi zad shugs ni skyed
124a3(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /dbugs mi bde ba de'i shugs kyis/ srog la gnod 'gyur lud pa'i mthar/ /skad cig bde bar byed pa yin/ nyal che shin tu mi bde la/ /'dug na cung zad bde bar brgyud/ /mig gdangs dbral ba'i phyogs nas ni/ /rdul 'dzag shin
124a4(mdo 'grel): tu na bas nyen/ /kha skams dbugs zhe btung mar 'byung/ /dro ba 'dod cing 'dar dang bcas/ /char 'bab grang dang bse rus phog /bad kan skyed pas rnam par 'phel/ /mun can de ni 'tsho bya tsam/ /nyams ldan gsar du btab gso sla/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung mi
124a5(mdo 'grel): mthun ba rgyu zhing rtsa'i sbubs su log par rgyu bar byed pa na/ /des bad kan slongs shing stong du bskyod par 'gyur ba dang/ klad pa dang mgul pa'i nang du song zhing kun tu khyab ste/ brang dang rtsibs logs na zhing gzer bar byed nas lud ba la sogs pa'i shugs
124a6(mdo 'grel): mi bzad par skyod par byed do/ /dbugs mi bde ba yang shugs mi bzad pas srog la gnod cing 'tsho bar byed de/ gang gis sreg ces bya ba'i rlung la gnod cing gzer bar byed pa ni srog la gnod pa'i dbugs mi bde ba zhes bya'o/ /yang na srog ni 'tsho ba'i
124a7(mdo 'grel): dbang po 'am stobs pa bya la/ /de dbugs mi bde ba'i shugs kyis gnod par byas nas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /lud pa'i mdza' ni bad kan dang/ stabs? la sogs pa 'dor ba'i mthar skad cig gam thad cig tsam gyi bar du bde bar gnas par byed pa
124b1(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /yang de ni mal na gnas shing nyal ba'i tshe shin tu mi bde zhing sdug bsngal bas dbugs 'phyin par byed pa yin la/ de nas langs te tsog tsog pa la sogs pa'i tshul du 'dug na cung zad bde zhing shugs ngal ba yin no/ /mig gang bas pa ni gyen
124b2(mdo 'grel): du blta ba'o/ /dpral ba'i phyogs dam rdul 'jag pa ni rdul 'byung zhing dri ma rlan can 'dzag pa'o/ /shin tu mi bde nyen pas na gnag par dka' ba'i nad kyis nyam thag par 'gyur ro/ /kha skams pa ni khyad par du kha skams shing brlan ba med pa'o/ /yang de bzhi
124b3(mdo 'grel): du dbugs btung mar 'byung zhing yang du rtseg mar 'gyur ba dang/ dro ba'i bag yid la 'od cing rtan par dga' ba dang/ lus 'dar ba dang bcas pa yin no/ /yang dbugs mi bde ba de ni chad mi 'babs pa la sogs pa bad kan bked pa'i kha zas mang? ba spyod
124b4(mdo 'grel): lam gyis rnam par 'phel zhing dkyel skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mun pa can gyi dbugs mi bde ba de ni gso bar bya ba tsam yin la/ de nyams stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de la gsar du btab pa yin na ni gso sla ba yin no/ /rims dang brgyal las byung grang ba'i/ sman
124b5(mdo 'grel): gyis zhi ste rab mun can/ /zhes bya ba la/ dbugs mi bde ba mun pa can zhes bya ba de nyid gang gi tshe/ /rims dang brgyal ba las byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe grang zhing bsil ba'i sman dang kha zas kyis de zhi zhing bsal bar 'gyur ba de'i? tshe/ de la rab tu mun pa can zhes
124b6(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /dbugs chad dbugs 'byin rgyun chad pa'i/ /gnas gcod nad kyis gzar bar byed/ /rdul bcas brgyal dang spos dang bcas/ /lgang ba tsha zhing gcin 'gags byed/ /mig mi sdug cing thur du blta/ /mig gcig dmar zhing dran pa stor/ /bskams
124b7(mdo 'grel): smra? zhing skad gsangs dma'/ gzi mdangs nyams sems bral ba'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ dbugs rgyun chad pa zhes bya ba ni/ dbugs rgyun chad pa'i tshul gyis 'byin par byed kyi/ bar mi 'chad par mi byed par mi 'byin cing rdub ba ma yin pa dang/ gnad
125a1(mdo 'grel): gcod pa'i tshul gyis gzir cing nyam thag par byed pa dang/ rdul dang bcas par brgyal zhing de nyid sa dang ldan pa dang/ sdod smad du rlung rgyu ba 'gags pas spos pa dang bcas pa dang/ lgang ba tsha zhing chu sa'i phyogs lhag par tsha
125a2(mdo 'grel): bo dang/ gcin 'gags par byed pa dang/ mig mi sdug cing gcig tu song na mi gnas par gyur par byed pa dang/ thur du blta zhing sa la rtog pa dang/ mig gcig dmar bar snang ba dang/ dran pa stor zhing sems shas cher mi gsal ba dang/ /bskams
125a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ smre sngags kyi tshig tu smra ba dang/ skad gsangs dma' zhing zhum pa dang/ mdog dang gzi mdangs nyams shing yal ba dang/ sems dang bral zhing dran pa med pa yin no/ chen po nga ro cher 'byung zhing/ /sgra che rdur ba drag pa dang/ bskyod pa
125a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /khyu mchog rgyags pa'i ba ro 'dra/ /shes dang rnam shes rab nyams shing/ /mi 'khrul bzhin ni gyur pa dang/ ro snyong zhum par gyur pa dang/ /bshang gci 'gags shing skad gsangs nyams/ /mgul skams
125a5(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang mi smra/ /rna ba mur 'gram glad par na/ zhes bya ba la/ dbugs mi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'o/ dbugs rgyu ba chen po 'byung zhing nga ro chen po dang ldan pas dbugs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ sgra gsangs rab tu che ba dang/ rdur ba dra ba
125a6(mdo 'grel): pas sna nas 'byin pa byed pa dang/ bskyod cing 'gul ba bzhin du rngam pa drag par 'gyur zhing dbugs yi rtsom pa'i shugs g.yo ba dang bcas pa las byung ste/ khyu mchog rgyags pa lta bu'i dbugs rgyun du 'byung ba dang/ shes pa dang rnam
125a7(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i khyad par gang dag yod pa rab tu nyams par 'gyur pa ste shes pa ni khang chud pa'o/ /mkha' shes pa ni khyad par gyi shes pa ste/ de dag kyang nyams pa'o/ /gzhan yang mig 'khrul ba dang/ rang bzhin yongs su gyur cing
125b1(mdo 'grel): mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dang/ ro stong zhun zhing rnam par 'gyur pa dang ldan pas dbugs 'byin pa dang/ /de bzhin du bshang ba dang gci ba 'gags shing sri ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /gyen 'byung dbugs ni rang du 'byin/ /snyer
125b2(mdo 'grel): ni thur du rdung mi nus/ bad kan gyis/ brtse sgo 'gags/ /rlung ni 'khrugs pas gzir gyur pa/ /gyen du lta zhing 'khrul byed pas/ /mig ni kun tu lta byed pa/ /gnad rnams tshad par byed bzhin du/ /skad 'gags smre sngags 'don par byed/
125b3(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba la/ gyen du 'byung zhes bya ba'i dbugs mi bde ba las/ dbugs ring ba gyen du ring du 'byin cing gteng la/ dbugs de byung nas slar thur du rdub cing sdud par mi nus te/ yang nang du sdud par mi nus zhes bya ba'i don no/ /yang de'i
125b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa ni bad kan gyis kha dang rtsa'i sgo rnams 'gags shing bar mchod par byas pas rlung gnad 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur bas gzor cing shas cher gnod par byas pa dang mig gyen du blta zhing 'dags par byed la 'khrul zhing nor bal
125b5(mdo 'grel): bsgrags mig gis phan tshun kun tu blta zhing rtog par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du gnang rnams chad par 'gyur pa bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing ma thag pa'i smra sngags skad gsangs 'gags shing nang du 'dus par gyur pa'i tshul gyis smra
125b6(mdo 'grel): sngags 'don par byed do/ /'di dag ma chad gso rung la/ /tshang nangs par srog 'phrog byed ces bya ba la/ /dbugs mi bde ba 'di dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyid 'di dag ma rdzogs na gsor rung zhing bcos su 'dod pa yin la/ gal te
125b7(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gi rang rang gi mtshan nyid rdzogs shing tshad pa yin na ni nges par gdon mi za bar srog 'phrog cing 'tsho ba gcod par 'gyur pa yin no/ /dbugs mi bde rgyu sngon tshul dang/ grangs dang rang bzhin rten cig yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ de la skyigs
126a1(mdo 'grel): bu'i nad ni dbugs mi bde ba dang/ rgyu la sogs pa'i nad gcig yin te/ 'dir gcig ces bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i ming gi rnam grangs te/ des na skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba ni rgyu la sogs pa tshul 'dra bar 'gyur?
126a2(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /de yang lud ba'i rgyu ni lud ba 'phel ba 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/ /sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni snying rtse ba logs zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/ /de ltar na de dag thams cad tshul gcig cing 'dra ba yin par shes par
126a3(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ skyigs bu zang byung phran tshogs dang/ /zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang/ /za ba dag dang rnam pa lnga/ zhes bya ba la/ skyigs bu zas las byung ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas ming rnam pa lnga yin no/ /de la rlung gis rings zos dang/ /rtsub tsha sra
126a4(mdo 'grel): dad ma gas pa'i/ /zas dang skom gyis gcir gyur pa'i/ /rlung gis skyigs bu nad med dang/ /sgra mi drag cing sprid 'byung ste/ zhes bya ba la/ de la skyigs bu ni rlung gis bskyed par 'gyur la/ /de yang kha zas rings bag tu zos pa dang/ de bzhin
126a5(mdo 'grel): rtsub pa dang/ tshab dang sra ba'i bag zas zos pa dang/ sngon tshang ma goms shing ma bstan pa'i zas skom zos shing 'thungs pas brtsir cing bsdams par gyur pa'i rung gi skyigs bu'i rnam pa nad med cing sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba med pa sgra mi drag pa'i
126a6(mdo 'grel): rjes la sprid pa 'byung bar gyur pa'i skyigs bus 'debs par 'gyur te/ de ni zas las byung ba zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom gyis/ /zhi 'gyur skyigs bu zas byung yin/ zhes bya ba la/ yang skyigs bu gang sngar goms shing
126a7(mdo 'grel): bsnyen pa'i zas dang skom gang yang rung ba btang bas zhi zhing chad par 'gyur pa'i skyigs bu de ni zas las byung zhes bya'o/ /drag shul gyi rlung cung zad bskyed/ /skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nam tshor rtsa nas 'byung byed cing/ de ni shugs dal
126b1(mdo 'grel): 'jam pa yin/ /rtsol ba drag po 'phel 'gyur la/ /zas zos tsam gyis dal bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ drags shul gyi rtsol bas rlung cung zhig bskyod de skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur la/ /de yang nam nod rtsa ba nas 'byung zhing ldang 'gyur la/ de ltar chung ngu
126b2(mdo 'grel): bskyod pa las phran tshegs 'byung ba'i phyir skyigs bu de'i shul ngal zhing chabs chung la 'jam zhing shas cher na bar mi byed pa yin no/ /de yang rtsol ba drag po'i shugs pa sten pas ni 'phel bar 'gyur la/ kha zas gang yang rung ba zos pa tsam gyis ni
126b3(mdo 'grel): de'i mdo kho na la rgyud dal zhing shugs dul bar 'gyur ro/ /zung byung tshigs ni ring ba la/ /gang zhig zas la 'byung 'gyur ba/ /'ju bar nye ba'i tshon 'debs/ /zas zhu zin nas 'phel 'gyur ba'o/ /mgo dang mgul ba 'dar byed cing/ /spo zhing shin tu
126b4(mdo 'grel): skoms dang bskyed/ /bla dang slon dang tshad bar 'khru/ /mig gdangs glal ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyigs bu zung 'byung shugs drag pa/ /zhu dang bcas par de shes bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyigs bu zung du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ tshigs ring pos chod pa gang
126b5(mdo 'grel): shugs gnyis gnyis btung mar 'byung ba yin la/ de yang kha zas 'jug pa dang nye zhing smin pa la phyogs pa'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur la/ zas zhu zin nas ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gzhan yang skyig bus btab pa'i skyes bu'i mgo dang
126b6(mdo 'grel): mgul ba 'dar zhing bskyod par byed pa dang/ lto sbrel dang/ /skom dang shin tu skye zhing skom gyis gdungs pa dang/ glal la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/ skyigs bu zung du byung ba zhes bya ba de ni shul drag pa dang/ zhu ba'i chen 'byung bas na zhu ba dang bcas pa
126b7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar nges so/ /skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul/ /smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rangs shing/ /mig nas mchi 'jag har bar blta/ /lus rengs tshig ni thogs byed cing/ dran dang 'du shes 'khrul bar byang/ /mid pa'i sbub ni 'gag byed cing/ /gnad kyi
127a1(mdo 'grel): tshigs ni bskyod par byed/ /rgyab dgu lus ni khong skem byed/ /rtsa ba che zhing sgra cha la/ /nad tshabs che zhing stobs cher 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyigs bu chen po zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshul ni smin ma dang mur 'gram gnyis rengs
127a2(mdo 'grel): pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa la 'byung bar 'gyur te/ smin ma gnyis dang mur 'grus gnyis ni zhing bskyod mi shes pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ lus rengs shing bskyod mi shes par byang ba dang/ de bzhin du tshig thogs shing lkugs par byed
127a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ ngan pa dang 'du shes te dngos po ma brjod pa dang/ sems 'khrug cing nyams par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du zas rgyu ba'i lam med pa 'gags par dang/ snying la sogs pa'i gnas kyi tshogs bskyod cing g.yo bar byed pa dang/ rgyab
127a4(mdo 'grel): dgu zhing 'gyog pa dang/ lus kyi khong skems par byed pa yin la/ de ni rtsa ba che zhing rgyun ring ba dang/ sgra ched 'byung ba dang/ nad tshabs che zhing shugs drag pa dang/ stobs dang nus pa chen par 'byang ba yin pas nad ni chen po zhes bya'o/ /zhu ba'i
127a5(mdo 'grel): gnas sam lte ba gnas/ /snga ma 'dra bar gang zhing 'byung/ /de 'dra'i tshul ni bstung mar 'byung/ /glal dang rkang lag bya rmyangs byed/ khrag ca zab 'byung zab mo yin/ zhes bya ba la/ skyigs bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni zhu ba'i gnas mkhris pa'i
127a6(mdo 'grel): gnas bam lte ba'i 'og na sa 'byung bar byed la/ de yang 'byung zhing rgyu ba'i tshul ni skyigs bu chen po'i mtshan nyid ji skad bshad pa dang/ tshul 'bra bar 'byung zhing smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rangs shing/ rgyab sgu las ni khang skem byed/ /zhes bya ba'i
127a7(mdo 'grel): bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur la/ de bas kyang khyed par du de bstung mar 'byung zhing gleng ba dang/ bya rmyangs byed cing rkang lag skyod par byed pa dang khrag ca'i sga zab tu 'byung bar byed pas na 'di ming gi bza' ma zhes bya'o/ /de rnams
127b1(mdo 'grel): las ni dang ba yi/ /gnyis po sogs par bya ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ skyigs bu lnga pa de rnams las zas las byung ba dang/ phran tshegs zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu gnyis ni gso sla ba yin pas gso bar bya la/ tho ma'i gnyis dang zung phyung las mtshan nyid kun
127b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs drag shul spang/ /tha ma'i skyigs bu gnyis po dang/ skyigs bu chen po dang/ skyigs bu chen po dang/ skyigs bu zab mo bya ba gnyis ni spang bar la/ de bzhin zung du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skyigs bu rang gi mtshan nyid dam rtags kun rdzogs shing ma lus
127b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang ldan la/ shugs drags pa ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo/ /'di dag thams cad yun ring bsags/ /rgan pa bud med kyis du ba dang/ /nad kyis nyam chung zad bcad pa/ /gla rdol nang can spang bar bya/ zhes bya ba la/ skyigs bu 'di dag
127b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad yun ring du bsags shing rgyun ring por gnas pa dang/ mi rgan pa dang/ bud med la nyal po drags pas dub? pa dang/ nad kyis lus kyi nyam dmad cing stobs zab pa dang/ de bzhin du zas bcad cing smyur ba byas pa dang/ glo rdol
127b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad dang ldan pa la skyigs bus btab pa dang spang bar bya ste/ gso mi rung ngo/ /nad du na gyis 'chi byed mod kyi/ skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba ltar/ /nad gzhan myur gso 'chi mi byed/ 'di dag 'chi tshe ngas 'byung 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad
127b6(mdo 'grel): de lta bu dag ni skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ rims la sogs pa nad thams cad kyis kyang 'chi ba byed mod kyi/ /nad de dag las 'di gnyis kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te/ skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gnyis
127b7(mdo 'grel): kyis myur du gsod par byed pa de ltar nad kyi dngos po gzhan gyis myur du gsod cing 'chi bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir 'di gnyis ni 'chi zhing srog dang bral ba'i tshangs par gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /tshig 'di dag? gis
128a1(mdo 'grel): ni de gnyis myur du gso bar bstan pa yin no/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'brel ba/ tshig gis don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi
128a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i rnam par 'grol ba'o// //de nas glo gcod chen po zad byed kyi nang bzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ lung pa btang snyoms su bzhag cing ma bcos na dbugs mi bde ba dang zang byed 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas na/ de'i
128a3(mdo 'grel): phyir de'i 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin te/ glo gcod chen po zad ces bya ba ni/ ming gi rnam grangs/ /nad ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing/ /nad mang sngon pa smon du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po zad byed skam byed dang/ /nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang ba na ces
128a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ zad byed kyis rjes su nad du ma mang po zhig 'brang zhing rgyu bar byed la/ de bzhin du nad mang po sngon du 'gro zhing theg mar rgyu bas na/ nad de ni nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya zhing/ ming gi rnam grangs bzhi po gnod pa'i rgyal po dang/ zas byed dang skor byed
128a5(mdo 'grel): dang nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bshad pa yin na/ /rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi/ /rgyal po yi ni sngon gyur cing/ gang yang nad kyi rgyal por gyur/ /de phyir gnod pa'i rgyal por bshad/ ces bya ba la/ snar ma la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams
128a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ bram ze rnams kyis rgyal po ni zla ba yin la/ de yang sngon bskal ba dang po'i tshe/ zla ba snang ma la mchog tu chags pa'i nyes pas gcod chen po'i nad byung bar gyur la/ de bas na nad 'di la nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /des ni rgyal po'i nang yin
128a7(mdo 'grel): pas nad kyi rgyal po zhes rdub pa'i mtshams sbyar bas bsgrub pa'am/ yang na zad byed kyi nad kyang yin la/ rgyal po yang yin pas nad kyi rgyal po ste/ nad rnams kyi nang na gnas shing rims la sogs pa'i nang du du mas yongs su bskor ldag
128b1(mdo 'grel): bshad ma thag pa'i chu la du nang du ma rjes su 'brang zhing/ nad mang po sngon du 'gro bas gcod chen po la gnod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /zhes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i dang song rnams kyis bshad pa yin no/ /lus dang sman ni zad byed cing/ /zas pas 'byung
128b2(mdo 'grel): bas zad byed yin/ zhes bya ba la/ lus dang sman gyi dngos po gnyis zad pa ni med par byed pa ste/ de bas na lus dang sman zad par byed pa'i nad 'di la zad byed ces bya ste/ gang gi phyir nang 'di skyes par gyur na/ lus zas cing 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang/ sman mang po
128b3(mdo 'grel): yang zab cing gtugs par byed pas na/ nad 'di la zad byed ces bya'o/ /yang na zad pa las byung bas na zad byed de lus zungs rnams zad pa'i rgyu las byung rbas na ming zad byed ces bya ba'o/ /dangs sogs skam pas skams byed yin/ de rnams nga
128b4(mdo 'grel): las gsal bas rgyal/ zhes bya ba la/ dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs bdun po skems shing dengs par byed pas na/ de la skams byed ces bya'o/ /yang nad de rnams kyi nad na rags shing gsal la nus pa che bas na nang kyi rgyal po zhes
128b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /drag shul bsten dang shugs bkag dang/ /khu chu dangs ma snum zad dang/ /kha skom cha ga dang bral bsten/ /bzhi po 'di dag ba'i rgyu/ /zhes bya ba la/ /gcong chen po'i rgyu ni ma lcogs bzhin du drag shul gyi las byed pa la sogs pa
128b6(mdo 'grel): bsten drags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la drag shul gyi stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i las nyams gyis lcogs par dka' ba bstan cing/ lus dang ngag dang yid la gnod par 'gyur pa'i rtsol ba drag po byed pa'o/ shugs
128b7(mdo 'grel): bkag pa ni ngo tsha la sogs pa'i rgyus bshang ba dang gci ba dang phyen la sogs pa bkag cing bsdams pa'o/ /khu chu la sogs pa zad pa ni rang gi rgyu las byung ba zad cing dengs par byed pa'o/ /zas dang skom gnyis kyi cho ga dang bul
129a1(mdo 'grel): bar bsten pa ni/ sman dpyad kyis bstan bcos dang mi mthun par bsten cing/ /de'i cho ga dang mi mthun par byas nas mi 'grog pa za ba'o/ /de yis rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ /bad kan bsla nas thams cad du/ lus kyi tshig
129a2(mdo 'grel): kun la zhugs te/ de yis rtsa sgo la gnod cing/ bu ga'i sga ni bkag pa 'am/ yang na shin tu kha 'byed gyur/ /stod smad thad kar gnas na ni/ rang gi nad ni ji bzhin bskyed/ ces bya ba la/ drag shul la sogs pa dag gis rlung bslang zhing 'khrugs par
129a3(mdo 'grel): byas bas na/ rgyas shing 'phel bar gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa bslang nas rang gi gnas las gyen du lo zhing rgyas par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du bad kan bslong nas stod smad dang rtsib mo la sogs pa thams cad khyab cing las kyi tshigs kun gyi nad
129a4(mdo 'grel): du zhugs te/ tshigs de dag la gnod cing rab tu na bar byed pa dang/ yang de bzhin du des lus thams cad la khyab pa'i rtsa sgo la yang gnod cing bcom pa dang/ de bzhin du bu ga rnams kyis 'byung zhing sgyu ba'i sgo bkag nas gnas par
129a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba 'am/ yang lan 'ga' rtsa sgo lam/ kha bye zhing rgyas par byas nas lan 'ga' ni stong du 'gro /lan 'gal ni ro smad dam rtsig logs su thad kar song nas dang rang gi nad ji lta ba bzhin du bskyod de steng du rgyun ni ro sod kyi nang skyed bar byed la
129a6(mdo 'grel): smad rgyun mi ro smad kyi nad skyed par byed/ /thad kar 'gro na ni rtsib logs kyi nang skyed par byed do/ /de 'byung 'gyur ba'i sngon tshul ni/ /tsham 'debs sgrid pa shin tu mang/ /mchil ma kha nad ro mngar bro/ /lus dang me drod nyam chung byed/ /gzhong snod zad skom
129a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs ni/ /gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mthong/ /phal cher zas sgom la sogs dang/ /sbrang ma rtsa dang sgra sogs 'bab/ /snying 'par slon ba yig ba chus/ kha zas zos kyang nyam stobs zad/ /lag par blta zhing la gdong skrad/ /mig ni shin tu dkar po bsnang//
129b1(mdo 'grel): lag dar dag ni 'dam par 'dad/ /lus la 'jigs su rung bar mthong/ /bud med chang dang sha la dga' / /smad dang klad pa 'goms par byad/ /skra dang sen mo shin tu 'phel/ /rmi lam du ni phye ba leb/ /gtsang sbra sdig sbrul gcan zan sbre'u/ /bya rnams kyis ni gces por
129b2(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /skra rus thub ma thal sogs kyis/ /phung po la 'dzeg pa dang/ /yul dang grong ni stong pa dang/ /chu klung skams pa rmi lam mthong/ /skar mnga' i ri bo ltung ba dang/ /ljon shing rnams ni 'phar ba rmi/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcod tshan po zhes bya ba'i nad ba
129b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ /skye bzhin ma'i mtshan ma'i tshul sngar byung ba'i rtags ni cham pa la sogs pa yin te/ cham pa ni sna nas 'jag pa'i nang des 'debs so/ /sbring ba shin tu mang ni sbring ba drag tu 'byung zhing mang ba'o/ /mchil ma mang ba ni bad kan gyi
129b4(mdo 'grel): ljan ljin kha nas mang du 'ong ba'o/ /kha'i nang ro mngar bar bro ba ni kha mngar ba nyid yin no/ /lus dang ma drod nyam chung ba ni lus kong rmya zhing zhum pa dang/ zas 'ju bar byed mi nus pa'o/ /gzhong pa dang snod phra mo la sogs pa gcod ba yang mi gtsang ba nyid du mthong ba ni
129b5(mdo 'grel): de'i tshe la sogs pa'i shes pa skye zhing 'khrul pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /yang phal cher zas dang skom la sogs pa sprang ma la sogs pa lhung zhing 'bab par 'gyur ba dang/ snying 'phar zhig brgal bar gyur pa la sogs pa dang/ lag pa gnyis la yang
129b6(mdo 'grel): dang yang du lta zhing rtog par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyu med pa'i rkang ba dang gdong skad bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du mig gnyis shin tu dkar zhing skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du lag dar gnyis 'jam par 'dod cing nga'i lag dar tshang ji tsam du song zhes
129b7(mdo 'grel): shes par 'dod cing 'jal ba dang/ rang gi lus mdzes shing skyon med la 'jigs pa'i bag med par gyur ba la yang/ mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung bar mthong ba'i log pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ bud med dang chang dang sha la 'ga' zhig mngon par 'dod pa
130a1(mdo 'grel): bskyed ba dang/ yang dang gnyid la dmod par sa byed ba dang/ klad pa ste spyi bo gos kyis 'gebs par byed pa dang/ skra dang sen mo rnams shin tu 'phel zhing ring bar 'gyur ba dang/ rmi lam gyi nang du phye ma leb la sogs pas gces ??
130a2(mdo 'grel): par mthong ba dang/ de bzhin du skra la sogs pa'i phung po la 'dzeg bar rmi ba dang/ yul dang grong stod zhing mi gnas pa rmi lam du mthong ba dang/ chu klung rnams skams shing grag po stod pa rmi lam du mthong ba dang/ skar ma bar ltu rab rib ltu bzhing
130a3(mdo 'grel): bsnyil ba rmi lam dang/ ljon shing bzang ba rnams las skyes pa 'gar bar zhing na'i phung por 'gyur ba rmi ba ste/ mtshan ma de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bstod du gnas na 'cham pas 'debs/ /lung ba lu zhing dbugs mi bde/ /phrag ba spyi bo nas dag
130a4(mdo 'grel): skad 'gags yig chus par 'gyur/ /smad gnas bshang sla rtug skam byed/ /nang grol nad gnas slon par byed/ /thad kar gnas pas rtsab logs zub/ /tshigs la gnas nas rim su 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcod chen pa'i mngar stong du
130a5(mdo 'grel): gnas na 'tsham bas 'debs pa la sogs pa nad bdun skyed par 'gyur ro/ /nad de ro smad du song bas ni bshad ba sla ba 'am rtug skam du 'gyur te/ rtug ba sla ba ni zhigs shing 'khrul bar 'gyur ba'o/ /skam pa ni sra zhing 'gags te mkhran bar 'gyur ba ste/
130a6(mdo 'grel): de las lan 'ga' ni sla bar 'gyur la lan 'ga' ni ska bar 'gyur gyi/ de gnyis cha mnyam par mi 'gyur ro/ /nad de nad khrol gyi nad na gnas pa ni slon zhing 'dod bar byed/ /thad kar gnas pa'i nad kyis ni rtsib logs su zug cing na bar 'gyur/ /nad de ni
130a7(mdo 'grel): ni gas la gnas pas ni rims bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar nang tshul bcu gcig ni/ /gcod chen ldan la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcod chen po'i nad de dang ldang ba la chas pa la sogs ba nad bcu gcig pa 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur/ /de
130b1(mdo 'grel): las sgrubs rnams bkag pa las ni skams par 'gyur ba yin la/ de rnams kha bye ba las ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /des na grangs kyis 'di gnyis gang yang rung ba gcig gis zung gi gnyi ga dus gcig tu 'byung ba ni mi srid do/ /de rnams kyi grangs na chal ba dang lud
130b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ phrag pa na ba dang/ sbyi ba na ba dang/ skad 'gags pa dang/ yi ga 'chus ba dang/ bshang ba sla ba dang/ rtug sams dang/ spom pa dang/ rtsib logs zug pa dang/ rims te bcag cig po 'di dag ni zad byed kyi nad yin no/ /de rnams kyi
130b3(mdo 'grel): bla gnyan dang/ /skad 'gags brang du na ba dang/ kha glol lus grugs mchil snabs mang/ /drod nyams kham nam yin zhes bya/ zhes bya ba la/ cham ba la sogs pa de rnams kyi bla gnyam ni skad 'gigs pa la sogs ba bdun yin par shes par bya/
130b4(mdo 'grel): dad snga na gnas pa'i steng du nad phyi ma byung nas/ sdug bsngal dang rjes su 'brel bar byed pa ni bra gnyan zhes bya'o/ /des rlab gyur klad pa dang/ rtsib lags zug sha yan khag na/ /skad 'gags mgul ba subs? par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ de la rlung gis
130b5(mdo 'grel): shas tshe ba las gyur ba'i gtsang chen po ni/ /klad pa ni ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mkhris rgyas chad lag thag ba che/ /tshad khru khrag tu slan ba dang/ /khams nam rim 'dabs myos par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba yang mkhris pa'i shas
130b6(mdo 'grel): tshe ba las byung ba'i gtsang tshor ba ni/ rkang pa dang lag pa dang phrug pa chab la sogs pa'i nad kyis mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/ /slon lung la se dang yan lag lci mchil snabs mang zhing tsham bas 'debs/
130b7(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde skad 'gags drod nyams zhes bya ba'o/ /bad kan rgyas pa las gyur pa'i gcong chen pa'i nad ni yi ge 'chus ba la sogs par byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis me drang nyams chung ba/ /'byar bca' bad kan rgyas gyur nas/ /rtsa sgrub song
131a1(mdo 'grel): ni 'gags pa dang/ lus zungs drod ni chung gyur pas/ /dangs ma rang gi gnas su ni/ /ma zhu bla gnyan de dang de/ /bskyed cing sha sogs mi 'gyur la/ /khrag ni gyen du 'byung bar byed/ ces bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad ? nyam
131a2(mdo 'grel): chung zhing nus pa bri ba la sogs pa'i rgyus 'byar bag dang bcas pa'i bad kan rgyas par 'gyur la/ rtsa sbubs sgo rnams 'gags shang bkag bar gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du lus zungs kyi drod nyam chung ba gyur pas dangs ma rang gi gnas su 'debs
131a3(mdo 'grel): par ma zhu zhing smin par nus pa'i dangs ma de las bla gnyan skad 'gags pa dang/ brang du na ba la sogs pa rang gi rgyu las byung ba de dang de skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur la/ des na sha la sogs pa'i lus zungs su mi 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du
131a4(mdo 'grel): khrag gyen du 'byung zhing mchil ma la sogs pa dang lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /long ba nyid du zas 'ju bas dang mar 'gyur bar mi byed phyir/ /phal cher dri ma nyid 'gyur phyir/ /lus zungs 'phel bar mi byed do/ /zhes bya ba la/ gang gi
131a5(mdo 'grel): phyir gcod chen po'i nad 'di yod pa la/ /bod pa'i drod kyi kha zas 'ju bar byed kyi/ /ma dang gzhan gyis dangs ma la sogs pa'i rim bar smin par mi byed do/ /de'i phyir 'phral du dri ma bshang gci nyid du 'gyur bas zungs rnams 'phel
131a6(mdo 'grel): zhing rgyas bar mi byed de/ dangs mi'i bcud lus kyang rtas shing tshim par mi byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i don no/ /dangs ma 'ang khrag tu mi 'gyur na/ /shar 'gyur pa lta smos ci dgos/ /zas byed can ni bshad 'phel ba/ /'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed/
131a7(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba la/ gcod can gyi skyes bu de'i lus zungs dangs ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang khrag tu mi 'gyur na/ sha'i lus zungs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ zad byed dang ldan pa'i skyes bu bshad ba 'ba' zhig nye bar 'phel bas gnas par
131b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gyi/ dangs mas khrag la sogs par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'ba' zhig gi sgras nges par bzung bar yin no/ /mtshan ma chung yang nyams chung zhing/ /nad kyis sman gyi stobs mi bzod/ ces bya ba la/ chas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams
131b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ de bzhin du snying ga dang rtsib log gzer ba la sogs pa'o nad kyis na ne mchung ngu zin kyang/ mi mnyam stobs chung zhing nad kyis sman gyi stobs bsten par mi bzod pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya ste gsor mi rung ngo/ /de las gzhan ba ni thams cad ldan
131b3(mdo 'grel): yang gso bar bya/ zhes bya ba la/ de las gzhan ba'i sman gyi stobs bzod cing/ nyams stobs dang lan pa ni mtshon ma thams cad dang ldan ba yin yang gsar rung ba yin pas nad pa nyams stobs dang ldan ba ni rnam pa thams cad du gso bar phyir ro/ /de
131b4(mdo 'grel): yan chad dang/ gcod chen po'i nang ni bshad zin nas/ /da ni de'i 'og tu de'i yan lag tu gyur pa skad 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad stom pa'i phyir smras pa ni/ nad ni sna re 'dus pa dang/ zad byed tshil las gyur ba drug /sar rag gas kyi ni dbye ba
131b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ nad sna re zhes pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so las gyur pa gsum dang/ gsum tshar 'dus pa las gyur te bzhi pa dang/ zad byed las gyur ba dang/ tshil las gyur ba ste/ phrug po de dag ni skad rags
131b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbye ba yin bar zhes bar bya'o/ /de la rlung g.yo nyam chung rtsub/ /gre bgrams gang snyam byed/ /de la snum dro'o mo phan/ /zhes bya ba la/ de la skad 'gags pa drug gi nang nas ba rlung las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni g.yo zhing skad 'gyur te mi brtan ba dang
131b7(mdo 'grel): lus nyam chung zhing khong rmya ba dang/ rtsub bag tu gnas pa dang/ greb nam gyi grams gang ba snyam du byed cing na ba yin la dal snum bag dang/ dro ba dang/ 'o ma gon pa yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur dang rkan lkog tsha/ /skam zhing smra bar nus mi 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la mkhris
132a1(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni/ /rkan dang log ma'i phyogs su cha gang 'gyur ba de dag nyid skam pa dang/ smra bar mi nus shing tshig mi mthon pa yin no/ /bad kan mgul ba byugs snyam byed/ /skad kyi gas sangs ngar
132a2(mdo 'grel): ngar 'dzer/ /thogs bcas 'gyur ro thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ma thams cad ldan pa yin/ /zhes bya bar/ de yang sbra ngar ngar bor 'don cing 'dzer ba dang/ thogs ma dang bcas pa ste/ bar bar du 'khrul zhing brjed par 'gyur ba yin no/ /thams cad kyi zhes
132a3(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi gsum po thams cad las byung ba'i skad 'gags pa ni mtshan ma gsum po thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /zas de las ni drung snyam byed/ du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na/ zhes bya ba la/ zad byed ces te gcod chen po las byung ba'i skad 'gags
132a4(mdo 'grel): pa ni lkog ma drud pa snyam du sems shing na ba dang/ gog ma dang rkan gyi phyogs su du bas bdugs pa ltar shin tu na ba dang smra ba ni yang du bas subs te/ smra ba snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /tshil gyur bad kan bdag nyid can/ /tshig ni brda sprod mi nus 'gyur/ zhes
132a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ tshil las gyur ba'i skad 'gags pa mi mgul ba byugs pa snyam du byod ba la sogs pa'i bad kan gyi skabs su bshad pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no/ yang de bzhin du tshig brda sprod par mi nus shing shin tu mi gsal bar smra ba yin no/ /'dir
132a6(mdo 'grel): ni 'dus dang tha ma spang/ shes bya ba la/ 'dir skad 'gags pa 'di dag gi nang nas nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa las gyur ba dang/ tshil las gyur pa'i skad 'gags pa ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/ /yig 'chus pa'i nad rnams ni/ lci snying
132a7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa so so dang/ 'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni/ gdung ba las gyur lnga pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ yi ga 'chus pa'i nang ni rlung la sogs pa'i nang lce dang/ snying ga las gnas pa so so ste/ gsum po so so las gsum du 'gyur la/ 'dus pa'i nang lce dang
132b1(mdo 'grel): snying la gnas pa las bzhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi gdung pa mya ngan dang/ /khro ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma gsungs pa las yi ga chu sa pa lnga par 'gyur ro/ /kha ni bska dang kha mngar bro/ /rlung la sogs gsum dang rims bzhin sbyar/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung
132b2(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa las yi ga pa chu sa pa las gyur ba'i mtshan mo ni rims bzhin kha bska ba la sogs par 'gyur te/ rlung las gyur pas na ke bske bar 'gyur ro/ mkhris pa las gyur pas ni kha kha par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni kha mngar bar
132b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /kun las gyur par bro med/ ces bya ba la/ nad gzhi thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa ni ro bro ba med pa ste/ drid ba yod mad kyis nges pa'i 'di ltar bro ba zhes byar brda sprod mi nus so/ /mya ngan khro sogs nod ci bzhin/ zhes bya ba
132b4(mdo 'grel): la mya ngan dang khro ba la sogs pa las gyur pa'i yi ga 'chus pa lta ni nang ji lta ba nyid las mi 'da' ba yin te/ de bska ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la mya ngan dang 'jigs pas kra dungs pa'i yid las ni rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur bas
132b5(mdo 'grel): bska ba yin no/ /khro ba las gyur pa'i mkhris pa bskyed par 'gyur ba yin pas kha ba yin no/ /'dod pas gdungs ba la ni bad kan 'khrugs pas mngar 'brog yin no/ /slon bro nad gzhi rnam re kun/ /ma sdug yul las byung lnga pa/ /zhes bya ba la/ slon bro ba ni
132b6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa lnga ste/ nad gzhi gsum sna rgyu re las byung ba gsum dang/ kun 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang/ mi sdug pa'i don rnam yul yid du mi 'ong ba'i/ yul la ma ngan gzu dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las byung ba ni lnga pa yin no/ /'di dag stong du rgyu ba'i
132b7(mdo 'grel): rlung/ 'khrugs pas nad na thams cad phul/ zhes bya ba la/ yi ga chus ba'i nang gi na stod du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing rang gi tha mal pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzhan du gyur pa des bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad gyen du blangs shing ster du
133a1(mdo 'grel): dul bas nam tshod yan chad nas kha'i bar du khyab par byed pa yin no/ /de rnams slongs dang kha tsha bro/ /'tshil mang yi ga 'chus sngon byung zhes bya ba la/ slon bro ba de rnams la ni/ nad slong zhing slongs nas ba tsha bro ba las so
133a2(mdo 'grel): ba sngar byung ba yin pas na/ sngon byung ba ste 'di dag ni nad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul yin no zhes bya ba'i don yin no/ /rlung gyur ba lte ba rgyab tu zug /rtsib logs na zhing zas slon nas/ /cung zad 'byung zhing chad pa dang/ /ro bska spu ba can du skyug?/ sgrags
133a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgra bcas mdog gnag la/ /sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bcas/ /lud ba kha skams klad snying na/ /skad 'gags pa dang khong snyom bcas/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i slon bre ba ni lte ba dang rgyab kyi phyogs na zhing zug pa dang/ rtsib logs
133a4(mdo 'grel): gzer ba dang/ skyugs pa kha zas gyen du 'byung ba dang/ de'i 'og tu cung zad 'byung zhing bar par du chad pa'i tshul gyis ro bska ba'i rnam ba la spu ba can skyug par 'gyur ro/ /sgregs pa sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang/ kha dag gnag pa dang
133a5(mdo 'grel): sla zhing dangs par 'byung ba dang/ 'byung bar dga' zhing sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /mkhris gyur thal chung 'dri ba la/ rud kha ljang sngon mdog ser sgyur/ /khrag bcas
133a6(mdo 'grel): ro skyur tsha zhing dro/ /skom dang rgyal tsha gdung bcas yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni thal chud dang 'bra bar 'byung zhing kha dog dung khar gnas pa'am/ dub ltar cha zheng dku ba'i sgrags pa dang bcas pa kha dog
133a7(mdo 'grel): ljang gu dang sngon po dang ser bor skyug cing khrag dang bcas par 'byung la/ ro ni skyur ba dang tsha ba dang ldan zhing dro ba'i bag tu slon la skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur snum bska bsil/ /nal nal bor 'dug drab ris
133b1(mdo 'grel): ro mngar lan tshwa bro tsha bas che/ /chags shing ba spu brtse bar byed/ /gdong skrangs kha nad mngar bar bro/ /snyom zhing snying na lud ba can zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i slon bro ba ni snum bag tu slon zhing skrad pa dang/ bad kan gyi rgyun nal nal bor
133b2(mdo 'grel): 'jag pa dang/ skyugs pa dra ba ris sam skar khung gi tshul du gnas pa dang/ ro mngar zhing lan tshwa bro ba dang/ babs che zhing mang du 'byung ba dang khre bar chags shing 'byar ba dang/ pa spu pags pa brtse zhing reg mi bzod pa dang/ gdeng skrangs pa las so
133b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /gsum char las byung rtags kun ldan/ /'chi ltas las bshad gang de spang/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum char las byung ba ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar
133b4(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /yang 'chi ltas kyi skabs su bshad pa'i slon bro ba'i na dang shugs drags pa dang/ bshang gci bro ba la sogs pa de yang spang bar bya ste/ gsor mi rung ngo/ /rlung dang mi gtsang btsog pa dang/ /skyug bro mthong dang thos sogs kyis/ /yid gdungs snying la phog gyur slon/ /mi
133b5(mdo 'grel): sdug pa las byung ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ dul pa la sogs pa'i dngos po mthong ba dang thos pa dang/ mnams pa dang zos pa dang/ reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pas yid gdungs shing sems bcom par gyur la/ snying la phog cing gcad par gyur nas/
133b6(mdo 'grel): slan ba gang yin pa de mi sdug pa'i yul las byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ mngon par mi 'dod pa'i yul dang phrad ba las byung ba pa'o/ /yid mi bde skam srin bu'i snabs/ /rlung sogs nyid la gnas par brtag /ces bya ba la/ srin bu la sogs pa bzhi po ni rlung la sogs
133b7(mdo 'grel): pa slon bro ba gsum pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu bzhin du brtag cing dpyad la shes par bya'i/ /rlung la sogs pa mad bar de rnams 'byung de ni 'gyur ro/ /yid mi bde ba ni sbrum ma zla gnyis lon phan chad mngal la bsal nas 'byung ba la bya'o/ /gzer dang
134a1(mdo 'grel): 'bar dang snying na dang/ /bye brag tu ni srin bu'i nad/ /srin bu'i snying nang mtshan ma las/ de ni shes par bya ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ srin bu'i nang las skyes pa'i slon bro ba ni gzer la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis bshad pa yin la/ de bzhin du srin?
134a2(mdo 'grel): bu'i nad kyi mtshan ma mig gnag ba la sogs shes par bya'o/ /snying nad gnad ni re re 'dus/ /srin bu las byung rnam lngar bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ snying nad ni rlung mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ srin bu las gyur
134a3(mdo 'grel): ba steng rnam pa lnga yod par bshad do/ /rlung gis shin tu zug cing/ gas pad bshags pa snyam du sems/ /bcom snyam sems shing skam la rengs/ /snying gis stong snyam zag par byed/ /rgyu med zhum zhing mi dga' la/ /'jigs shing sgra ni mi
134a4(mdo 'grel): bzod la/ /'phar zhing 'grel gcus snyam byed/ /rmo ba bag dbugs thung gnyid chung 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i snying nang ni snying du zug cing gzer ba dang/ btsugs pa ltar na ba dang/ de bzhin du snying gas pa snyam du sems shing
134a5(mdo 'grel): na ba dang/ chal par bshags ba snyam du sems shing na ba dang/ bcom zhing grugs ba snyam du sems pa dang/ khod skams par gyur ba dang/ rengs shing gang ba snyam du sems ba dang/ snying gis stong zheng med pa snyam du sems pa deng/
134a6(mdo 'grel): zags shing g.yos la sems 'phyo ba dang/ rgyu med par glo bur du sems zhum zhing mi dga' ste/ mya ngan du byed pa dang/ 'jigs shing dangs pa dang/ sgra mi bzod cing tshig thogs pa la sogs pa la 'khrul pa dang 'bar zhing 'ga? pa
134a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ sa la 'gre zhing ldog pa dang/ snying gcus pa snyam du bud dung ldan? ba dang/ rmong bag tu gyur zhing mi dran pa dang/ dbugs thung zhing 'tshub pa dang/ gnyid chung zhing yar ba ste mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mkhris gyur skom dang?
134b1(mdo 'grel): mgo bskor brgyal/ /tsha rdul snying ga skyur lus snyom/ /mkhris pa skyur ba slon par byed/ /dud pa khar 'ong ser rims 'debs/ /zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying nad la ni skom dang che ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying ga skyur ba ni
134b2(mdo 'grel): dang ga tsha zhing sgregs ba skyur ba'o/ /bad kan las gyur snying ga rengs/ /khong na rngo bcug lta bur lci/ /drod nyams mchil mang lud pa lu/ /gnyid tshe skom rims yi ga 'chus/ /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i snying nad la ni/ snying ga rengs shing
134b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'grul bar na ba dang/ khong na rngo bcug pa ltar sems shing nad na rngo yod pa ltar bur lus lci ba dang/ de bzhin du me drod nyams pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung dang mkhris
134b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang bad kan gsum 'dus pa las byung ba'i snying nad ni de gsum char gyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /srin bus mig ni gnag pa dang/ /mun bar zhugs snyam byed snying 'bar/ /lus skam ga ma'i zhing bad kan 'dzag /'dir ni
134b5(mdo 'grel): stag tu srog le yis/ /snying la drud pa lta bur sems/ /mi bzad nad des myur gsod pas/ /de ni rings par gso bar bya/ zhes bya ba la/ srin bu las gyur pa'i snying nad ni mig gnag par gyur pa dang/ /mun pa'i nang du zhugs pa ltar mun thibs zhes bya ba
134b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ snying 'phar zhing brgal ba dang/ lus skam zhing sha zad pa dang kha nas bad kan gyi ljan ljin 'dzag pa dang/ yang rtag tu snying la sog les chud cing bshags pa lta bur sems te/ srin bus snying na ba zhes bya ba'i nad mi bzad pa de ni myur du gsod
134b7(mdo 'grel): gcing 'chi bar byed pas rings shing myur bar gso bar bya ste/ /gnad chen po snying zhes bya ba 'bus zos pa ni gsod ba chen po skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// //de ltar snying nad kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas/ /da skom dad kyi nad bshad par bya ste/
135a1(mdo 'grel): skom dang rlung mkhris bad kan dang/ /'dus pa dangs ma zad pa dang/ nad 'dres pa las drug par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i dbye bas skom dang rnam pa drug yod do/ /nad dang 'dres pa ni rims la sogs pa nad gzhi gzhan dang 'dres
135a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rkyen las skom dang tu gyur pa'o/ /de ltar gyur pa thams cad la/ /rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te/ /zhes bya ba la/ de ltar skom dang thams cad ldang zhing 'byung pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te/ mkhris pa dang rlung yin par shes par bya'o/ /de 'khrugs lus
135a3(mdo 'grel): zungs bsil ba ni/ /bskams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lus kun 'dar zhing mgo 'khor tsha/ /skom dang khong tsha rmongs par byed ces bya ba la/ /rlung dang mkhris pa de dag ldang zhing 'dzugs par 'gyur ba ni lus zungs bsil ba ste/ dangs ma 'am bad kan
135a4(mdo 'grel): bskams las ldang zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la/ rlung dang mkhris pa 'khrug par byed pa de yang lus thams cad 'dar zhing mgo mkhor ba la sogs pa byed pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /lce drung mgul ba glo ba dang/ /skam dang skom 'thungs rgyu ba'i rtsa/ /
135a5(mdo 'grel): bskams pas skom dang skye bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ skom dang thams cad ni lce drung ba la sogs pa skams nas 'byung ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid/ /kha skam skom gyis mi ngoms dang/ /zas la mi dga' 
135a6(mdo 'grel): skad 'gags dang/ /gre ba lce mchu rtsub par 'gyur/ /lce 'byin byed cing khong snyom ngal/ /sma zhing sems ni myos pa dang/ /de bzhin skom gdungs nang du 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ skom dang de rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de thun
135a7(mdo 'grel): mong gi mtshan nyid de skams pa nas skom dang du 'gyur ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de la skam gyis gdungs pa'i nad ni nang mi 'byung bar bya ba'i le'u las bshad pa yin no/ /lus bskams rmya zhing 'on ba dang/ /rmong bag mgo
135b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor snying nad de/ /'di lta bu yi nang rnams ni/ /skom pas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ yang skom dang kyi gdungs pa las lus skam pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gyur khong? rmya nyam chung la/ /mud 'gram zug cing
135b2(mdo 'grel): klad ba 'khor/ /sna lces dri dang ro mi tshor/ /'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs zad/ chu grang 'thungs na skom 'phel 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i skom dang ni khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te/ tshig gi don ni go bar zad do/ /mkhris pa
135b3(mdo 'grel): kho nar ro kha brgyal/ /dmar por mthong zhing rtag bar ni/ /kha skams khong tshad dbugs mnam pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skom dang ni kha'i nang gi ro la gnas dbugs mnam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /bad kan ldang bas skom rgyu'i rtsa
135b4(mdo 'grel): 'gags pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas/ /de tshe de yis bad kan ni/ /ldang zhing de ni skams bar byed/ /mgul ba gra mas gang snyam sems/ /gnyid tshe la nang mngar bar bra/ /lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung/ /rmongs bag slon gyur yi ga 'chus/ /lus snyom kha
135b5(mdo 'grel): zas mi 'ju'o/ zhes bya ba la/ bad kan 'khrugs shing ldang bas chu rgyu bar byad pa'i rtsa sgo rnams su rlung rgyu ba bkag cig g.yogs pa dang/ de'i tshe blud des bad kan de skams par byed pa ni 'dam ltar skom par byed de/ dper na phyi'i rlung gis 'dam skems
135b6(mdo 'grel): par byed pa bzhin du rlung gis bad kan sems par byed do/ /de nas bad kan skams pas mgul ba gra mas gang ba snyam du sems shing cha la rtsub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gnyid che zhing kha'i nang mngar bar bro bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan
135b7(mdo 'grel): nyid rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum char gyis bskyed pa'i skom dad ni 'dras pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /be'u snabs las gyur pa kha zas ni/ /ming?
136a1(mdo 'grel): dka' rlung mkhris las gyur yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ be'u snabs las gyur pa'i skom dang ni kha zas ming par dka' zhing thogs par 'gyur ba de las ni mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tsha bas ??
136a2(mdo 'grel): 'phral du na/ /chu grang bsten gyur skom dang ni/ /khong par cha ba bsdus pa yin/ /gang skom de ni mkhris skyes yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu tsha bas dal zhing dub par gyur la/ de 'phul du de'i mod la chu grang bsten cing khrus la sogs pa byas pas/
136a3(mdo 'grel): phyi rol gyi tsha ba khong pa'i nang du bsdus te/ de'i dbang gis sgom dang skyes pa gang yin pa de ni ma mkhris pa las skyes shing 'byung ba yin no/ /gang yang chang dregs me drod rnos/ /snum zos skyes pa'ang mkhris byung yin zhes bya ba la/ yang skom dang
136a4(mdo 'grel): gang yang mang du 'thungs shing drags pa las gyur pa de yang mkhris pa las gyur pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o/ /yang de bzhin du me drod rno zhing shes che ba las snum zos pa las byung ba'i skom dang de yang mkhris pa las byung bar shes par bya'o
136a5(mdo 'grel): snum rtsi sgyur dang lan tsha'i bag /zos pas bad kan las skye 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ kha zas snum bag la sogs pa zos pa la skom dang skyes pa ni bad kan las byung ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /zas byed las ni skom dang 'gyur/ /dangs ma
136a6(mdo 'grel): zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra/ /zhes bya ba la/ zas byed las skom dang du byung pa gang yin pa de ni dangs ma zad pa'i mtshan nyid dangs ma zad na rtsub la skem/ nyam chung sgra ni zhes bya ba smos pa yin pas 'di nyid las shes par bya'o/ /khong skom gcin
136a7(mdo 'grel): nad rims nad sogs/ yun rings nad ni rims skyom nad/ /gang zhig skom dang mi bzad skyes/ /de ni 'dres las byung bar bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ khong skam pa la sogs pa dang 'dres pa dang skom dang gang mi bzad cing gnag par dka' ba skyes pa de
136b1(mdo 'grel): ni 'dras pa las byung ba'i mtshan nyid can yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying pa bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer ces bya ba la/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' ? bas rnam par spyad pa las/ nad gzhi'i
136b2(mdo 'grel): gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// //de nas chad nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa ldang zhing 'khrugs pa'i gzhi gcig pa dang/ nyes pa gsum las byung bar tshul mthun pas gcod chen po'i
136b3(mdo 'grel): 'og tu 'di brtsams pa yin no/ /chang gi nang du gyur bas na chang gi nad dam/ chang las myos pa la sogs pa'i nyes par gyur pas na chang nad de/ myos pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i nad ces bya'i don no/ /de la myos pa ni sems dang lus zungs
136b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar byad ba yin la/ de yang chad la sogs pa la myos par 'gyur bas na/ de'i rgyu ni chang yin par bshad do/ /rno dang drod ches rtsub pas skyur/ /nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang/ /gsal dang dad par byed par bshad/ mdangs ni 'di las
136b5(mdo 'grel): go bzlog yin/ zhes bya ba la/ chang ni rna ba la sogs pa yon tan bcu dang ldan par bshad la/ mdangs ni chang gi yon tan ji skad du bshad pa 'di las go bzlog pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin te/ rdul ba dang grang ba dang sdum pa dang rigs pa dang
136b6(mdo 'grel): mngar ba dang brtan pa dang/ /yun ring pos byed pa dang/ lji ba dang/ 'jam pa dang/ 'byang ba gcag can yin no/ /dug kyang rno sogs yin mod kyi/ /sems la gnod par byed pa yin/ /nus pas 'chi bar byed pas na/ dug ni lhag par
136b7(mdo 'grel): mthu chi'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ chang gi yon tan rno ba la sogs pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ chang 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ /de'i khyad par ni sems la lhag par gnod cing 'khrul bar byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi nus pa dug la yod pas na/ gang gis
137a1(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nus pa dug la yod pa'i phyir/ dug gi nus pa chang bas lhag par mthu che zhing nus pa lhag pa yin na/ /chang ni rno sogs yon tan gyi/ /mdangs kyi yon tan rdul la sogs/ /bcu po bcu yis
137a2(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs byas nas/ sems ni rgyur bar byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ chang gi yon tan rno ba la sogs pa bcus mdangs kyi yon tan rtul ba la sogs pa bcu po zil gyis mnan cing 'khrugs par byas shing kun tu dkrugs nas sems bsgyur zhing
137a3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gzhan du gyur par byed ba yin na/ /nga ro dang pho gnyis pa yis/ /bag med pa yis gnas la gnas/ rnam rtog dan bcom rmongs pa rnams/ /bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang/ /ra ro ba'i shugs
137a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis pas ni/ /bag med pa'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ bag med cing nyes par spyod pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nyid kyis ni rang gi rnam rtog ngan pas bcom zhing sems kyi kun tu rtog pas brlag par gyur pa yin la/ de
137a5(mdo 'grel): nyid ni tshangs pa ste/ bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa mi phyad pas te/ de rnams ni ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang/ gnyis pa'i skabs la gnas pas na de bde ba yin par shes shing shin tu bde ba kho nar 'dzin gyi de lta bu'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba yin par ni mi rtags so
137a6(mdo 'grel): 'dir bag med pa ni tshe phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las mi dge ba rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu la bya la/ de 'byung ba'i gnas la gnas pa ni/ ra ro ba'i shugs dang po dang gnyis pa las byung ba yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i don no/ /'bring dang chen po'i bar
137a7(mdo 'grel): gyi tshe/ /rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can/ /glang tshan lcags kyu na/ pa ltar/ /tshangs pas mi bya ci yod med/ /ces bya ba la/ 'bring dang chen po ste/ ra ro ba'i shugs gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa'i dang mtshams su phyin pa'i che skyes bur rdul dang
