137b1(mdo 'grel): dang mun pa'i rang bzhin thob pas na/ mi bya ba ci yang med de mi dge ba thams cad mi bya ba ci yang med do/ /rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can smos pas ni skyes bu snying stobs can ni/ nam yang 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no/ /glang chen lcags
137b2(mdo 'grel): kyu med pa ltar zhes smos pa ni rang dbang can du ci dgar spyod pa yin te/ /dper na glang po che myos pa lcags kyu med pa dag ni mi srun pa'i spyod pa/ thams cad ston par byed pa dang 'dra bar rang ro ba 'bring dang chen po'i par tshigs su phyin pa ni skyes bu rmongs pa sdig pa
137b3(mdo 'grel): ni dge ba'i las ci yang mi bya ba med de thams cad byad do zhes bya ba'i don no/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'i gzhi/ /zhes bya ba la/ ra ro ba 'bring dang chen po'i bar tshig ni kha na ma tho ba ste/ /smad par bya ba yin pas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sdig pa rnams
137b4(mdo 'grel): kyis gnas dang/ bzhi ni 'di nyid yin no/ /yang 'di nyid ni tshul khrims 'chal cing bslong pa nyams pa'i gnas sam gzhi yang 'di dag nyid yin no/ /'di gcig ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i lam/ /mang po ston par byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ ra ro ba'i gnas
137b5(mdo 'grel): skabs kyi khyad par 'di nyid ni ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i lam du ma'i rgyu yin zhing lam mang po de dag tu khrid cing ston par byed pa'i slob dpon yin no/ /ra ro ba'i gsum pa'i tshe na ni/ sems med par ni ro ltar nyal/ /zhes bya ba la/ ra ro ba'i shugs chen
137b6(mdo 'grel): par phyin cing/ de la gnas pa nyi chen ni sems med pa ra ro ltar nyal te/ tho yor ram rtsig pa 'am/ mi re? dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don no/ /nyes pa bdag nyid shi pa'i las/ /shin tu ma rungs gnas skabs thog ces bya ba la/ nyes pa'i bdag nyid de shib bas?
137b7(mdo 'grel): kyang chos thu ba'i ma rungs pa'i gnas skabs thob par ro/ /chos dang chos min bde dang sdug /don dang don min phan dang gnod/ /gang la chags pas mi shes pa/ /de ltar mkhas pas ji ltar bstan/ /zhes bya ba la/ gang la chags shing mngon par zhen na
138a1(mdo 'grel): na chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs pa shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur pa'i chang de la mkhas pa blo dang ldan pas ji ltar bsten par bya ste bsten par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de la chos ni spyid pa stong pa dang
138a2(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog chod pa la sogs pa'o/ chos ma yin pa ni sog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las byed pa'o/ /bde ba ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i bde ba'o/ /sdug bsngal ni sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'o/ /don ni rgyal ba'i khrims bya
138a3(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ /don du bsgrub par bya'o/ /don ma yin pa ni gzhung lugs 'chal ba'o/ /phan pa dang gnod pa ni bya ba dar bya ba ma yin pa ste/ de dag gi lo bye brag mi shes pa'o chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang/ khro dang srog dang 'bral ba gnas/ /smyo byed
138a4(mdo 'grel): myos dang brgyal bar bcas/ /brjod byed bcas pa kun song nad/ /ces bya ba la/ chang la ni myos pa la sogs pa gnas te/ de dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /kun song nad ces bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i nad ro dang 'dra bar byed pa ste/ ming gi rnams
138a5(mdo 'grel): grangs su na ltung bar byed pa ces kyang bya'o/ /gang du dran pa nyams cig yang/ /der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba la/ mang du smras pas ci zhig bya ste/ gang du chang gang la dran pa nyams pa gcig pu yod pa der ni/ dngos po gang dang gang
138a6(mdo 'grel): dag yod pa thams cad mi dge ba'i tshul thams cad 'byung zhing chos ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang/ /nad dam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ gang gi phyir mi 'phrod pa 'am/ mi rigs par sbyar ba'i zas zos
138a7(mdo 'grel): pas zas de sog gi rtan yin yang nad nyid bskyed par 'gyur sa'am? 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin na chang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chang gi sde mtshan gsum blo bstan/ /ngo tsha sogs kyang 'jig par byed/ ces bya ba la/ gang yang chang gis nyes dmigs
138b1(mdo 'grel): da shes cher bsten pas sde mtshan gsum la sogs pa nyams shing 'jig par byed pa yin te/ sde mtshan gsum ni skyos bus btsal bar bya ba'i chos dang nor dang 'dod pa'o/ /blo ni shes rab bo/ /nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang/ zas tshad za dang sam
138b2(mdo 'grel): bag dang/ /snying stobs lang tshor ldan ba dang/ /rtag tu chang 'thung de'i rigs skyes/ /chil dang bad kan shas che la/ /rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas chung dang/ /me drod che zhing brtan pa ma pa rnams/ /shas cher ra ror mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la skyes
138b3(mdo 'grel): pa stobs dang ldan zhing nyams mtshag bzang bdag gis chang 'thungs na shas cher ra ro bar mi 'gyur zhing/ de'i 'gyur par mi skye'o/ /yang de bzhin du bzas lags par zos zin pa'i rdzas la 'thungs pa dang/ /zas cher za zhing mang tu zas ba
138b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang snum bag dang ldan pa'i kha zas zas pa 'am/ /rang bzhin gyis snying stobs che ba dang/ lang tsho dang ldan zhing dar la bab pa dang/ rtag tu chang 'thung zhing goms pa dang/ de'i rags las skyos pa ste/ 'chang 'thung zhing sred pa'i rigs rgyud byung
138b5(mdo 'grel): dang mang 'thungs pa/ /gang yin shas cher ra ro 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ de ltar ji skad bstan pa las go bzlog pa nyams stobs chung ba dang/ kha zas pa dang/ kha za ma nyung du zos pa dang/ rtsub bag zob pa dang/ snying stobs chung ba dang/ dar la bab pa las
138b6(mdo 'grel): ?? dang/ rtag tu chang mi 'thung pa dang chang 'thung ba'i rig gsum? skyes pa dang chil dang bad kan zad ba dang/ rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba dang/ khod pa'i me drod chung zhing mi bstan pa dag ni chang 'thungs na shas cher ra ro bar 'gyur/ yang de bzhin du chang
139a1(mdo 'grel): dang can te chang la sred cing yid rton pa dang khros shing 'khrugs pa dang/ /chang skyur zhing rtsub pa shes che ba dang/ de bzhin du chang na zhu ba ste/ snga de zhag 'thungs pa'i chang ma zhu ba'i rjes la 'thungs pa dang/ de bzhin du shin tu mang du
139a2(mdo 'grel): 'thungs pas shin tu ra ro bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung mkhris bad kan kun las byung/ /chang nang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad bzhi re re dang/ kun 'dus pa las gcig ste chang nang rnam bzhir 'gyur ro/ /kun kyang
139a3(mdo 'grel): kun las skyes mas kyi/ /shes che ba las ming du rtags zhes bya ba la/ chang nang kun kyang nyes pa gsum chang las 'byung mod/ /'on kyang nad bzhi gang dang gang shas che ba de dang de las phye ste ming du brtags pa yin no/ /de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan
139a4(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang/ 'khru zhing rtag tu sgom dang bskyed/ tsha grang rims 'dabs yi ga 'chus/ mgo brtsi ba rus na dang 'dar/ /gnas 'jig ltag pa na ba dang/ brla rengs rab rib khyer ba dang/ lud pa dbugs mi bde ba gnyid
139a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rdur? cher 'byung zhing bshad pa 'gag sgrang zhing sem pa ni 'khrul ba dang/ sa zhing snon par byed pa dang/ mgo 'khor ba rmi lam ngan 'thong ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'i chang nad de rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de rnam par dbye ba med par thun
139a6(mdo 'grel): mong gi rtags ni 'di dag yin no/ /sems rmongs shing shin tu blun bag tu 'gyur ba dang/ snying na zhing la phar pa dang Sha khru zhing bshad ba sla ba dang/ rtag par rgyu nam mchad? yang skom dang che ba dang/ rims chab dang grang ba'i bag dag
139a7(mdo 'grel): gis btab par 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na che grang ste mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ mgo la sogs pa na ba dang/ lus 'dar zhing 'grul ba dang/ gnas rnams 'jig cing 'bye ba snyems su sems
139b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ lhag pa'i phyogs na zhing zug pa dang/ brla rengs shing gyur ba mi bde ba dang/ mig rab rib khyer zhing mi gsal ba dang/ /lud ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang/ sems 'khrul zhing nyam pa la sogs pa'o/ /rlung gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong/ /dbugs mi?
139b2(mdo 'grel): bde zhing klad na 'dar/ rmi lam du ni 'phyan zhing 'phur/ /gshin po rnams dang gtam smra rmi/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i tshad nang ni khyad par bye brag tu gnyid mi 'ong ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang/ de bzhin du rmi lam gyis nang
139b3(mdo 'grel): na 'phyan zhing yul gzhan nas gzhan du 'gro bar rmi ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'phur zhing lding bar rmi ba dang/ sngon chad shi ba'i nye du la sogs pa gshin po rnams dang lhan cig gtam smra ba rmi bar 'gyur ro/ /mkhris pas lus cha skad 'gags dang
139b4(mdo 'grel): rmong bag chags kru skam mag 'khor/ /lus mdog ldang dang ser pa dang/ mag dang mkhur tsham dmar bar 'byung/ /mkhris pa rgyas pa las gyur pa'i chang nad ni lus tshab la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis slon snying na dang/ gnyid che
139b5(mdo 'grel): grang 'dar? yan lag lci/ /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan shes cha ba las gyur pa'i chang nad ni sloms la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /grang 'dar ni grang lhags kyis phog pa'i lus 'dar pa'o/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan zhes bya ba la/
139b6(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las byung ba'i chang nad ni mtshan nyid kun ma dren ma dang ldan pa yin no/ /chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni/ /mang du 'thung ngam ma goms 'thungs/ /dri las 'joms dang lus skams nad/ rlung las sdug bsngal las?
139b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /nyam chung pa las mchog tu 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ chang dang 'phrod par gyur pa las kyang de spangs te dus yun ring por lon pa las chang de nyid mdo la mang du 'thungs pa 'am/ yang na sngar ma goms pa'i chang gzhan 'thungs
140a1(mdo 'grel): bar gyur na/ rgyud las 'joms byed ces bya ba'i nad dang lus skam zhes bya ba'i chang nad gnyis po rlung la sogs pa las sdug bsngal zhing gso pa dka' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa de gnyis ni skyes bu nyams
140a2(mdo 'grel): stobs chung ba la mchog tu shes tshar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dzams pas bad kan mchil ma mang/ /lkog ma skam zhing gnyid rab che/ /sgra grag mi bzod slong bag 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ chang nad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba
140a3(mdo 'grel): de'i mchan ma bad kan dang mchil ma'i ljan ljin mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin lkog ma skam pa la sogs pa 'byung bar gyur ro/ /lus skams yan lag mgo bor na/ snying nad mgul nad rmongs bag dang/ /lud pa
140a4(mdo 'grel): skom nan skoms rims 'debs/ /zhes bya ba la/ chang nad lud pas sam pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur na/ de'i mtshan ma ni yan lag dang mgo bo shes char na zhing mi bdab? nas rims kyis 'debs pa'i bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
140a5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig chang rnams spangs pa ni/ /dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed/ /nam yang de la lus sems kyi/ skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu gang zhig chang spangs shing chang mi 'thung ba'i brtul zhugs
140a6(mdo 'grel): blangs pa de ni dbang po thul zhing zhil bskam shas chung pa dang/ brtags te byed pa ste bya ba rnams la blo sngon du song bas 'jug par 'gyur pa dang de bzhin du yang skyes bu de'i lus la dus nam yang lus dang sems kyi nad kyi
140a7(mdo 'grel): skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ lus la byung ba'i nad rims la sogs pa dang/ sems las 'byung ba'i nad brjed byed la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing pa'i gnod pas nyen par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod
140b1(mdo 'grel): zas/ mchog tu bsten las nad gsum 'byung/ dangs ma khrag dang sems rgyu ba'i/ rtsa spubs bkag pa las byung ba/? myos dang brgyal dang kun song nas/ phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che zhes bya ba la/ rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin la mchog tu bsten pa dang/
140b2(mdo 'grel): kha zas mi 'phrod pa zab la mchog tu bsten cing gnas pa byed pa mi la myos pa brgyal ba dang/ kun tu song ba zhes bya ba'i nad de rnam pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang dangs ma dang khrag dang sems rgyu ba byed pa'i rtsa spubs lus la gang dag
140b3(mdo 'grel): yod pa de dgag cing chad pa las byung bar gyur zhing rgyu byed pa yin la/ yang de dag ni phyi ma bzhin du stobs dang nus pa che ba yin te/ de na myos pa bas ni brgyal ba stobs dang ldan pa yin la/ de bas ni kun tu song ba stobs dang ldan pa yin no//
140b4(mdo 'grel): 'dir myos nang sna re re kun/ khrag dang chang dang dug rnams kyis? las kyang 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ 'dir myos pa dang brgyal ba dang kun tu song pa zhes bya ba gsum gyis nad nas myos pa ni rnam pa bdun te/ nad gzhi re re nas gyur pa gsum dang 'dus pa
140b5(mdo 'grel): las gyur ba dang/ khrag dang chang dang dug las byung pa rnams so/ /de dag kyang phyi ma bzhin du stobs che ba yin no/ /rlung las gtam la chags pa dang/ mang smra nyung sma spyod pa 'khrul/ /lus ni rtsub gnag dmar ba yin/ myos pa rlung las skyes pa
140b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i myos pa ni gtam smra ba la chags par 'gyur ba dang/ mang du smra ba la dga' ba dang/ myur du sma zhing rings par smra ba dang/ spyod pa 'khrul zhing nyams pa dang/ lus rtsub pa dang/ dmar ba'i bag tu gnas pa ni
140b7(mdo 'grel): rlung las skyes pa yin na/ /mkhris pa las khra dmar ba dang/ ser mar snang zhing rtsod la dga' / zhes bya ba ni/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i myos pa ni lus kyi mdog dmar zhing ser snang ba dang rtsod cing 'thab mel dga' i ba yin no/ /bad kan tshig nyung 'brel? ? skye
141a1(mdo 'grel): sems las che zhing le lo che/ /zhes bya ba la bad kan las gyur pa'i myos pa ni tshig nyung 'brel bar smra ba dang kha dog dkar zhing skyo ba dang/ sems las che zhing le lo che ba yin no/ /'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba la
141a2(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa las gyur pa'i myos pa ni mtshan nyid can yin no/ /khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ khrag las gyur pa'i myos pa ni mig rengs shing har bag tu gnas pa dang/ yan lag rengs shing
141a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur mi shes pa yin no/ /gzhan yang mkhris pa'i myos pa'i mtshan nyid khro ba dang/ mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang rtsod pa la dga' ba yin no/ /chang gi yan lag skad spyod 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ chang las gyur pa'i myos pa'i yan lag dang skad dang
141a4(mdo 'grel): spyod pa gzhan du 'gyur pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ yan lag 'gyur ba ni lus rnam la gzhan du 'gyur pa'o/ /skad 'gyur pa ni skad gsang nyams shing 'gags pa'o/ /spyod pa 'gyur ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa nyams shing
141a5(mdo 'grel): sngar gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa'o/ /dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid rab che/ /de ni kun las myos tshabs che zhes bya ba la/ /dug gis myos par gyur pa ni 'dar zhing lus 'gul ba dang/ gnyid shin tu che zhing tug pa yin no/ /de ni myos
141a6(mdo 'grel): pa kun las shin tu chabs char myos pa yin de nad kyi gnod pa skyed par byed pa yin no/ /khrag sogs pa yis rlung sogs pa'i/ /mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ khrag dang chang dang dug las gyur pa'i myos pa las rlung la
141a7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i nad rang gi mtshan nyid lhag par mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya'o/ de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ khrag dang tshang dang dug gi mtshan snyed bshad med kyi/ rlung la sogs pa gang yang rung ba lhag par gnas pa yin no/ /zhes shes par bya'o/ /de ltar
141b1(mdo 'grel): myos pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas brgyal ba'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can mkha' i dmar sngo gnag par ni/ /mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems/ myur du sangs par byed pa dang/ /snying na 'dar zhing mgo 'khor la
141b2(mdo 'grel): skem zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ brgyal ba'i nad rlung las gyur pa'i bdag nyid can la ni/ /skyes bus nam mkha' i mdog kha dog dmar ba dang sngo ba dang gnag par mthong bar 'gyur zhing mum par zhugs pa snyam du mun
141b3(mdo 'grel): 'thibs zhes byed par 'gyur pa dang/ myur du sangs shing dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ snying na zhing 'dar ba nas bzhin ras dang lus kyi mdog dmar nag tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mkhris pas dmar ba 'am ser po ni/ /nam mkha' mthong zhing mun thibs bar
141b4(mdo 'grel): sangs nas rdul dang bcas pa dang/ cha skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang/ /'khru zhing kha dog ser dang dmar/ /mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rgyal ba ni nam mkha' i mdog dmar po 'am/ ser pa nyid du mthob par
141b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ mun thibs zhes byed cing rmongs nas mi dran par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs nas dran pa rnyed pa dang/ lus rdul zhing tsha bal sogs pas gdungs shing nyan par 'gyur ba dang/ bshad pa 'khru zhing sla ba dang/ /kha dog ser zhing
141b6(mdo 'grel): dmar bar snang ba dang/ mig dmar zhing ser bar snang bas blta bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur/ nam mkha' mthong zhing mun la thibs byed/ /ring nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang/ snying na bcas par mchil ma mang/ pags pa slon pas g.yogs
141b7(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ yan lag lci zhing tshor ba chung/ /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las byung ba'i brgyal bar gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' sprin gyis g.yogs pa lta bur mthong ba dang/ mun thibs zhes byed cing mi dran par 'gyur ba dang/ brgyal nas yun ring zhig nas
142a1(mdo 'grel): sangs par 'gyur ba dang/ snying 'phang zhing na ba dang bcas pa'i mchil ma dang bad kan gyi ljan ljin mang po 'byung ba dang/ pags pa slon por g.yogs shing dkris pa bzhin du yan lag dang bcas pa'i lus lci zhing tshod ba chung
142a2(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /nyes pa gsum gyi mtshan kun ldan/ brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste/ myur du 'gyel zhing ba rgyal 'gyur te/ 'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin zhes bya ba la/ nad bzhi'i nyes pa gsum char gyis bskyed pa'i brgyal ba ni mtshan nyid
142a3(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad dang ldan pa dang/ brjed byed gnyis pa yin zhing dran pa nyams par 'gyur la/ brjed byed kyis zin pa ltar myur du dgyel zhing dran pa med pas brgyal bar 'gyur la/ khyad par ni brjed byed kyi gdon lnga pa'i 'jigs rung
142a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i spyod pa med par gzhan thams cad tshul mthun pa yin no/ /lus can myos dang brgyal pa yi/ /nad la shugs yod gyur kyang ni/ /rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur pa yin/ kun zhugs sman med par mi zhi/ /zhes bya ba la/ lus can te mi rnams la myos
142a5(mdo 'grel): pa rang brgyal ba'i rlung na de la sogs pa'i shugs drag po yod du zin kyang/ rang nyid sman gyis bcos mi dgos par rang nyid zhi zhing ldog par 'gyur gyi/ kun tu zhugs pa 'am kun tu song ba zhes bya ba'i brgyal ba'i nad ni sman gyis ma bcos
142a6(mdo 'grel): par zhi zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun tu zhugs pa zhes gang zhig la bya zhe na/ de'i phyir smras pa ni/ nad ni shin tu stobs che ba/ /'dus pa las gyur kun zhugs pa/ /srog gyi gnas la brten pa yin/ /lus dang ngag yid spyod pa 'phrog
142a7(mdo 'grel): de yi skyes bu ro dang ni/ /shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar byed/ /rings par gso ba ma byas na/ /myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad shin tu stobs che zhing dkyel cher sogs par rang gi rgyu'i khyad par gyi tshogs par nus pa
142b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'dus par gyur cing gsum char bya ba'i rtsom pa gcig la zhugs shing 'bras bu gcig 'byin par byed pa'i kun tu zhugs pa'i nad sag? gi gnad snying ga'i gnad la brten cing 'dug par gyur pa na kun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal ba'i nad du
142b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa 'phrog cing bsdus nas kun tu zhugs pa des skyes bu shi ba'i ro dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing/ shing dang rtsig pa ltar sems med par byed pa yin la/ des na nad de gal te nad de gso ba snyar te ma byas na smyur zhing rings pa
142b3(mdo 'grel): nyid du srog dang bral bar byed pa yin no/ /mtsho zab chu srin mang po can/ chu 'jing 'jug rdogs med par ni/ kun zhugs pa yis nub byed las/ /mi ni myur du gdon par bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ de bas na sman pas kun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad mi zad
142b4(mdo 'grel): pas zin cing sdug bsngal de'i 'dam du bying ba'i mi myur du gdon par bya ste/ de yang dper na mtsho shin tu zab cing rtogs par dka' la/ chu srin byis pa gsod ba la sogs pa'i srog chags/ gdug pa mang pos gang ba'i chu mjings pha rol tu
142b5(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i 'jug ngogs med par nub par gyur pa dag ni/ nyam nga ba'i gnas yin pas myur du gdon dgos pa dang 'dra'o/ /rigs pas rten dang bral ba'i chang 'thungs pas/ myos dregs khro dang dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rang gi dgra bos
142b6(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'khyud gyur cing/ rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ chang rags shig 'os par bsten pa dang bral ba sta 'og nas smos pa'i stobs dang dus la sogs pa dang/ sbyar ba med pa ni/ /rigs par bsten
142b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang bral pa zhes bya ba ste/ de lta bu'i rigs par bstan pa med par chang 'thungs pas ni myos pa la sogs pa rang gi ste/ lus dang ldan cig skyes pa'i dgra ba 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i yon tan/ 'joms shing 'phrog par byed pas dgra bo ltar
143a1(mdo 'grel): gnod par byed pa'i dgra bo rnams kyis yongs su 'khyud par gyur cing shin tu bcod par gyur pa ni yin zhing/ /de bzhin du rigs pa dang mi rigs pa cha mnyam zhing mtshungs pa nyid du sems par 'gyur pa ste/ /bya ba dang bya ba ma
143a2(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i bye brag phyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no/ /stobs dang dus dang yul dang kom pa dang/ /rang bzhin grogs dang na tshog ma rnam ni/ /legs pa rtags de dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thud/ /de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs dang mtshungs
143a3(mdo 'grel): dang yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ lus kyi nyams stobs dang/ dus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam bzhin blo legs par rtogs zhing so sang kyang nas de dang mthun pa ste de dang der tsham par skyes bu gang zhig tshar ran cing dus la bab par 'thungs pa de
143a4(mdo 'grel): ni bdud rtsi 'thungs pa dang mtshungs pa yin ste/ skyes bu rigs pa dang ldan par 'thung bas gnod pa med cing lus bde bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsngas pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla
143a5(mdo 'grel): zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/ nad gzhi'i gnas le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// //de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ ji ltar kun tu zhugs
143a6(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba'i nad bshad ma thag pa de ni srog gi gnas snyang la brten cing 'byung ba de bzhin du/ 'dir yang srog gi gnas gzhang la brten me 'byung bas na srog gi gnas la brten par chos mthun pa'i phyir ro/ de'i 'og dung 'di
143a7(mdo 'grel): brtsams pa yin no/ /dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi che/ /gzhang 'brum byung bas gsong byed pas/ de phyir bshang ba'i lam 'gogs pa/ gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum ni gzhang khar sha'i mdzer pa
143b1(mdo 'grel): spom po skyes pa yin la/ /de ni dgra bo ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe 'phrog cing gzhang 'brum du skyes pas gsod par byed pa'i phyir des pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na/ /gzhang 'brum zhes bya'o/ /nad kyis pags tshil sha rnams ni/ gnod byas dbyibs ni sna
143b2(mdo 'grel): tshogs pas/ /sha yi myug gu gzhang sogs su/ /skyes de gzhang 'grum yin par bshad/ ces bya ba la/ nad ces bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa ste/ des pags pa dang tshil dang sha rnams la gnod cing ma rungs par byas nas/ /dbyibs dang kha dog sna
143b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs shing tha dad pa'i sha'i myu gu sha mdzer sbom po lta bu gnod pa sna tshogs skyed pa gzheng la sogs par skyes shing byung bar gyur pa de la ni gzhang 'brum gyi nad ces bya ba yin par drang srong rnams bshad do/ /lhan cig skyes dang dbyes byung dang/ skam
143b4(mdo 'grel): dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi/ /dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad de ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te/ la la ni lhan cig skyes te byung ba yin la/ la la ni skyes nas phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang de bzhin du skam pa
143b5(mdo 'grel): rang gsher ba'i dbye bas kyang rnam po gnyis su 'gyur te/ la la ni skam por gnas pa yin la/ la la ni khrag 'dzag pa dang bcas pa yin no/ /gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por rten/ sor ni phyed dang lnga yod do/ /zhes bya ba la/ gzhang ni rgyu ma'i zhabs rgyu ma sbom
143b6(mdo 'grel): po la brten cing gnas la de'i nad ni sor phyed dang lnga yod pa yin no/ /der ni nyer gsum sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhang de ni gnyer ma'i rim pa gsum re re zhing sor phyed dang gnyis yod do/ /rim pa de'i nad ma ni/ /phyir 'phul bar ma
143b7(mdo 'grel): sal ba yin/ re li phyi rol 'dzums pa yis/ /zhes bya ba la/ rim par rnams kyi rims pa nad ma 'am/ phugs ma ni dri ma rnams phyir 'phul zhing 'bab par byed pa yin la/ gnyer ma'i rim pa bar ma ni dri ma rnams sel cing phyir 'byin pa yin
144a1(mdo 'grel): pas na sel ba zhes bya la/ phyi rol gyis nyer ma ni dri ma la sogs pa ma 'byung bar sdom zhing 'jums par byed pas na 'jums pa zhes bya'o/ /de yi phyir phyi rol sor cig la/ /nas ni phyed dang gnyis kyis tshang/ de phan
144a2(mdo 'grel): chad ni spu skya 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ 'jums pa de'i phyi rol sor gcig ni gzhang kha zhes bya la/ gzhang kha de'i tshad na nas phyed dang gnyis kyis chad yin no/ /gzhang kha'i tshig de thams cad ni? rkub tu spu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la
144a3(mdo 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu/ gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid/ /gzhang 'brum zhes bya ba la/ de la lhan cig skyes pa dang phyis 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum gnyis las/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum 'byung ba'i rgyu ni gnyer ma de 'byung
144a4(mdo 'grel): zhing dang par skyes pa nyid kyi tshe/ /de'i sa bon khu khrag la sogs pa la rlung la sogs par gnod par gyur pa de nyid las gzhang 'brum 'byung ba'o/ /sa bon gnod pa yang/ pha mas mi 'phrod zos pa dang/ /sngon las zhes bya ba la/ sa
144a5(mdo 'grel): po nad la gnod par byed pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te/ pha dang mas kha zas mi phrod pa gzhang 'brum skyed par byed pa'i rgyu zos pa dang/ sngon bdag nyid kyi de lta bu'i gnad 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'o/ /de
144a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang 'dus pa/ 'khrugs pa las gyur de dag ni/ gsor mi rung pa nyid du bshad/ ces bya ba la/ pha dang/ ma'i gnod pa'i rgyu dang/ sngon gyi las de gnyis dang/ nad gzhi 'dus par 'khrugs pa gang yin pa las gyur pa de dag ni
144a7(mdo 'grel): gang gi phyir gsor mi rung ba nyid yin te/ lhan cig skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rims byung kun de nas dang 'dra/ zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhan gang yang rung ba kun kyang de 'dra ste/ /dang po lhan cig skyes pa ni gsor mi rung ngo/ /zhes tshig
144b1(mdo 'grel): 'dis ston pa yin no/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du/ /rtsub cing brta bar dka' ba dang/ /nad du kha bltar dkar ba dang/ /bla gnyan mi bzad can gso dka' / zhes bya ba la/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum de yang khyad par 'di dag dang ldan na lhag par
144b2(mdo 'grel): gso dka' ste/ reg pa rtsub par gnas pa dang/ /brta zhing brtag par dka' ba dang/ /kha nang du lta zhing phyir ma phyogs pa dang/ /kha dog dkar ba dang/ /bla gnyan gyi nad mi bzad pa yod pa ni gso dka' zhing bcos su mi rung ba yin no/ /cig shos drug ste dang
144b3(mdo 'grel): tha dang/ 'dres dang 'dus pa khrag las byung/ zhes bya ba la/ lhan cig 'byung ba las cig shos su gyur pa'i phyis 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum ni rnam pa drug yod de/ nad tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang 'dres pa las byung ba dang 'dus pa las byung ba dang khrag las byung ba go blud
144b4(mdo 'grel): dang bad kan gnyis las skam/ khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can/ zhes bya ba la/ de la gzhang 'brum skam po khrag mi 'dzag pa ni rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pas zin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhang 'brum rlan can khrag 'dzag pa ni khrag dang
144b5(mdo 'grel): khris pa 'des? bas? zi? ba las 'byung ba la 'gyur ro/ /nad rnams ldang rgyu sngar bshad pa/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad rnams ldang zhing 'khrug pa'i rgyu gang yin pa ni sngar thams cad kyi thams cad kyi gzhi gshad pa'i skabs bshad cing bstan pa yin no/ /'khrug pa de yas khong
144b6(mdo 'grel): pa ya/ /ma drang nyi mas shing bshang? ba 'phel/ /gzhan yang nyal pa rab drags dang/ /gzhon pa khong 'khrugs bstan drag ni/ /ma snyoms sra dang rtsog pur 'dug /'jam rtsi gci 'us dang ni/ /rdo dang gos kyis brud pa dang/ /shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang
144b7(mdo 'grel): rtag tu 'khru bar byed pa dang/ /bshang dang gci dang phyan gyi shugs/ /bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang/ /rims dang skran dang chad par 'khrug 'or nad skya rbab be'u snabs kyis/ /skems byas gnod par 'gyur pa yi/ /spyod pa bstan las gnod par 'gyur/ /bud med zla
145a1(mdo 'grel): grangs ma tshang 'phyi la/ /zla ba rdzogs sogs gzir las 'byung/ /de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rung/ thur sel 'khrugs pas dri ma ni/ /gzhang ni gnyer mar de bzhag pas/ dar ni mi mngon gyur las gnas/ gzhang 'brum
145a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ nad ldang ba'i rgyu des khod pa'i me drod nyams shing bri la bshad pa zhes bya ba'i dri ma 'phel bar byed pa dang/ rgyu gzhan yang bud med la 'khrigs pa spyad pa'i nyal po drags par byas pa dang bzhon pa las
145a3(mdo 'grel): ? 'khrugs pa ste/ /rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pa ma srun pas g.yengs shing 'khrugs par bya ba dang/ bstan mtho dman ma snyoms pa la 'dug pa dang stan sra ba la 'dug pa dang/ rtag tu rtsog bur 'dug pa dang/ 'jam rtsi gce'u legs par ma
145a4(mdo 'grel): btang pas snang ba dang/ /sa gzhi dang rdo la sogs pas drud da snang bar byas pa dang/ shin tu rgyun mi 'chad par chu drang mos bkrus shing reg par byas pa dang/ rtag par rgyun du 'khru bar byed pa dang/ bshang ba la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag
145a5(mdo 'grel): cing brnag pa dang/ de dag nyid mi 'byung bzhin du nan gyis btsir ba dang/ rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis skyem zhing ring bar byas pa dang/ /lus la sogs pa gnod cing gdung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi spyod pa bsten pa ste/
145a6(mdo 'grel): de dag las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang bud med rnams la ni nad de dag gi steng du zla ba ma tshang zhing/ mngal na gnas pa'i sems can skye ba'i dus la ma bab cing 'phyil pa dang zla ba rdzogs shing tshang ba la 'dug kyang des
145a7(mdo 'grel): gzir ba ste/ gnod pa dang bcas par bu bcas pa las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyi rgyu de 'dra ba de dag dang/ rnam pa gzhan yang thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing gnod par gyur pas dri ma sogs par byed de
145b1(mdo 'grel): gzhang gi gnyer ma'i gnas su bkag nas gnas par byed la/ des na gzhang gi gnyer ma de rnams su ni mi mngon par gnas shing gseb du zhugs pa de dag rul par 'gyur ba'i gnod pas nyen nas bzhang 'brum skyes par 'gyur ba yin no/ /de yis sdom?
145b2(mdo 'grel): tshul med drod nyams/ /brla ni rengs shing na ba dang/ byin pa'i nya na mgo 'khor zhing/ yan lag na zhing mig gnyis skra/ /bshang ba 'khru 'am yang na ni/ /rlung chen nang na 'khyil ba dang/ /phal cher lte ba'i 'og na rgyu/ /nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems/ rkang par
145b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing sgra can 'byung/ rgyu ma krug krug zer zhing spro/ skems zhing sgregs pa mang du 'byung/ /gcin mang bshang nyung yi ga 'chus/ sgregs pa dud 'dra skyur ba 'byung/ mgo dang rgyab dang brang du gzer/ /skom zhing kha dog nyams pa dang/ slong bag
145b4(mdo 'grel): dbang po nyams chung la/ khro zhing bsnyen bkur dka' ba dang/ ma zhu skem nad skya rbab dang/ dmu rdzings rnams la som nyi skye/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum de rnams kyi sngon du byung ba'i tshul lam/ gzugs na pho ba'i me drod nyams zhing bri ba dang/
145b5(mdo 'grel): brla thog thag na ba dang/ byin pa gnyis kyi nya bcus pa snyam du sems shing na ba la sogs pa dang/ bshang ba ched 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla la/ ched 'ga' ni sri zhing rtug skam du 'byung ba dang/ rlung che zhing mang ba dang/ rgyu ba'i lam bkag pas
145b6(mdo 'grel): nang nang du 'khyil zhing mi thon pa dang/ de nyid kyis na phal cher nad lte ba'i nad na rgyu zhing zug pa dang/ phan tshun gzer ba'i nad dang bcas pa dang/ rgyu ma'i nad kun tu bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang/ 'byung bar dka' zhing thogs la 'byung ba na
145b7(mdo 'grel): yang sgra bcan du 'byung ba dang/ rgyu ma'i nang phan tshun krul krul zer zhing 'khrog pa dang dob pa dang/ skem zhing ring ba la sogs pa dang/ sgregs pa dud pa dang 'dra bar dku bar 'ong zhing skyur bar 'byung ba dang/ mgo la sogs gzer zhing na ba dang/
146a1(mdo 'grel): snyom zhing na ba dang las la mi brtson pa dang/ kha dog nyams pa ste/ thal ba'i rang bzhin gyi kha dog las gzhan du gyur pa med pa dang/ spro ba med pa dang dbang po nyam chung zhing rang rang gi las la 'jug pa mi nus pa dang/ khro zhing
146a2(mdo 'grel): sems 'khrug pa dang/ bsnyen bkur dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas bsnyen bkur bya dgos pa dang/ ma zhu ba nas dmu rdzing gi bar gyi nad rnams yod par som nyid skyes zhing dgos par 'gyur pa yin no/ /gzhang 'brum skyes par 'gyur ba
146a3(mdo 'grel): la 'di dag nyid ni 'phal bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad skyes shing 'byung bar gyur ba la/ sngar byung ba'i chal gyis rtags 'di dag nyid 'phel zhing de'i tshul gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og gi lam bkag pas
146a4(mdo 'grel): thur du sal ba'i rlung ldog ste/ lus dang dbang po kun gnas pa'i/ /rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrug par byed/ /de bzhin bshang gci mkhris pa dang/ bad kan lus zungs rten bcas pa 'khrug cing me drod nyams par byed/ ces bya ba la/
146a5(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum de yis 'og gi lam bshang sgo zhes bya ba bkag pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'byung bar rdog pa na lam bkag pa'i phyir rlung de slar ldog par byed la/ de ltar ldog pa des lus dang dbang po'i tshogs kun la gnas
146a6(mdo 'grel): shing rten pa'i rlung dang me dang mnyams du gnas pa dang/ khyab byed dang stong du rgyu ba dang/ srog ces bya ba thams cad 'khrugs cing g.yo bar byed la de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa rten nam gnas dang bcas pa dang
146a7(mdo 'grel): 'grub cing g.yo bar byed la/ khong pa'i me drod kyang nyams par byed do/ /zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de nas gzhang 'brum rlan can la/ phal cher thams cad nyar byung ba/ /skem zhing mchog tu bskyed mi nus/ /stobs zang por rmya
146b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin mdangs nyams/ /lus ltod snying po med 'gyur zhing/ /'dus zas pa yi shing 'dra la/ /bla gnyan ma lus ngag gi 'debs/ /ji skad bshang ba'i nad gzir cing/ lud pa skom dang skad 'gags dang/ /bas ro mi tshor cham 'debs spo/ /sgyid skyar? shing lag na zhing smon
146b2(mdo 'grel): sgyid pa skrangs dang rims nad dang/ /khu ba zad cing rab rib 'on/ /rde'u chags nad kyis gzing ba dang/ /skang 'gags zhum la sems khong chung/ /mchil ma mang 'dor yi ga 'chus rus tshigs kun dang snying lte ba/ /gzhang dang sna rtsar gzer dang bcas/ gzhang nas 'brum ni mi smin bcas/ /khu ba
146b3(mdo 'grel): lta bu'i skyin bag 'dzag /rtug smam sbyin ba'am sla bar 'gyur/ /smin dang ma smin par bar 'khru/ /skya zhing seng dang sngon po yi/ /khrag ni sbyin bag 'khru bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ de nas sngon ba'i tshul gyi 'og tu gzhang 'brum gyi nad can la phal cher 'byung
146b4(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba'i tshul ni skems zhing rbeg pa dang/ mchog tu 'am shin tu bskyod par mi nus shing rtsol ba chung ba dang/ nyams stobs zad cing nus pa chung ba dang/ khang pa rma zhing sgyed zhan pa dang/ bzhin mdangs nyams shing bzhin ras kyi mdog mi sdug ba dang/ lus
146b5(mdo 'grel): lhod cing byo ba mi lcogs pa dang/ snying po ltar sra zhing mkhrang ba'i bag med de/ de yang dper na 'bus zos pa'i shing ltar shin tu snying zhing snying po med pa yin no/ /de bzhin du bla gnyan gyi nad du ma gzhan ji skad po rnams kyis kyang 'debs par 'gyur pa dang/ de
146b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du sngar ji skad bshad pa'i gnad rnams gzir cing gnod par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du lung ba la sogs pas gcod cing nyen par 'gyur ba dang/ yang de bzhin du skad 'gags pa dang/ skad gsangs zhum par 'gyur pa dang/ sems khongs su chud cing yid la byed
146b7(mdo 'grel): pas gnad pa dang/ mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing bad kan gyi ljan ljin mang du 'dor ba dang/ yig 'chus pa la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang/ /de bzhin du 'grum smin pa bcos pa'i khu ba lta bur sbyin dag tu 'dug cing 'byil ba gzhang kha nas
147a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzag par 'gyur pa dang/ ngo bzhan du bar skabs bar skabs su lan 'ga' ni bshang ba sri zhing 'gag pa rtag skam du 'gyur la/ lan 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla bag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du lan 'ga' ni smin par 'khru/ /lan
147a2(mdo 'grel): 'ga' ni ma smin par 'khru ba nas sbyin bag gi bar du 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur/ /skem zhing rtseg rtseg tsha ba dang/ /ring cing dmar nag rengs pa dang/ /mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang/ phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang/ /rtse mo rno zhing
147a3(mdo 'grel): gas pa dang kham pa rgya shugs kha rdzur/ /ras bal sa phon dang 'dra zhing/ /la la ka dam me tog 'dra/ /la la yungs kar lta bur skyes/ /mgo dang phrag pa rtsib logs brla/ chu so dag tu lhag par na/ /spyid pa sgregs pa bshang ba sri/ /snying 'phar yi ga

147a5(mdo 'grel): gci dang/ mig dang gdod ni gnag ba dang/ /skar dang cher pa rmu rdzings dang/ /gtun 'dra de nyid las 'byung 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum gyi nang rlung gi shas che zhing rgyas pa la ni gzhang 'brum
147a6(mdo 'grel): skam zhing khrag mi 'jig cing skam pa dang/ yungs kar gyi 'di gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba'i bag tsag tsag por byed pa dang/ snying cing rtse mo yo ba dang/ mdog dmar nag tu 'dug pa dang/ phur pa ltar rangs shing 'grang ba dang/ dbyibs mthon dman mi snyoms
147a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sog le'i kha sna ltar rtsub pa dang/ rdo la reg pa ltar sra ba dang/ dbyibs phan tshun gcig la cig mi 'dra ba dang/ yo zhing gzhu ltar gug pa dang/ rtse mo tshar ma ltar rno ba dang/ rtse mo ges shing kha bye ba dang/ bim+ba zhes bya ba 'bras bu dmar po zhig pa
147b1(mdo 'grel): 'am/ rgya shugs phra mo'i 'bras bu 'am shing kha rdzu ra'i 'bras bu 'am ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra zhing mtshungs par skye ba dang/ yang la la ni ka dam pa'i me tog dang bar bar skye la/ gzhang 'brum la la ni yungs kar gyi tshad tsam du phra ba skye bar 'gyur ba
147b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ yang de bzhin du mgo bo la sogs pa lhag par na zhing zug pa dang/ sprid pa la sogs pa mang ba dang/ bshang ba sri ba la sogs pa nas/ rtug skam gyis tshul gyis bshang ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ pags pa la sogs pa gnag par 'gyur pa dang/ yang
147b3(mdo 'grel): rlung gi gzhang 'brum de nyid las skran la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /mkhris sha che la rtse mo ni/ sngon zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang/ /sla zhing dri ma nam khrag sla 'dzag /srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin/ /mchar ba'i dum bu ni ca lce/ /srin

147b6(mdo 'grel): rked pa dang/ bshang ba dri zhing sla ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam par 'khru ba dang/ nas rul ba'i nang gi dbyibs 'dra ba dang/ pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang bzhin dang dri ma rnams sngo zhing ser ba dang ljang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan shas che rtsa ba
147b7(mdo 'grel): sgom/ /'thug cing nad kyi shugs ngal dkar/ /skrangs shing rgyas la snum pa dang/ /'gring zhing zlum la lci zhing brtan/ /'byar bag tsha ba chung zhing 'jam/ /g.yang zhing reg na 'ga' bar byed/ /ka ri ras nas yi/ /rus pa pa'i nu sor 'dra/ /chu sor zug cing sbo

152a6(mdo 'grel): 'bying ba zhes bya ba la bad kan gyi rgyu las tshad par 'khru ba ni/ smin zhing ma zhu ba med pa yin yang chu'i nang du bying bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni/ /med des pho ba'i nang du 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu gang las nad kyi
152a7(mdo 'grel): thebs par gyur nas spang bar bya ba'i dngos po spang bar bya ba la 'bad pa med par gyur na/ /de grang ba la sogs pa'i pho ba'i nang du 'gyur ro/ /me drod nyams par byed pa yi/ /zas brten pa yis me drod nyams/ zhes bya ba la pho ba'i nad de
152b1(mdo 'grel): yang long ba'i me drod nyams par byed pa'i kha zas dang gtung ba bsten cing longs spyod pa las me drod nyams shing grang ba'i pho ba'i nang du 'gyur ro/ /pho ba'i nad dang tshad par 'khru ba la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na/ /de'i phyir smras pa ni/ /gang zhig nu nas bshang ba ni/ /be'u
152b2(mdo 'grel): snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med/ /'khru ba de ni tshad 'khru ste/ /rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed/ ces bya ba la/ nad kyis khyad par gang dag gis zas zhu bar gyur nas bshang ba be'u snabs dang bcas pa'am/ be'u snabs med pa'i rnam par 'khru bar
152b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba zhes bya ste/ /de ni rang gi rang bzhin gyis myur du gsod cing gnod par byed pa yin no/ /ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang/ /zhu ba smin pa 'am mi 'khru 'gyur/ /rgyu med par yang bsri ba 'am/ /rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung/ /pho bar ma nu sogs
152b4(mdo 'grel): shing 'khru/ /yun ring na bar byed pa yin/ /pho? ba grang ba'i ma zhu ba'i nad ni/ bshang ba ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs sam/ /zas dang bcas par nges par 'khru bar 'gyur la/ /zas zhu nas ni bshang ba sri bar 'byung ba rim 'gyur pas ma smin par 'khru bar 'gyur ro/
152b5(mdo 'grel): yang rgyu med par glo bur du bshang ba de yang dang yang du sri ba dang/ yang lan 'ga' ni rgyu med par bshang ba de sla bar yang dang yang du 'byung zhing 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /yang pho ba'i ma zhu ba de ni yun ring du sogs shing bshang ba'i 'khru ba dang/ yun ring
152b6(mdo 'grel): por na bar byed cing myur du gsod par mi byed pa yin no/ /de ni nad sna re re 'dus/ /las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /zhes bya ba la/ pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad de ni rnam pa bzhi yod de rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las skyes pa dang 'dus pa las byung ba yin no/ /de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang
152b7(mdo 'grel): ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung/ /mchil mang kha yi dri mi tshor/ /snyom bag skom zhing yi ga 'chus/ /lto spo slon zhi bro ba dang/ rna ba sgyu ma sgra dang bcas/ /zhes bya ba la pho ba'i ma zhu ba grang ba'i nad de'i phyis 'byung ba'i rtags sngon du 'byung ba'i tshul ni yang
153a1(mdo 'grel): lag /snyom shing nyam chung ba dang pho ba'i me drod zhan cing zas ring nas 'ju ba dang/ de bzhin du sgreg pa skyur bag 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang/ du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs/ /brgyal zhing mgon bshang
153a2(mdo 'grel): ba 'gag /rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ pho ba'i nad gzhi char gyis spyi'i thun mong gi mtshan nyid ni lus skem zhing ring pa nas rkang pa dang lag pa skrangs par 'gyur bar yin par shes par bya'o/ /de las rlung la rkan skems shing/ /rab rib rna bar
153a3(mdo 'grel): sgra 'byung dag rtsib logs brla dang chu sor na/ /bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung/ /yang dang spo zhing gsung ba dang/ /ro rnams kun la skam pa dang/ /bkres skom rgyu ba bcad snyam sems/ /zas zhu nas ni spo ba dang/ zas zos na ni bde bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi snying nad
153a4(mdo 'grel): skrad gzhang 'brum/ /mdzer pa skya rbab 'byung ba dogs/ /bshang ba 'byung dka' bska slar 'byung/ /de yang be'u snabs sgra can 'byung/ /gzhang nas lus pa dbugs mi bde/ /zhes bya ba la/ de la pho ba'i nad bzhi po'i nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i
153a5(mdo 'grel): pho ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rkan skams par 'gyur ba dang/ mig rab rib kyis 'debs pa dang/ rna bar sgra zi zi bar 'byung ba dang/ rtsib logs la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ba dang/ mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams kun la bskams zhing chags pa dang/ rgyu ma bcad
153a6(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du sems shing na ba dang/ zas zhu nas lto spo bar 'gyur ba dang/ /de ltar na na ba kha zas zos shing longs spyad na sla bar 'gyur ba dang/ rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la sogs pa 'byung bar dogs shing yid gnyis su 'gyur ba dang/ yun ring zhig na bshad pa
153a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing thogs lan bar 'gyur ba dang/ bska ba dang sla ba la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan par 'byung ba yin no/ /mkhris pas sngo zhing ser ba dang/ /ser po sla bag 'khyu bar 'gyur/ /mnam zhing sgregs skyur snying lkog tsha/ /yi ga 'chus shing skom dad che
153b1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho ba'i nad ni 'khru ba sngo zhing ser ba 'dren mar 'byung ba 'am/ ser por 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ju dka' zhing/ zas slon yi ga 'chus pa dang/ /khang chags mchil ma mang ba dang/ /lud pa snying nad cham pas
153b2(mdo 'grel): 'debs/ /snying ga mer mer por sems shing/ /lto ba tshor bar chung zhing lci/ /sgregs pa dri mnam par 'byung snyoms/ /bud med mi dga' me drod chung/ /be'u snabs bad kan 'dres par 'khru/ /bshang ba gci ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ring ba min yang nyams stobs chung/ zhes bya
153b3(mdo 'grel): ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad kyis 'khru ba ni/ /kha zas 'ju bar bka' zhing ring zhig nas 'ju bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang/ snying ga mer mer por gyur cing khengs snyam du sems pa dang/ lto bar tshor ba chung zhing lus lci ba dang/
153b4(mdo 'grel): sgregs pa mnam zhing shas che ba'i legs par mi 'byung ba dang/ yan lag snyoms pa dang/ bud med la dga' ba med cing nyal po la mi gdud ba dang/ me drod chung zhing bshad ba be'u snabs la sogs pa dang ldan par 'byung ba dang/ ring pa min zhing sha ma
153b5(mdo 'grel): zad kyang nyams stobs chung zhing nus pa zhan par 'gyur ba yin no/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid 'dren mar ldan/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad bzhi gsum char las byung ba'i pho ba'i nad ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan zhing rtags kun 'dres pa yin no/ /ma snyoms la sogs me drod
153b6(mdo 'grel): gsum/ yan lag char phye gang bshad pa/ /de yang pho ba'i nang du 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ ma snyoms pa la sogs pa'i me drod gsum ste/ me drod ma snyoms pa dang/ me drod shas che zhing rno ba dang/ zhan cing rtul ba gsum po lus kyi gnas su yan lag char phye ba'i
153b7(mdo 'grel): skabs su bshad pa gang yin pa de yang pho ba'i nang du 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no/ /snyoms pa bder gnas rgyu yin no/ /zhes bya ba la/ yang me drod ma nyams shing snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni lus bde bar gnas shing nad med pa'i rgyu yin no/ /rlung nad rde'u nad mdze nad dang/ gcin
154a1(mdo 'grel): rnying mu rdzings mtshan mar rdol/ /gzhang 'brum po nad ces bya brgyad/ /nad chen gso bar dka' ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ pho ba'i nad kyi zhar la/ rlung nad la sogs pa brgyad po ni nad chen po yin zhing shin tu gso dka ba yin par bshad ba yin no/ /
154a2(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dgal bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ nad bzhi'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'i rnam par bgrel ba'o// //de nas gcin 'gags pa'i nad gzhi
154a3(mdo 'grel): bshad bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel ba ni 'di yin te/ dri mar gas pa'i nad gzhi'i le'u bshad nas/ gci ba zhes bya ba'i dri ma dangs ma'i nad gzhi'i le'u gnyis kyi bshad pa yin te/ gcin 'gag pa ni gcin sri ba la sogs pa ste
154a4(mdo 'grel): de'i nad bzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes ba'o/ /lgang ba lgang pa'i mgo po mtshan/ rked pa rlig pa gzhang kha ni/ /gzhang kha'i rus par rten gyur cig gcig tu 'brel pa yin par bshad/ ces bya ba la/ lgang pa la sogs pa lus kyis char gtogs pa rnams ni
154a5(mdo 'grel): 'brel pa gcig cing mdor bsdus ba gcig yin par bshad la/ de dag gi gnas sam rten ni gzhang gi nang nas gnas te/ de dang 'brel lam zhes bya ba'i don no/ /lgang pa kha ni thur bltas kyang/ /gcin 'dzag pa yi rtsa sgo nas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag
154a6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /ngos gnyis nas ni 'bre'us 'gengs zhugs pa gang yin de yis ni/ /gcin 'gag pa dang gcin snyi ba'i/ /gso dka nad la brten pa'i ga nad/ /nyi shu skyed par byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gang gi phyir lgang ba de ni kha thur du bltas te gnas
154a7(mdo 'grel): pa yin du zin kyang/ /gcin 'dzag cing rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa'i sbubs phra mo phra mo las rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag cing 'bab bar byed pa'i rtsa'i ngos gnyis na gnas pa de las gcin gyi pre'u 'dzag pas lgang par 'gengs par byed la/ gang las zhugs pa'i rtsa de nyid
154b1(mdo 'grel): kyi sgo nas rlung la sogs pa'i nang zhugs nas/ de las gcin 'gag pa'i nad nyi shu dang/ gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu gso zhing bcos par dka' ba'i nad kyi gnas la sgyed par 'gyur ro/ /lgang ba chu so pho mtshan na cung zad yang dang yang ba 'byung/ /sri ba rlung las gyur ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur
154b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i gcin sri ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ skyes bu lgang ba dang chu so'i phyogs pho mtshan lhag bar na zhing/ /gcin cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur ser cha na/ /mdog dmar zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i gcin mdog ser por 'byung ba'i/
154b3(mdo 'grel): mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dra bar 'byung la/ de dag kyang cha ba dang na ba dang bcas par 'byung yin/ /bad kan las gyur pa/ lgang pa pho mtshan lci zhing skrangs/ /'byar bag dal gyis byung zhing thogs/ zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur ba'i gcin 'gag pa ni/ lgang pa dang po mtshan gnyis
154b4(mdo 'grel): lci ba dang/ skrangs bar 'gyur ba dang 'byar bag dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas pas 'gags shing gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kun las byung mtshan ldan/ zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum char 'dus ba'i gcin sri ba ni nad kyis mtshan nyid gsum char dang ldan pa yin no
154b5(mdo 'grel): gang tshe rlung gis lgang ba'i kha/ /bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa/ bad kan khu tshur bcas pa ni rims kyis skams par byed pa las/ /mi bzad te'u chags 'gyur te/ /ba lang mkhris par 'gi'u lgam ltar/ /thams cad bad kan brten 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gang gi tshe rlung gis
154b6(mdo 'grel): nad 'khrugs par gyur nas/ lgang ba'i kha bkag nas gnas pa de'i tshe gcin mkhris pa dang bcas ba'am/ bad kan dang bcas ba 'am/ khu chu dang bcas pa'i rim gyis skams par byed kyi/ /gcin 'ba' zhig skams pa ni mi byed la/ de'i tshe ni rde'u chags par 'gyur te/
154b7(mdo 'grel): de yang mi bzad par na zhing gso dka' zhing thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de yang dper na ba lang gi mkhris pa skams zhing mthas pa'i rims kyis 'gi wang skye ba dang/ 'dra bar rde'u chags par 'gyur ro/ /de yang thing bad kan la brten cing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yi sngon tshul
155a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid ni/ /lgang ba spo zhing de yi ni/ /nyen kor tu rab tu ni/ /gcin yang lhag par 'bre bro zhes/ /gcin 'gag rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /zhes bya ba la/ de nas rde'u chags pa 'di'i sngon byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam rtags ni lgang ba spo zhing rgyas ba dang/ de
155a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du de'i nyen kor lgang ba'i mgo dang/ pho mtshan dang rlig pa la sogs pa kun tu thog thag rab tu na zhing zug pa dang/ gcin dbre la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid lte ba dang/ lgang mgo lgang pa'i srubs na zhing/ de yis gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas/ /gcin gyis rgyu ni/
155a3(mdo 'grel): 'chad byung 'byung/ /de byung zin nas bde bar byed/ /skra zhing ba lang tshil 'dra la/ /de skyod ba yis khrag tu 'gyur/ drag shul spyod bas rab tu na/ /zhos bya ba la/ spyi'i mtshan nyid dam thun mong gi rtags ni lte ba la sogs par ni zhang zug pa dang/ rde'u chags pa des
155a4(mdo 'grel): gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun srang gi sgo bkag pas/ gcin gyis rgyun chad cing sul sul 'byung ba dang/ de phyung zin cing de dang bral nas bde bar byed pa yin pa 'am/ yang na rde'u sa bkag pa de bzhin du 'gyur na bde bar 'byung ba yin no/ /gcin 'byung ba de yang dang zhing
155a5(mdo 'grel): sla la ba lang gi tshil 'dra ba 'byung ngo/ /yang skyod cing rta la sogs pa'i gzhon pas g.yengs par gyur na khrag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ drag shul gyi spyod lam tshar bcad brgyug pa 'am/ smyung ba byas pas rab tu na zhing mi bde bar 'gyur/ /de la rlung gyur shin tu na/ so
155a6(mdo 'grel): 'thams sdom zhing lus 'dar la/ /pho mtshan nyed cing lte ba 'tshir/ /rgyun tu na zhing 'khun par byed/ /bshang ba phyen dang bcas par 'byung/ /gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang 'ang/ /rde'u gnag cing rtsub pa dang/ chu sor chor med gang snyam byed/ /ces bya ba la/ /rde'u chags de
155a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi nad nas rlung las gyur pa'i rde'u chags par 'gyur ba ni/ shin tu bas gzer cing de nyid kyi na so 'thams par sdom zhing krig krig 'cha' bar 'gyur ba dang/ lus 'dar zhing bskyod pa dang/ pho mtshan nyed par byed pa dang/ lte ba'i phyogs lag pa gnyis kyi 'chir
155b1(mdo 'grel): bar byed ba dang nyin mtshan rgyun du 'khun zhing dang ro 'byin pa dang/ bshad ba phyen dang bcas par 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no/ /mkhris pa ljang ba tsha ba dang/ /bcos ba snyam byed rab tu khro/ /go bye'i 'bras bu dbyibs 'dra la/ /rde'u mdog dmar zhing sar la gnag /ces bya ba la/ mkhris pa las rgyur ba'i
155b2(mdo 'grel): rde'u chags pas ni lgang ba shin tu na zhing bcos pa snyam du byed la/ de bzhin du rab tu dro zhing tsho ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rde'u'i dbyibs kyang ser shing 'bras bu'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba la/ rde'u'i kha dog kyang dmar ser du 'dug cing rtsa gnag ba yin no/ /bad kan gyi bsil lci ba dang/ /lgang
155b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang du zug cing na/ /rde'u che zhing 'jam pa la/ /sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na dkar /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i rde'u chags pa ni reg na bsil ba dang rang bzhin lci ba dang/ ljang ba'i nad lag gis btsugs pa ltar na ba la sogs pa yin no/ /'di dag byas pa rnams la ni
155b4(mdo 'grel): phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gnas dang sha ni chud pa'i phyir/ /gzung dang dbyung ba bde ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rde'u chags pa gsum po 'di dag ni phal cher ram/ mang du byis pa rnams las 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /de yang byis pa rnams la 'byung ba na rde'u
155b5(mdo 'grel): bzung ba dang dbyung bar bde ba yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas dang sha chung ba'i phyir te/ lgang pa chud pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ sha chung zhing srab pa'i phyir gzung ba dang/ dbyung ba gnyis ga bde ba yin no/ /mi chen khu ba las byung rde'u/ /khu ba bkag las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnas las 'phos
155b6(mdo 'grel): pa phyir ma byung/ /rlig par gnas pa rlung gis ni/ skams nas nye bar bsdus gyur pa/ /de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin/ /ljang pas gcin ni sri byed cing/ /cha zhing skrangs par byed pa yin no/ /mi chen po lta bu la 'byung ba'i rde'u 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de yang khu ba bkag pa'i gzhi las
155b7(mdo 'grel): byung la/ de yang khu ba gnas las 'phos par gyur cing/ nyal po spyod pa'i bar cha du gyur pas/ phyi ma lam log par song ba de rlig pa/ dag gi bar na gnas pas na/ rlung gis bsdus de khu ba de skams nas gong por gyur pa de ni khu ba'i rde'u chags pa zhes byas la/ de yang lgang par gcin smri ba las so
156a1(mdo 'grel): bar byed cing rlig par skrangs par byed pa yin no/ /de ni skyes ma thag tu ni/ khu ba zhu ste sla bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rde'u skyes ma thag ring po ma lon par khu ba zhu zhing sla bag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der man man zhu bar byed/ ces bya ba la/ rde'u e
156a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs gang du chags pa'i phyogs der mnan pa tsam gyis zhu zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas/ /rlung gis phye mar bshig gyur pa/ /de 'dir tshul bzhin 'byung zhes bya/ /gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung 'gyur/ /lugs bzhin mi 'byung rde'u chags/
156a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ khu ba rde'u chags pa rlung gis phye mar bshig pa ni gseg ma lta bu zhes bya ste/ gseg ma phye ma lta bur de rlung tshul bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur bas ni gcin dang lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ rlung lugs bzhin mi 'byung ste/ /'khyil na ni rde'u chags par byed gyi
156a4(mdo 'grel): gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung bar mi byed do/ /gcin ni bkag pa byas gyur pas/ /rlung gis ljang ba'i kha bkag nas/ gcin 'gags na zhing g.ya' bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ skyes bus gcin 'byung ba nan gyis bkag par gyur pas de'i skyon gyis rlung gi ljang ba'i sgo bkag nas gcin 'gags shing
156a5(mdo 'grel): g.ya' ba' i nad skyes par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' rong gnas la spags nas/ ljang pa rgyas te kha che zhing mang 'dra sbom zhing log par 'dug/ de ni na zhing tsha bar byed/ /'phar zhing bcus pa snyam du sems/ /thigs la tsam du 'dzag pa dang/ /lgang bcir rgyun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa gnyis po 'di
156a6(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /rlung gi lgang ba'i nad ces bya/ /gso dka' gnyis pa rlung gis yin/ /mthu che zhing gso dka' yin/ zhes bya ba la/ yang rlung lan 'ga' ste/ tshe 'di'am/ tshe rabs gzhan gyi rgyun dbang gis rang 'dug pa'i gnas las spags shing bskyod do/ /lgang pa de rgyas par byas nas
156a7(mdo 'grel): kha'i zheng che ba nad par mngal 'dra ba dang/ spom zhing log par 'dug pa rang gi tshad las che la gnas las 'phos te log par 'dug par gyur na lgang pa der na ba la sogs par 'gyur la gcin thigs pa tsam du nyung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur la/ lgang ba bcig na rgyun tu 'bab cing
156b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rnam pa gnyis pa de dag ni rlung las gyur pa'i lgang pa'i nad ces bya'o/ /de ni gso dka' ba yin la/ de gnyis las kyang gnyis pa ni rlung shas che ba'i phyir shin tu yang gso dka' ba yin no/ /bshang lam dang ni lgang ma yi/ /bar na rlung ni brten gyur pa/ /gtun 'dra sra zhing mtho
156b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /mi 'gyur gnas byed mdud pa can/ /rlung nad gtun 'dra de spos bcas/ /gshang ci phyen ni 'gag byed yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ bshang ba'i lam ni gshang dang lgang ba'i bar na rlung brten cing gnas par 'gyur ba de ni gtun 'dra zhing de'i rnam pa can yin la/ gzhang yang mtho zhing
156b3(mdo 'grel): 'thug lo mi 'byung bar gnas pa'i mdud can lta bu de ni spos pa dang bcas pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/ /log rgyu dang phyil bar byed pa yi/ /rlung gis chu sor mi bzang gzer/ /gcin la zhugs te 'khyil byed cing/ /rengs byed lci zhing bcus snyam byed/ gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas
156b4(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /yang na bshang gci gtor tshe 'byung/ /'di ni rlung nad 'khyil pa yin zhes bya ba la/ rlung thur du rgyu ba'i lam 'gag te/ khyil nas zlum por gnas pa de chu sor brten par gyur na/ mi bzad pa'i gzer ba bskyed de gcin la zhugs nas gcin de'i khyil zhing sri bar byed pa la sogs pa'i
156b5(mdo 'grel): tshul byed pa 'am/ yang na gcin nyung shas nyung shas 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu'i rlung las gyur pa'i gcin nad de ni khyil pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /gcin ni yun ring 'gag gyur ba/ /sri zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ gcin thon nas ni nad tsha ba bas 'bri/ /zhes bya ba la/ yang gcin yun ring zhig
156b6(mdo 'grel): bkag cing brnags par gyur pa ni phyis gtong ba'i tshe sri zhing bde blag tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ de ni gcin thon nas nad tsha bas 'bri ba'i gcin nad ces bya'o/ /gcin bag pa yis gnod gyur ba/ /gang tshe rlung gi gso bzlog gyur gyur pa/ /lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar gcin gyis gang gyur de'i tshe rab tu na zhing sbo ba dang/ zas
156b7(mdo 'grel): mi zhu zhing me drod 'gags/ /de ni lto gcin 'gags shes bya/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin bkag cing mnags pa'i skyon gyis nang du gyur pa de ni dus gang gi tshe rlung gis gyen du bzlog par gyur pa'i tshe lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar du na ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur te/ de ni lto bar gcin
157a1(mdo 'grel): 'gags pa zhes bya'o/ /gcin 'byung bu ga 'chus pa 'am/ rlung gis 'gags nas gcin nyung 'byung/ /lgang pa mtshad sbubs nor bur ni/ /gnas nas de 'gro rims kyi 'dzag /nad bcas pa 'am nad med pa/ /gcin ni chang dang bcas par
157a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /lhag ma lus te mtshan lci yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin 'byung ba'i bu ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i skyon nam/ yang na rlung gis 'gags pas gcin nyung du 'byung zhing/ sri bar 'gyur ba dang/ de yang lgang ba 'am mtshan gyis spubs bsam/
157a3(mdo 'grel): pho mtshan gyi rtse mo ni nor bu zhes bya ba la gnas nas rim gyis 'dzag bar 'gyur zhing/ de nad dang bcas pa 'am nad med par gcin chad cing sri bag dang bcas pas 'byung la/ 'byung ba'i lhag ma lus pas mtshan lci bar 'gyur pa yin te/ pho mtshan
157a4(mdo 'grel): khor lci ba'o/ /lgang pa'i kha nang zlum zhing sra/ cung zhig 'phral du 'byung 'gyur na/ gcin sogs rde'u lta bu de ni/ gcin gyi mdud par de bshad do/ /zhes bya ba la/ lgang pa'i kha'i nang zlum por gnas la/ sra bar gyur cing cung zhig 'phral du
157a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung la/ de lta bu'i nang de ni rde'u 'gags pa lta bur na la/ mtshan ma de lta bur na ba la ni gcin gyi mdud pa zhes bya'o/ /gcin snyoms pa las nyal po byas la/ /rlung gis khu ba skyod gyur ba/ /gnas las bskyod cing gcin gtor tshe/ sngon nam
157a6(mdo 'grel): phyi nas thal chu dang/ mdog 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ khu ba 'debs par de bshad do/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin snyom zhing 'byung bar 'dod pa dang/ skyes pas bud med la nyal po byas na/ rlung gi khu ba bskyod cing g.yos par gyur pas
157a7(mdo 'grel): gnas las bskyod cing 'phos par gyur pa de gcin gtong ba'i gcin gyi sngon du 'am gcin gyis phyi nas thal chu dang mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni khu ba dang gcin 'dres pa zhes bya'o/ /rtsub cing snyems la rlung gis ni/ /gang tshe
157b1(mdo 'grel): rtug skams nad gyur pa/ /gcin 'byung pu par song nas ni/ /bshang ba dang dres de'i tshe/ /gcin ni bshang ba 'di ci na 'byung/ /bshang ba 'gags par de bshad do/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu khong rtsub ces skyems por 'gyur pa dag /rlung gi nad kyis gang gi cha rtug skams kyi
157b2(mdo 'grel): nang du 'gyur zhing/ gyen du bsgyur 'gyur ba na/ de'i tshe gcin 'byung ba'i bu gar song zhing kun tu khyab pa dang/ bshang ba dang gci na 'dres par gyur ba des na gcin de bshad ba'i dri ma can du 'gyur khrid? 'byung la/ de lta bu'i gcin sa bde ni bshang ba 'gag
157b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i gcin sri ba zhes bya bar bshad do/ /mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni/ rno ba nyin mtshan lam sogs kyis/ 'phel zhing rlung ni zhugs gyur pa/ /lgang ba'i nyan kor tsha zhing na/ /gcin ni ser por 'byung gyur pa 'am/ /yang na khrag bcas khrag nyi? 'byung
157b4(mdo 'grel): tsha zhing sri yi yang yang 'byung/ /de ni tsha rlung zhes byar bshad ces bya ba la /mkhris pa'i che zhing rtsol ba drag pa la sogs pas rlung zhugs pas bskyod pas gyur pa la ni lgang ba'i nyen kor chi ba la sogs pa'i nad 'byung ste/ /da ni gcin si ba'i tsha rlung zhes
157b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba yin no/ /rtsab cing lus ni rmya ba yin/ lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa rlung/ /gcin zad tsha dang na bar bcas/ /skyed pa de yang bskad bshad/ /bad kan mkhris pa gnyis ka la/ rlung gis bskyed par gyur na ni/ /de tshe gcin sri ser ba dang/ dmar
157b6(mdo 'grel): zhing dkar la bski ba 'byung/ /de ni tsha bcas gi wi 'am/ /dung gi phye ma'i mdog 'dra 'am/ yang na skam zhing mdag kun ldan/ /de ni gcin nyams nang du bshad/ ces bya ba la/ skyes bu khong rtsub cing lus rmya zhing nyal chud par gyur pa la/ gang gi tshe
157b7(mdo 'grel): lgang bar gnas pa'i mkhris pa dang/ rlung gnyis ni gcin zad pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de/ de yang mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur ba'i gcin sri ba'i nad ces bya ba de skad du bshad do/ /yang gang gi tsham bris pa dang bad gan gnyis la yang rlung
158a1(mdo 'grel): gis bskyod cing g.yos par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gcin shes tshor sri zhing kha dog ser po la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /de yang tsha ba dang bcas shing gi waM la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i mdog ma/ yang na skam zhing mdog thams
158a2(mdo 'grel): cad dang ldan par 'byung ste/ de ni gcin nyams pa'i nad ces bya'o/ /drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/ /de ltar gcin 'gags las 'byung ba'i/ /mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni/ /de 'og gcin snyi las byung ba'i/ /nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin
158a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis sngar rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul gyis/ gcin 'gags shing sri ba las byung ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad cing bstan nas/ de'i 'og tu gcin snyi zhing 'dzag pa las byung ba'i nad
158a4(mdo 'grel): gzhi'i mtshan nyid drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ nad
158a5(mdo 'grel): gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o// //de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni/ /de 'og gcin snying ba las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa
158a6(mdo 'grel): yin zhes gzhung rtsom pa nyid kyis bshad pa las shes par bya'o/ /gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shu ste/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shur 'gyur ro/ /ste zhes bya ba ni tshig lhag ma'o/ /de la bad kan las gyur bcu/ /mkhris pa las drug rlung gyur
158a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi/ zhes bya ba la/ de la gcin snyi ba'i nad nyi shu las/ gcin nad za khu bcu ni bad kan las gyur pa yin te/ chu 'dra ba dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba 'dra ba dang/ gar bo dang chang 'dra ba dang/ 'bras btags pa'i chu 'dra ba dang/ khu chu 'dra ba dang/
158b1(mdo 'grel): bye ma lta bu dang/ bsil mo dang/ bags kyi 'byung ba dang/ kha chu ltar 'byung ba'i za khu zhes bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ni drug ste/ nas tshigs 'khus pa'i thal chu 'dra ba dang/ sngon po dang/ nag po dang/ skyer ba 'dra ba dang tsong khur 'dra ba dang/ khrag 'dra ba?
158b2(mdo 'grel): ste rnam pa drug yin no/ /rlung las gyur pa ni bzhi ste/ zhag dang rkang glang tshe za khu dang/ sbrang rtsi lta bu gcin snyi ba'i nang ngo/ /de rnams tshil gcin bad kan skyed/ /zas dang skom gyi tshul las ni/ /phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed/ /mngar dang skyur dang lan
158b3(mdo 'grel): tshwa dang/ /lci zhing 'khyil pa bsil ba dang/ /'bru mar chang dang gsher ba'i sha /dar ba bu ram bu ram shing/ gnas gcig stan gcig la brtags nas/ /mal stan cho gar mi ldan la/ /brten nas gcin snyi'i nad bskyod byed/ ces bya ba la/ gci'i snyi
158b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad nyi shu bo de dag ni las dang kha zas dang/ spyod tshul dang gcin dang bad kan skyed par byed pa de la byung zhing/ phal cher te mang du de dag 'byung zhing/ gcin snyi ba'i nad skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin la/ gzhan yang mngar ba nas bu ram shing gi
158b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyi dngos po ming gis smos pa'i zas dang skom yang de 'byung bar byed pa yin la/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa gnas gcig dang stan gcig la rtag tu gnas pa la sogs pa'i bya ba de skyed par gtogs pa dang/ mal stan cho ga dang mi ldan pa ste
158b6(mdo 'grel): stan rlan can dang grang ba la sogs pa'i lam na gnas pa las gcin nad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan 'khrugs pas lgang par gcin/ snyi 'gyur lus gsher rdul tshil dang/ /sha blongs lgang bar rten gcin snyi/ /mkhris pa
158b7(mdo 'grel): khrag kyang zad byas nas/ bad kan sogs zad gcin nad skyed/ ces bya ba la/ bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las lus kyi gsher bag dang rdul la sogs pa blongs shing gnod par byas la/ khrag kyang zad par byas nas bad kan las gyur pa
159a1(mdo 'grel): yang zad par byas nas/ gcin la gnas pa'i mkhris pas gcin nad za khu skyed par byed do/ /rlung 'khrugs pa dang de zad las/ /lus zungs lgang bar 'khus te skyed/ /ces bya ba la/ lus zungs rnams dang rlung 'khrugs shing ldang
159a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ mkhris pa la sogs pa zad pas dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lus kyi bcud gyur pa lgang par 'khru zhing 'dus par byas nas gcin snyi ba'i nang skyed par byed do/ /de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang/ spang bya gcin nad rnam gsum 'gyur
159a3(mdo 'grel): mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang/ nad dmigs chen po nyid kyis 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa dang/ rlung de dag las byung ba'i gcin snyi ba'i nad ni gso bar bya ba dang/ re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gnas pa dang/ spang bar bya ste/ rnam pa
159a4(mdo 'grel): gsum du 'gyur la/ de yang mdog ni mi mthun par bya ba ste/ gang gi phyir snum pa la sogs pa rlung nad la phan pa de ni bad kan la gnod la/ gang kha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa bad kan la phan de na rlung la gnod do/ /de bzhin du mkhris pa
159a5(mdo 'grel): la phan pa bsil ba dang/ mngar ba dag ni rlung dang bad kan la gnod de/ gzhan yang nad dmigs chen po'i dpyad kyis kyang 'byung ste/ mi mthun pa'i gsog lus zung zad cing skyem pa'i lus 'jig par byed pa'i nad dmigs chen po'i
159a6(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis 'byung ngo/ /de rnams kyis ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/ gcin ni rnyog ma can mang du 'byung/ de las khyad par nyid dang ni/ gcin gyi mdog sogs dbye ba yis/ gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad thams
159a7(mdo 'grel): cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang/ rtags ni gcin rnyog ma can dul dul po mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gnod dang gnod bya khyad med kyang/ gcin snyi'i dbye ba du mar 'gyur ba de ni 'dus shing phrad pa'i khyad par nyid de/ gnod
159b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang gnod par bya ba'i 'phel 'byi'i? khyad par nyid dang/ gcin gyis mdog dang ro dang dri dang reg bya'i khyad par las gcin snyi ba'i dbye ba brtag par bya zhing yongs su shes par bya'o/ /dang zhing mang la dkar zhing bsil/ /dri nga med cing chu 'dra la/ gcin pa'i
159b2(mdo 'grel): chu yi za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin snyi ga'i nad chu'i za khu zhes bya ba ni dang zhing rnyog ma med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i chu'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /cung zad rnyog can sbyin bag dang/ bu ram shing khu
159b3(mdo 'grel): lta bur mngar/ /za khu bu ram shing khu yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin nang za khu bu ram shing lta bu ni cung zad rnyog pa yod pa la sogs pa la bu ram shing gi khu ba ltar shin tu mngar ba'i gcin 'byung ba yin no/ /zhag lon na ni bska bar 'gyur/
159b4(mdo 'grel): za khu gar po zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'o/ gcin nad za khu gar po ni gcin mtshan mo 'das kyi bar du ma gcis par bzhag pa ste bska ba'i gar por 'byung ba yin no/ /steng na dangs ma 'og na ska/ /chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/
159b5(mdo 'grel): gcin nad chang gi za khu zhes bya ba la phyir byung ba na steng gi phyogs dangs mar gnas shing/ 'og de ska bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de lta bu'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o/ /ba spu ldang zhing 'bras btangs 'dra/ dkar zhing mang 'byung 'bras phye 'dra/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu 'dras phye
159b6(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba ni/ gcin 'byung ba na ba spu ldang zhing bshor la /gcin nyid 'bras btags pa 'dra bar dkar po 'byung zhing mang du 'byung ba yin no/ /khu chu 'dra ba 'am/ khu ba 'dres/ /khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu khu
159b7(mdo 'grel): chu 'dra ba ni gcin khu ba dang bcas par 'byung ba 'am/ khu ba dang 'dra bar gces pa la bya'o/ /gcin ni bye tshigs dri ma can/ /bye ma'i za khu zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad bye ma'i za khu zhes bya ba ni bye ma'i tshigs ma 'dra bar dri ma
160a1(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa'i gzugs can 'dra ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no/ /gcin snyi mang po 'byung zhing bsil/ /mngar ba de bsil za khu yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad bsil ba'i za khu zhes bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i reg pa bsil zhing mang du
160a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba la ro mngar ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no/ /dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung/ /bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu zhes bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i rgyu nad? la gyis nyung zad nyung zad du chad
160a3(mdo 'grel): cing chad cing 'byung ba yin no/ /khu chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po/ /'byil bag khu chu'i za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu 'dra ba ni kha chu 'dra bar ni za khu nal nal por 'byung zhing 'byar bag can du 'byung ba yin no/ /de ltar bad kan las
160a4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba bcur bshad pa yin no/ /dri ro kha dog reg bya ni/ nas tshigs 'khus 'dra nas tshigs can/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad nad tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba 'dra ba ni nas tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba'i chu dang dri dang ro la sogs pa 'dra zhing
160a5(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa la bya'o/ /za khu sngon po kha dog sngo/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu sngon po zhes bya ba ni mdab ma sngon po'i khu ba 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o/ /za khu nag po snag tsha 'dra/ zhes bya ba la/ za khu nag po ni snag tsha'i mdo ltar gcin
160a6(mdo 'grel): nag po 'byung ba la bya'o/ /gcin snyi tsha zhing mdog ser ba/ /de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu skyer pa 'dra ba ni gcin tsha zhing gcin gyis mdog skyer pa'i khu ba 'dra ba 'byung ba yin no/ /mnam zhing bcod kyi khu ba 'dra/ btsod kyi
160a7(mdo 'grel): za khu zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ za khu btsod 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni dri mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra ba mnam pa'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o/ /dri nga cha zhing lan tshwad bcas/ /khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ za khu khrag 'dra ba ni dri nga zhing
160b1(mdo 'grel): mnam la tsha tseg tseg byed pa dang/ cung zad lan tshwa bro ba dang/ khrag gong dog 'dra ba de 'byung ba yin te/ de ltar na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ga'i nad drug bshad pa yin no/ /zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres/ /zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin/ /
160b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ za khu zhag 'dra ba ni/ zhag 'dren mar 'byung ba 'am/ zhag nyid gcin gyi rnam par 'byung ba yin no/ /rkang 'dres pa 'am rkang nyid ni/ /yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu/ /zhes bya ba la/ za khu rkang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni/ rkang dang 'dres pa dang/ rkang
160b3(mdo 'grel): nyid yang dang yang du gcin du za khur 'byung ba ni/ gcin dang rkang 'dra ba'i za khu zhes bya'o/ /glang chen myos ltar rgyun du ni/ /gcin shugs dal bar 'byung 'gyur ba/ /chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung/ glang chen za khu zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/
160b4(mdo 'grel): glang po che'i za khu ni glang po che dreg pas myos pa ltar rgyun du 'byung zhing gcin gyi shugs dal gyis 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu ser dang bcas par 'byung zhing 'dzas par 'gyur pa la bya'o/ /sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /zhes bya ba la/ za khu sbrang rtsi
160b5(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba zhes bya ba la/ sbrang rtsi dang 'dra zhing ro yang bka' ba dang mngar bar 'byung ba yin no/ /de ni rnam pa gnyis su gyur/ lus zungs zad pas rlung 'khrugs pa 'am/ nad kyis rtsa spubs bkag ste 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khu de ni/ rnam
160b6(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes grag ste/ lus zungs rnams zad pa las/ /rlung 'khrugs pas nang du gyur pa'i gcin yin no/ /yang na nad gzhi gsum gang yang rung bas rtsa spubs bkag ste/ rlung rgyur ma ster ba las byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis
160b7(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag /de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing/ skad cig zad stobs gang 'gyur ba/ gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra ba zhes bya ba de/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis lgang ba'i kha
161a1(mdo 'grel): bkag cing/ spu gu 'gags par byas pa'i mtshan ma 'am rtags ni 'byung zhing skye ba'i rgyu med par skad cig cing stongs par 'gyur la/ stongs nyid las kyang/ ched 'ga' 'gengs shing gang ba lta bur snang bar 'gyur te/ de ni
161a2(mdo 'grel): gso bar dka' ba nyid yin no/ /thams cad dus sum bcas na/ sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'byung/ gang zhig thams cad mngar gyur pas/ phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin/ sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun/ mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/
161a3(mdo 'grel): gcin nad za khu thams cad kyang sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de thams cad dus su ma bcos shing ma gsos na sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'gyur ba dang/ yang gang zhig gcin nad thams cad lus mngar ba'i bag las mngar bar 'gyur cing/
161a4(mdo 'grel): phal cher sbrang rtsi lta bu'i mdog can yin pas sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ba'i sgrar bshad do/ /zas mi 'du zhing yi ga 'chus/ /slon lud gnyid che cham bas 'debs/ bad kan las byung za khu la/ /bla gnyan de dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la/
161a5(mdo 'grel): bad kan las byung ba'i za khus ni zas mi 'ju ba la sogs pa'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /pho tshan lgang bar zug pa dang/ rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /cha skyur skom dang brgyal dang 'khrug /mkhris pa las gyur bla gnyan yin/ zhes
161a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin nad la ni pho mtshan dang lgang ba'i phyogs su khab kyi phug ba ltar zug pa dang/ rlig 'bra phye bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung las skyes pa'i snying 'phar zhing/ /lus 'dar
161a7(mdo 'grel): snying na zas la brkam/ /gnyer zhing gnyid med skem pa dang/ lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i za khu'i nad la ni snying 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kham por du sbal 'dra ba can/ /dgu po
161b1(mdo 'grel): mang? ba'i? phra mo dang/ /sran chung 'dra dang yungs dkar 'dra bu bcas 'byung dang bi da re khong 'bras zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu/ gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung/ /tshigs dang gnad dang sha che ba'i/ /srog gis gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/
161b2(mdo 'grel): gcin nad khu dem? bcos pa las ni kham por 'dra ba la sogs pa'i 'brel gyis nad bcu po 'byung bar 'gyur la/ /de yang khyad par du ni tshigs dang gnad rnams dang/ sha chen la sogs pa srog gi gnas su pa phyung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mdza' ni
161b3(mdo 'grel): mtho zhing dbus mdam la gnag cing rnag la nad ces ba/ dbyibs dang tshad ni kham por 'dra/ /nor bu kham por zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'bras gang tha ma kun nas mtho zhing dbus dma' bar 'dug pas kham phor gyi dbyibs 'dre la/ kha
161b4(mdo 'grel): dog gnag cing rnag dang nad du gnas pa ni 'bras sam thor bu kham phor lta bu zhes bya'o/ /nang du zug cing na byed la/ nyan 'khor dag tu cher nyer cing 'jam zhing ru sbal rgya ba 'dra ba'i/ /'bras nas ru sbal zhes bya/ zhes bya ba la/ rus
161b5(mdo 'grel): sbal can zhes bya bar 'bras nang ni nang du shas cher zug cing na bar byed la/ rtsa ba'i nye 'khor du mtshad ces sbom pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no/ /sa zhing rtsa ba'i dra ba can/ /snam zhing 'dzag la khyon che ba dang/ /na zhing mang
161b6(mdo 'grel): khyug bu ga na/ /phra mang ldan pa dra ba can/ /zhes bya ba la/ thod bu dra ba can zhes bya ba ni sra zhing brtsub ba dang/ rtsa ris kyi dra bas khebs po dang/ snum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no/ /nang du zug cad rna ba rnams/ rgyab bam
161b7(mdo 'grel): lte? ba dag tu ni/ /thor bu chen po kha dog gnag /dgur por 'dug pas sku por bshad/ ces bya ba la/ 'bras nad skur por/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad tsha bas che zhing nad du zug la rnams kyang nad du rnams kyang pa ni/ rgyab la sogs pa'i phyogs gang
162a1(mdo 'grel): yang rung bar skye ba yin no/ /skyes ma thag tu ldags pa cha/ /shin tu na byed me dpal te/ /dmar zhing gnag la khas pa dang/ cha zhing rnags byed me dpal phra/ /zhes bya ba la/ me dbal phra mo zhes bya ba'i nad ni skyes ma thag gi rjes
162a2(mdo 'grel): thogs nyid la bags pa tsha zhing bsreg pa snyam du sems la/ shin tu na ba'i me dbal kun tu mched par byed cing mdog dmar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no/ /sran chung dang ni chad dang dbyibs/ /mnyam pas sran chung can yin te/ tshad
162a3(mdo 'grel): dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra/ /myur du smin cing nad tshabs che/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'brum bu sran chung zhes bya ba ni tshad dang dbyibs san chung dang 'dra ba yin no/ /de bzhin du tshad dang dbyibs yungs dkar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran yang yod de/ /de ni myur du
162a4(mdo 'grel): smin cing nad tshabs che ba yin no/ /yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis/ /yongs su bskor bas shur bu can/ /bu bcas cha zhing mang ba la/ /rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o/ zhes bya ba la/ 'bras nad bu bcas zhes bya ba ni yungs kar 'dra
162a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'brum phran gi yongs su bskor cing/ de bzhin du lhun che ba dang/ mang zhing shin tu phra ba dang/ du mas khyab cing g.yog pa yin no/ /zlum bu bi da ri ltar zlum/ /sra ba bi da ri zhes bya/ zhes bya ba la/ bi da ri zhes bya ba'i 'bras nas ldum bu bi
162a6(mdo 'grel): da ri zhes bya ba'i dbyibs ltar zlum por gnas pa/ de ltar shin tu srab yin no/ /khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad ni skabs gzhan du bshad de/ 'di'i rjes thogs kyis le'u las bshad pa yin no/ /de la
162a7(mdo 'grel): dang po'i 'bras nad gsum/ /bu bcas dang ni bi da ri/ /tshil chen las byung ba rnam dka' yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ de la 'bras kyi nad 'di dag gi nad nas dang po'i gsum par/ zhes bya ba dang/ ru sbal zhes bya ba dang/ dra ba can zhes bya ba gsum
162b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ bu bcas dang bi da ri zhes bya ba lnga po gal te tshil che ba'i mi 'byung na brnag par dka' zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no/ /gzhan dag mkhris pa shes che zhing/ tshil 'byung las byung rnags nus 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ snga ma las gzhan pa'i 'bras nas lhag ma lnga
162b2(mdo 'grel): po mkhris pa'i nad las 'byung zhing/ mi tshil chung ba las byung ba'i yin na/ de ni brnag nus shing nad tshabs chung ba gso sla ba yin no/ /de rnams nad shang ji ltar che'i gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ 'bras bu'i nad de rnams ni
162b3(mdo 'grel): gcin snyi ba'i nad kyis dbang las byung zhing rang rang gi nad ji ltar shas che ba bzhin du/ de'i rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bad kan gyis za khu las ni bad kan shas che bar 'gyur la/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang shas che ba'i za khu las kyang rlung dang
162b4(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa yi 'bras nad du 'gyur ro/ /'di dag za khu med pa ni/ /gnod gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te/ ji srid dngos po mi snang ba/ /de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro/ zhes bya ba la/ thor bur nad 'di dag ni za khu'i nad med par mi tshil ches ba las
162b5(mdo 'grel): nad gyur ba dag las yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni ji srid rang gi dngos po lto dang rgyab la sogs par gsal por mi snang ba de srid kyis bar du shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /kha dog ljang ba 'am dmar pa 'am ljang pa'i gcin/ za khu'i sngon tshul med pa
162b6(mdo 'grel): yi/ gcin 'byung gang de za gu min/ /de ni khrag mkhris yin shes bya/ zhes bya ba la/ gang zhig gcin gyi mdog ljang ba la sogs par byung la/ sngon du byung ba'i tshul med pa de ni za khu'i nad yin par slob dpon gyis ma bshad de/ gcin de ni khrag
162b7(mdo 'grel): mkhris kyi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o/ /lus rdul yan lag mnam zhing ltod pa dang/ stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags/ /snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed/ lus spoms skra dang sen mo ring ba dang/ bsil bag
163a1(mdo 'grel): dga' zhing gre brkan skams shing/ kha nad ro mngar rkang mthil lag mthil tsha/ /gang du gcis par grog mi 'du gyur pa/ /gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu'i tshogs nyi shu po phyi la
163a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags sam tshul sngon du 'byung ba ni/ lus sam rdul 'dzag pa dang yan lag dri nga zhing mnam la/ lhod cing rmya ba dang/ stan la sogs pa la 'dug pa'i bde ba la chags shing sred pa dang/ snying ga la sogs pa lus
163a3(mdo 'grel): kyi bu ga rnams su dri ma 'phel bas byugs shing rkyang nul byas pa snyam du sems pa dang/ lus 'thug cing sbom pa dang/ de bzhin du skra la sogs pa'ang shin tu ring zhing 'phel ba dang/ bsil bag la dga' zhing grang ba 'dod pa dang/ gre ba dang
163a4(mdo 'grel): rkan skams par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no/ /za'u sbrang rtsi mdog 'dra 'byel ba dang sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtogs/ /lus rtas bad kan can gyi za gu 'am/ /nyes pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad
163a5(mdo 'grel): za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba la/ lci zhing 'byil ba sha shalma la'i khu ba 'dra bar gnas pa/ sbrang rtsi'i ro ltar mngar ba la/ skyes bu blo dman pa dag tshul gnyis su rtog cing dpyod par byed de/ lus kyi nyams rtas par byas pa'i dbang gis ci 'di
