163a6(mdo 'grel): bad kan las byung ba yin nam/ yang na bad kan la sog pa'i nyes pa zad par byas pa'i nyams dmad pa las byung ba'i rlung gi bdag nyid can yin zhes blo zhan pa dag rtog par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za
163a7(mdo 'grel): khu dang/ /gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur gyur/ mkhris pa las gyur pa gang yin gso bar dka' / /gal te tshil nad shas chung gyur gso sla/ zhes bya ba la/ sngon byung ba'i tshul lus rdul ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba'i
163b1(mdo 'grel): bad kan dang/ mkhris pa las gyur ba'i za gu ni gso dka' ba yin la/ de bzhin du gang yang rim gyis bad kan la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i rlung nad kyis za gu de yang gso dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du mkhris pa las rim gyis byung ba'i za gur gyur pa ni/
163b2(mdo 'grel): gso bar dka' ba yin la/ gsor rung ba'i mkhris pa las gyur pa yang yin la/ tshil gyi nad shas che ba yang ma yin na gso bar bla ba yin no// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla
163b3(mdo 'grel): zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// //de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu blugs dang skrad nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad gzhi'i le'u
163b4(mdo 'grel): skabs su slob dpon gyi/ khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin zhes bya ba la/ de'i phyir 'di brtsams pa yin la/ rgyu blugs pa dang skran nad dag de dang tshul mthun pas le'u 'dir brtsam pa yin no/ /kha zas khengs po rab tsha dang/ /rtsubs dang skams dang
163b5(mdo 'grel): tsha gyur zos/ /nyal ba'i spyod pa mi bde ba/ khrag nad skyed 'gyur de dang des/ /pags pa sha tshol rus pa dang/ /khrag dang chu ba chu ba che/ /phyi dang nang du skrangs gyur pa/ /rtsa ba che zhing nad tshabs che/ zlum pa 'am 'jod par gnas pa gang/ /khong 'bras de ni rnam
163b6(mdo 'grel): pa drug /nad dmigs snar 'dus pa dang/ khrag dang rnam pa las byung ba'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ kha zas g.yos zin nas mtshan mo 'das shing zhag lon pa'i khengs po la sogs pa rgyun du zos pa dang/ khrag nad skyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu
163b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag tu bsten pa dang/ des nad bskyed pa pags pa la sogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi cha la brten te/ skrangs par gyur pa gang yinpa de/ rtsa ba che zhing dbyung bar dka' la/ nad tshabs che zhing brnag par dka' ba'i skrangs pa zlum zhing
164a1(mdo 'grel): bzhed ne ba ngam/ /'jod por gnas bas shing spangs ring ba gang yin pa de ni khod 'bras zhes bya ba la/ khod 'bras de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nang sna re re 'das pa dang/ khrag dang rmas pa las byung ba ste rnam pa drug yin no/ /'dir phyir na lag par der/
164a2(mdo 'grel): rab na mdung ba leg gam mo zhes bya ba la/ 'dir khong 'bras gnyis yod pa'i nang nas phyi ni lte ba dang/ gzhang la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang ded mi bzad par rab tu na ba dang/ mdung ba byas shing brgyus bltar/ rdog rdog por 'dug ba dang/ mtho zhing 'phags pa
164a3(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing/ /gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin/ /grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang/ /me dang mtshon ltar myur gsong byed/ /ces bya ba la/ nang gi khong 'bras ni shin tu mi bzad cing brnag bar dka' bar na ba dang/ gting ring zhing nang dus de/
164a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ skran ltar sra zhing rem rem po dag nas de 'ang/ grog mkhar gyis spungs pa'i rtse mo ltar mthong bar gnas pa dang/ phyi'i khong 'bras bas nang gi khong 'bras myur du gsod par byed pa yin te/ de yang me dang mtshon gyis myur du gsod par byed pa dang 'dra bar 'dir yang myur/
164a5(mdo 'grel): du gsod par byed pa yin no/ /lte ba chu so ma chen mched pa/ /glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang/ mkha' ma gnyis sam gzhang duAng 'byung zhes bya ba la/ /khong 'bras de ni lte ba dang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi phyogs cig du 'byung bar
164a6(mdo 'grel): gyur ba yin no/ /de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag /dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni/ /'byung zhing smin ba dbyibs ma snyoms/ ran cing mgo 'khor spo ba dang/ g.yo zhing 'pho zhing sgra dar bcas/ /zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras da rung las gyur pa ni nang tsha bas drag?
164a7(mdo 'grel): cing rno ba dang/ mdog dmar nag du gnas pa dang/ yun ring zhig lon nas 'byung zhing smin ba yin gyi myur du 'byung zhing smin pa yin pa dang/ nad kyi dbyibs mtho dman dang/ che chung mi snyoms pa dang/ tshang ha cang mi tshe zhing ran pa la sogs pa yin
164b1(mdo 'grel): no/ /mkhris byar zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag /skom dang tsha rims mongs bag skyed/ /ldang zhing smin pa myur dbang yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmongs bar ni/ mdog dmar ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa dang/ skom pa la sogs par
164b2(mdo 'grel): ldan par ldang zhing 'byung ba dang/ smin cing rnags pa myur ba yin no/ /bad kan las sga g.ya' dang bcas/ /rlon zhing bsil la sra ba dang/ glal zhing lti la yi ga 'chus/ /'byung zhing smin ba yun dngos thogs/ zhes bya ba la/ de la bad kan las gyur pa'o
164b3(mdo 'grel): khong 'bras ni kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang/ g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa dang/ dus dang smin pa'i dus yun ring du mgor ba yin no/ 'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa la/ 'dus pa las gyur ba'i khong 'bras ni mtshan
164b4(mdo 'grel): nyid dang? ldan pa yin pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid don gyi dbang las shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras bzhi pa 'dir rab tu na ba dang shin tu mi bzad par na ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyi dang nang gnyis kyi mtshan nyid
164b5(mdo 'grel): don gyi dbang las shes par bya ste/ rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid/ /shes pa las phyi nang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye bar bya zhing shes par bya'o/ /de ni 'di skad ston te/ rlung las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid phyi dang nang du rnam
164b6(mdo 'grel): par phye ste/ ma bshad mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmar ba nyid la sogs pa'i phyi rol tu snang bar rigs pa de ni nyid las shes par bya ba la gang yang lto spo pa dang/ yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnam pa yin par 'thad bde ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma
164b7(mdo 'grel): yin par shes par bya'o/ /'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag /rab tshan zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi ma nang/ /khrag gyur bu med nyid la 'byung/ /zhes bya ba la khrag las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni 'brum
165a1(mdo 'grel): bu nag pos khebs shing gang ba yin la/ mdog ni gnag pa yin zhing rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ /mkhris pa'i rtags zangs ltar dmar ba dang sogs pa dang ldan pa de ni phyi'i yin yang rung nang gi yin yang rung ste/ /
165a2(mdo 'grel): de ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni ma yin no/ /mtshon la sogs pas rmas pa yis/ /rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las/ /rma kha'i cha ba rlung gis phul/ /khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung bar byed/ /khong 'bras bla gnyan nad mang zhing/
165a3(mdo 'grel): khrag mkhris mtshan nyid can dag byed/ ces bya ba la/ gang mtshon dang rdo la sogs pas rmas shing snang par gyur pa des rma 'byung ba dang/ mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas bsten cing longs spyod pa sa rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul zhing bskyod pas khrag dang
165a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i mkhris pa 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba de las/ khong 'bras bla gnyan gyi nad mang shing khreg dang mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bla gnyan de'i dbye ba yang/ gnad kyi dbye ba las bshad do/ /zhes
165a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ khong 'bras de rnams kyi bla gnyan nad bla thabs su byung ba de'i dbye ba ni/ rang rang gi gnas sam rten gyi dbye ba las tha dad par gyur par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/ /lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste/ zhes bya ba la/ khong
165a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras de lte bar gyur na bla gnyan sigs bu zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ chu sor khong 'bras byung na gcin 'gags shing 'byung dka' la/ rnag dang bcas shing dri mnam par
165a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mcher ba dbugs mi bde/ zhes bya ba la/ mcher par khong 'bras byung na dbugs mi bde ba'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan par dbugs 'byung la/ gag skom mgo 'khor 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ mchin par
165b1(mdo 'grel): khong 'bras byung na dbugs 'byung ba 'gag cing skom dad dang/ mgo 'khor ba'i nad kyis 'debs pa'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras glo bar byung na rkog ma'i nad rnams su 'gyur ro/ /snying 'byung yan lag
165b2(mdo 'grel): kun gzar snyam/ /ma rmongs mun sros snyam du byed/ snying 'phar na bar 'gyur ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ khyod 'bras snying la byung na lus kyi yan lag kun snying gar shin tu gzer ba snyam sems shing bskyod mi nus pa lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du rab tu
165b3(mdo 'grel): rmongs shing 'du shes ltar bar 'gyur ba dang/ mun par zhugs pa snyam du sems pa dang/ snying 'phar zhing g.yo ba dang/ na ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /lto ba rtsib logs phrag pa'i sa/ /na zhing lto spos 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ khong
165b4(mdo 'grel): 'bras lte bar byung na lte ba dang rtsib logs kyi par dang/ /phrag pa gnyis kyi bar du na ba dang/ lto ba de nyid spos shing sgra khrul khrul zer ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chu so 'doms par byung ba brla na/ zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras chu so dang 'doms bar du byung
165b5(mdo 'grel): na brla na zhing 'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyab/ /rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras mkhal ma gnyis su byung na rked pa dang rgyab dang rtsib logs su na zhing zug par 'gyur ro/ /gzhang du rlung ni
165b6(mdo 'grel): thur 'byung 'gag /ces bya ba la/ gzhang gi nang du khong 'bras byung na rlung thur du 'byung ba'i gags byed cing nang na 'khyil par 'gyur ro/ /zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu/ /de dag 'or nang lta bur bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ zhu ba'i gnas dang ma zhu ba'i
165b7(mdo 'grel): gnas dang phyed tsam zhu ba ste/ legs par ma zhu ba'i gnas su byung ba de dag ni 'or nad dam skrang pag gi nad kyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra bar bshad de/ /skran pa chung ba nad tshabs chung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis ston to lte ba yan chad smin
166a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'dzag /ces bya ba la/ khong 'bras lte ba yan chad kyi nang na yod pa de dag smin par gyur na kha'i sgo nas rnag pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag /ces bya ba la/ lte ba man chad
166a2(mdo 'grel): kyi nad na khong 'bras gnas pa las/ smin par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de gzhang gi sgor rnag pa la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /lte bar gnas pa gnyis kar 'dzag /ces bya ba la/ khong 'bras lte ba'i nang du byung na lus kyi dbus na gnas
166a3(mdo 'grel): pa yin pa'i phyir kha dang gzhang gnyis ka nas byung zhing/ 'jog pa yin no/ /khong 'bras kyi ni nang dmigs rnams/ /mdzag las rma ltar shes par bya/ zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras kyi nad bzhi rlung la sogs pa ni rang gi mdzag pa ji lta ba las
166a4(mdo 'grel): rma'i tshul bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar rma la rnag dang gsher bag 'dzag pa'i tshul las nad bzhi'i tshul shes par bya ba mdo'i gnas su ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang tshul de dang 'dra bar brtag par bya'o/ /de las 'dus pa las gyur
166a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ snying dang lte ba chu sor gnas/ phyi 'am nang du dbye ba 'am/ /smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni/ /nyam chung bla gnyan ldan pa spang/ /zhes bya ba la 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin
166a6(mdo 'grel): du rlung la sogs pa 'ba' zhig las gyur pa yin yang snying ga dang lte ba dang chu sor gnas pa yang spang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin ma bud med bu btsas pa 'am/ sbrum ma nu zho yod pa dang/ nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi/ /rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas/
166a7(mdo 'grel): phyi yi? khong 'bras mtshan nyid can/ /skrangs shing sra ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ ji ltar khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad khongs su zos pa la sogs pas skye ba bzhin du bud med bu bcas pa 'am/ sbrum ma nu mar nu zho dang bcas pa 'am/
166b1(mdo 'grel): nu zho med pa'i nu ma'i rtsa kha bye bar phyin nas phyi'i khong bras kyi mtshan nyid rab tu na pa dang/ mdud pa 'dra zhing mtho ba la sogs pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de yang skrang ba dang sra ba'i rang bzhin can du 'byung bar 'gyur te de ni nu ma'i khong 'bras zhes bya ba yin no/ /? ?
166b2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang nu rtse'i sgo/ /phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la/ nu ma'i khong 'bras de ni bu mo gzhon nu lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i nu ma'i rtsa sgo shin tu phra bas de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /rlung ni rgyu 'am 'gags
166b3(mdo 'grel): pas 'khrugs/ /skrang dang gzer ni skyed cing rgyu/ chu so rlig par phyin pa dang/ /rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni/ brtsir nas rlig pa pags pa dang/ 'phel zhing rlig blugs nyid du byed/ ces bya ba la/ rlung rang gi rgyu ba'i lam/ 'gags shing phan
166b4(mdo 'grel): tshun rgyu ba'i go skabs chung bar gyur pas 'khrugs shing nad skyed pa na skrangs pa dang gzer pa'i nad bskyed cing rgyu nas rlig pa skrangs par byed cing/ chu so dang rlig par phyin nas de la brten mchin pa'i gnas su rgyu ba'i rtsa dag rab tu
166b5(mdo 'grel): btsir zhing gnod par byas nas rlig pa dang pags pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rlig blugs nyid byed khrag 'gyur ro/ /nad khrag gcin tshil rgyu ma las/ /rlig blugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rlig blugs zhes bya ba'i nad de ni nad
166b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs so so dang khrag las byung ba dang/ gcin dang tshil dang rgyu ma las byung pa ste rnam pa bdun yin no/ /rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'am rlung rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan/ zhes bya ba la/ rgyu ma 'am gcin las skyes pa'i rlig blugs dag
166b7(mdo 'grel): kyang rlung las gyur pa dang 'dra mod kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig gi dbye bas tha dad pa yin no zhing gzhan ma yin no/ /rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing/ reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i rig blugs ni/ reg na rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba
167a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra zhing reg na rtsub pa dang/ de bzhin du rgyu med par glo bur du na bar byed pa yin no/ /mkhris gyur u dum+ba ra yi/ /'bras bu smin 'dra tsha dro 'drul/ /zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rlig blugs kyi nang ni u
167a2(mdo 'grel): dum+ba ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang mdog 'dra la/ de bzhin du tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum/ g.ya' zhing sra la nad tsha bas chung/ zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i rlig blugs kyi nad
167a3(mdo 'grel): ni bsil pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/ /khrag gyur rnag cing 'brum bus khyab/ /mkhris pa'i rlig blugs mtshan nyid ldan/ /zhes bya ba la/ khrag las gyur pa'i rlig blugs ni snag tsha ltar gnag cing 'brum bu
167a4(mdo 'grel): nag pos khyab pa dang/ mkhris pa'i rlig blugs kyi mtshan nyid u dum+ba ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no tshil gyur rlig blugs bad kan 'dra/ /'jam zhing tA la'i 'bras bur mtshungs zhes bya ba la/ tshil las
167a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i rlig blugs kyi nad ni bsil zhing snum la sogs pa bad kan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba dang/ yang de 'jam zhing tA la'i 'bras bu dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no/ /gcin mnags pa la brten pa rnams/ /gcin las
167a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar de 'gyur te/ rgyal ba chu yis gang ba ltar/ /g.yo gyur nad dang bcas shing 'jam/ /gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yis/ /'og tu skrang bar byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ gcin snyoms las brnags shing nan
167a7(mdo 'grel): gyis 'gegs par byed pa la brten pa'i skyes bu rnams la ni gcin las byung ba'i rlig blugs 'byung bar 'gyur te de ni rkyal pa chus gang pa ltar g.yo zhing mgul par 'khrugs par 'gyur la/ de yang nad dang bcas shing
167b1(mdo 'grel): 'jam zhing mnyes par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du gcin 'gags shing sri pa dang/ de bzhin du rlig pa'i 'og tu gdu bu ltar skrangs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rlung 'khrugs pa yi zas dang ni/ /chu grang la ni rkyal pa dang/ shugs bkag btsir dang 'khur dang lam/ yan
167b2(mdo 'grel): lag log par bcus pa dang/ /rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang/ gang tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha/ /rlung gis log par phul gyur te/ /rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod/ /chu so'i tshags su phyin pa dang/ /de tshe mdud pa ltar rlor 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung
167b3(mdo 'grel): 'khrug par byed pa'i kha zas rtsub pa dang bska ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang de bzhin du chu grang mo la rkyal gyis brgal ba dang/ de bzhin du bshang gci'i la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag pa dang/ nan gyis btsir ba dang/ khur la sogs pas gnod par
167b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag gis rlung 'khrug par gyur pa'i dus gang gis tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha ste rgyu ma phre'u phyogs gcig log par gul te rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod cing chu so'i tshigs su rlung gnas pa de'i tshe mdud pa ltar glo ba'i skrang bag skyed par
167b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing/ /spo zhing na la rengs par rlung gis byed/ /rab tu gzer zhing nad na sgra dang bcas/ /gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slor 'byung byed/ /ces bya ba la/ nad de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na rlig pa skye
167b6(mdo 'grel): zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ lto spo zhing rengs par rlung des bskyod par byed pa dang/ yang rlung gis rab tu gzir cing nyen pas nad na sgra dang gnas? shing krul krul zer ba dang/ yang rlung gis gang bar byed cing phyung ba de bcug kyang slar 'byung bar
167b7(mdo 'grel): byed pa yin no/ /rgyu blugs 'di ni gso dka' ste/ /rlung gis rlig blugs 'dra ba yin/ /rtsub cing gnag la dmar ba'i rtsas/ /phra mo 'dri bas khebs pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ rgyu blugs zhes bya ba'i nad 'di ni gso dka' zhing bcas par mi nus
168a1(mdo 'grel): pa yin la/ yang de ni rlung gi rlig blugs dang mtshan ma 'dra ba yin te/ rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing/ /reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/ zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no/ /yang de bzhin du rtsub cing mdog gnag la rtsa dmar ba'i rtsa'i tshogs phra mo'i
168a2(mdo 'grel): dra bas khebs shing khyad par 'gyur ba yin no/ /skran brgyad nad ni so so dang/ /'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang/ zla ba mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis/ /brgyad pa mud mad rnams la 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ skran ni rnam pa brgyad yod de/ /de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi so
168a3(mdo 'grel): so las byung ba gsum dang/ nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur pa gsum dang/ nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa cig dang/ bud med rnams la zla mtshan gyi nad kyi nyes pa las byung ba gcig ste/ de ltar na spyir brgyad yin no//
168a4(mdo 'grel): rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru sogs/ /skyug sman sogs dang las rnams kyis/ /skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang/ bsres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa 'am/ /skom 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni/ /brgyal ba 'phyo ba la sogs pa/ rten pas lus ni dkrugs
168a5(mdo 'grel): byas pas/ /slob mi bro yang skyug pa dang/ /rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba'i/ /shugs bkag pa 'am btsir ba dang/ /snum dang dugs ni ma brten par/ /spyang ba'i las ni byed pa 'am/ /sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang/ bad kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad
168a6(mdo 'grel): rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni/ /so so 'am 'dres pa 'am 'khrugs gyur pa 'am/ /kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas/ /sbugs can la ni brtan gyur nas/ /steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su/ /gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung/ /shin tu mthong zhing
168a7(mdo 'grel): mdud pa'i gzugs/ /skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin zhes bya ba la/ skran 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin du skyugs sman la sogs pa ste/ /skyugs sman dang bkra sman dang/ /bkru sman drag po ma btang ba dang//
168b1(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi dang mgo bo'i bkru sman zhes bya ba'i dpyad kyis sbyor ba nyes pa dang/ de bzhin du drag shul gyi nad rnams kyis skem zhing sbeg par gyur pa dang/ rlung skyes pa'i zas rtsub cing kha ba la sogs pa za ba dang/ de bzhin du 'gres shing zas za bar 'dod pa'i skabs su zas
168b2(mdo 'grel): ma zos par chu grang mo 'thungs pa 'am/ yang na skom 'thungs pa'i rjes la rgyal pa dang mchod pa dang nyal po bsten pa dang/ rta rgyug pa la sogs pa la brten cing/ lus 'khrugs zhing bskyod pa'i byas pa dang/ yang na slon mi bro bzhin du nan gyis slon zhing
168b3(mdo 'grel): skyugs pa dang/ rlung dang bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs par sdog bzhin du nan gyis bkag cing mnag pa dang/ de dag nan gyis btsir ba dang/ yang na snum dang dugs kyi cho ga yang dang yang du bya ba ma brten cing goms par ma byas par sbyang ba'i las
168b4(mdo 'grel): skyugs sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa btab pa dang/ yang na sbyangs zin cing skyugs sman btang ba la sogs pa byas zin pa'i rjes thogs nyid la myur bar lus tsha bar byed pa'i zas skom la brten pa dang/ de bzhin du bad kan skyed? cing ljan ljin 'phel
168b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i zas skom longs spyad pa dang/ de bzhin du rlung rgyas shing 'phel ba'i nad kyi dri ma rnams so sor 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am/ gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan par 'khrugs pa 'am/ yang na nad bzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa 'am/ /khrag dang bcas par 'khrugs
168b6(mdo 'grel): shing g.yos pas spubs chen po ste/ lto ba zhes bya ba'i lus kyi dbus kyi cha de la brten cing gnas nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bo che'i nang du zhugs te/ steng dang 'og gi lam bkag nas skran skyed par 'gyur la/ de yang gzar sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas nad skyed par
168b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /reg tu rung ba shin tu mthong zhing 'bur bar mdud pa'i gzugs can ltar ril ril por gnas pa'i skran zhes bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba yin no/ /skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang ba'i/ /rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yin/ /rlung ni khong
169a1(mdo 'grel): par gnas bcas pa/ /rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin/ /rang gnas ldang gyur rang dbang can/ /gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can/ /gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang/ /gzugs can ltar gnas skran zhes bya/ /chu so lte ba snying la dang//
169a2(mdo 'grel): rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ skem zhing lus zungs zad pas lan 'ga' zhig rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la/ lan 'ga' zhig ni bad kan dang mkhris pa dang bshad ga'i rgyu ba'i bu ga'i zhing? srad 'gags par 'gyur bas
169a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs par 'gyur la/ 'khrugs pa'i rlung de khong pa'i nang du gnas bcas shing brten par gyur pa yin la/ de nas rtsub pa'i rgyus sra zhing mkhrad par 'gyur pa yin la/ rlung de rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe na ni rang dbang can zhes bya ba la/ rang
169a4(mdo 'grel): gi gnas bad kan dang mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i tshe na ni gzhan dbang can zhes bya'o/ /yang nad de ni gong por gnas pas na reg tu rung par gyur pas/ /rlung de gzugs med pa ste sra ba ma yin du zin kyang gzugs can lta bur gnas shing
169a5(mdo 'grel): mdung pa'i gzugs su 'dug pas ming skran zhes btags pa yin no/ /de yang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas la gnas pa yin te/ /chu so dang lte ba dang snying ga dang rtsib log g.yas g.yon te lngar gnas pa yin no/ /rlung las mnan pa klad
169a6(mdo 'grel): par gzer/ /rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug /bshad sri khab kyis btsags snyam na/ /dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin/ /lus rengs kha ni skam po dang/ /skems zhing me drod mi snyoms dang/ /pags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang/
169a7(mdo 'grel): rlung skran g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir/ /dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing/ /gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang/ /grog mas khyab pa la bu ni/ /skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad ni mjid pa dang/ /klad par
169b1(mdo 'grel): g.yer ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba dang/ /khab kyi brtsags pa snyam du na zhing zug pa dang/ dbugs 'byin pa dka' zhing yang dang yang du mi thon pa dang/ lus rengs zhing 'gyur mi shes pa dang/ skam zhing ring ba dang/ pags pa dang mig dang sen?
169b2(mdo 'grel): mo dang gdong lce la sogs pa gnag pa dang/ rlung gi rang bzhin g.yos zhing mi brtan pa yin pa'i phyir dbyibs dang rang bzhin brtag par dka' zhing gnas gcig na mi? 'dug pa dang/ 'phel ba dang 'bri bar snang ba dang/ na zhing zug pa dang grams khyab cing
169b3(mdo 'grel): gang ba lta bur skran de 'gul ba dang/ zug cing na ba yin no/ /mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs skyu rang rgyal/ /'khru zhing lus rdul skom rims 'debs/ /pags pa la sogs ser por snang/ /skran ni reg par mi bzod dang/ /tsha zhing 'bar la dro ba dang/ /rang gi
169b4(mdo 'grel): gnas ni bsrags snyam byed/ /ces bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang/ skran myang zhing reg par mi bzod cing na ba dang/ tsha 'ur 'ur po la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /bad kan slad pag yi
169b5(mdo 'grel): ga na zhus/ /me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs/ /cham pa khong snyoms dang ga lci/ /lud pa lu zhing pags sogs dkar/ /skran phugs ring zhing skrang ba dang/ /lci zhing rang gnas brtag nad chung/ /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i skran nad
169b6(mdo 'grel): ni slong bag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i na zhing pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar zhing skya ba dang/ de bzhin du skran phugs ring zhing lnga ltar sra ba dang/ lci zhing tshor ba mang ba lta bu dang/ rang gi gnas na brtan par gnas shing mi 'gyur ba dang/ nad
169b7(mdo 'grel): tsha bas chung zhing rgyu ba ngal ba yin no/ /phal cher rang gnas 'dug pa dang/ rang gis dus su nad skyed byed/ ces bya ba la/ skran de dag ni phal cher nad rang rang gi gnas na 'dug cing rten la rang gi ldang pa'i dus su nad skyed par byed pa yin no/ /de yang rlung
170a1(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i skran nad phal cher ni bku'i phyogs su gnas la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni phal cher lte ba la gnas so/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skran ni phal cher rtsi ba logs gnyis dang snying gar gnas so/ /rang gi dus ni
170a2(mdo 'grel): nyin mtshan dang zas zos pa la sogs pa nad rang rang 'byung ba'i dus su/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa'i skran lhag par ldang zhing na bar 'gyur ro/ /gnyis las byung ba'i skran gsum po/ /mtshan nyid 'dres par ldan pa yin/ zhes bya
170a3(mdo 'grel): ba la/ nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i skran gsum ni mtshan nyid gnyis po gang dag yin pa de'i cha 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no/ /kun skyes mi bzad na zhing tsha/ /myur smin sra mtho de gso dka' / /zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum pa
170a4(mdo 'grel): kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i skran ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan zhing/ mi bzad par na ba dang/ lhag par tsha ba dang/ myur du smin pa dang sra zhing dpangs mtho ba yin te/ /de ni gso dka' ba yin pas gso dpyad kyis bcos kyang mi 'tsho'o/ /khrag
170a5(mdo 'grel): gi skran ni gang yin pa/ /de ni bud med nyid la 'byung/ zhes bya ba la/ skran brgyad pa khrag las gyur pa'i skran ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zla mtshan dus sam bu gsar btsas/ /yang na mngal gyi nad can
170a6(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /bud med rlung skyed bsten gyur bas/ /rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur pa las/ /zla re 'byung bar byad pa yi/ /zla mtshan mngal du bkag pas ni/ /de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing/ /mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de/ /snying 'phar nu 'dzag yid mi bde/ /skem pa
170a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs tshul du snang/ zhes bya ba la/ zla mtshan dang ldan pa 'am/ zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa bu gsar du btsas pa'am/ zla ba ma tshang par mchil bar gyur pa dang/ yang na bud med mngal nad can gyis rlung skyed par byed pa'i zas dang skom bsten
170b1(mdo 'grel): cing spyad par gyur pas/ bud med de'i rlung gi nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las zla ba re re zhing rgyu zhar byed pa'i zla mtshan bkag cing phyir 'byung du mi ster ba zla re 'byung ba de mngal na bu 'chags? pa lta bu'i tshul de gsogs shing 'phel bar gyur nas/ mngal du chags pa'i mtshan
170b2(mdo 'grel): ma snang zhing gsal bar ston par byed de/ /snying 'phar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma snang ba yin no/ /de ni rim gyis rlung 'dres dang/ /mkhris pa'i nad rgyu yis ni/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i/ /skran ni khrag de skyed byed yin/ /na zhing sra la tsha zhing 'khru/ /sgom?
170b3(mdo 'grel): dang rims sogs bla gnyan 'byung/ /nad kyi khrag la brten pas na/ /mngal gnas dag tu lhag par bzer/ /mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa dang/ na zhing 'phar la zug par byed/ /ces bya ba la/ dus kyi rims kyis rlung dang khrag de 'dres shing 'dus par gyur 
170b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mkhris pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis na khrag de rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i skran gyi nad khrag de bskyes par byed cing bla gnyan gyi nad na zhing sra ba la sogs pa byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lhag par yang nad kyi khrag la brten cing gnas pas/
170b5(mdo 'grel): mngal gyi gnas su lhag par gzer zhing na ba dang/ mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med/ /'on kyang skran ni 'gul gzer ldan/ /de nyid der ni gong por gnas/ /lan 'ga' 'gul bar
170b6(mdo 'grel): byed pa yin/ /'di ni ltar 'phel mi byed kyi/ /skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gal te khrag gi skran chags pa de mngal na bu chags pa dang cha 'dra na/ yang yan lag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can/ /yang pa ma yin gyi
170b7(mdo 'grel): 'on kyang 'bum nad gzer ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /yang skran de nyid ni mngal gyi gnas der gong por gzugs can du gnas la/ /lan 'ga' yun ring zhig nas 'gul bar byed pa yin no/ /yang 'di'i mngal du bu chags nad 'phel bar byed pa ma
171a1(mdo 'grel): yin gyi/ 'on kyang 'gul zhing gzer ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /gzhan du khrag las la sogs pa'i skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin no/ /rang gi nad gzhi la brten nas de der skran nad thams cad skyed/ /yun ring na ni smin 'gyur pa'am/  
171a2(mdo 'grel): yang na mi smin/ zhes bya ba la/ nad rang rang gi nad gzhi'i tshul la brten cing gnas nas skran thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba yin la/ rgyu de na yun ring zhig na smin par 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /khong 'bras kyang/ nad khrag la ni brten
171a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /shin tu myur du smin par 'gyur/ /de phyir myur du tsha 'gyur bas/ /khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/ ces bya ba la/ yang khong 'bras su gyur na ni nang khrag shin tu gnod par byed pa la brten cing gnas pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu myur
171a4(mdo 'grel): zhing rings par smin cing brdol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir myur du tsha zhing sreg par byed pas de la ming khong 'bras zhes bya bar bshad do/ /nang gnas skran ni chu so dang/ /lto ba mchin pa snying na zhing/ /me drod kha dog nyams stobs 'bri/ /shugs ni 'gag
171a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ nang na gnas shing brten pa'i mtshan ni chu so la sogs par na ba dang/ me drod la sogs pa nyams shing 'bri ba ni bshang gci na la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba 'gags par 'gyur ba yin no/ /phyi rol de las
171a6(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa ste/ /khong pa'i yan lag na tsha bas chung/ /phyogs de mdog ni nyams pa dang/ phyi rol tu ni mthong zhing 'phags/ /zhes bya ba la/ phyi rol du byung ba'i skran ni nang du 'byung ba'i skran gyi mtshan ma de las go bzlog pa yin te/ /chu so la sogs
171a7(mdo 'grel): bar na bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ me drod la sogs pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang/ shugs mi 'gag cing bde blag tu 'byung ba dang khong ba'i yan lag lte ba la sogs par nad tsha bas chung zhing shas che bar mi na ba dang/ skran chags pa'i cho gas
171b1(mdo 'grel): de'i mdog nyams shing kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du phyi rol tu lhag par mthong zhing 'phags pa yin no/ /lto spo ltag par mi bzad na/ /rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na/ /sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang/ rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og bkag /de ni hen gyi zhes bya?
171b2(mdo 'grel): bshad/ ces bya ba la/ lto bar spo zhing sgra dang bcas pa dang/ steng 'og tu rlung gi lam bkag pas lhag par mi bzad par na zhing/ brnag par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni/ lto spos hen gyi nad ces bya ba yin par slob dpon gyis bshad do/
171b3(mdo 'grel): sra zhing gtun 'dra mdung pa can/ /gtun 'dre gyen du mtho bar gnas/ /hen gyis mtshan ldan zhes bya ba la/ nad gang sra zhing rdo'i gtun 'dra zhing mdung ba can du gnas la/ rdo dang dbyibs 'dra zhing gyen du mtho bar 'jod? bag tu gnas pa hen gyi mtshan nyid
171b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa ni/ gtun 'dra ba zhes bya'o/ /gtun bu ni/ 'phreng gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gtun bu zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'bred? du thad kar gnas kyi/ gyen du 'gro ba ma yin la/ nad kyi tshul ni gtun 'dra ba dang mtshungs te/ de lta bu'i nad
171b5(mdo 'grel): la ni gtun bu zhes bya'o/ /zhu ba'i gnas nas gshang pho mtshan/ rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyun/ thur du zug par yang dag bshad/ ces bya ba la/ zhu ba'i gnas lte ba'i 'og gnas gzhang dang po mtshan dag tu rlung rgyu zhing/ lhag par na bar byed pa de ni thur du zug
171b6(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o/ /de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa zhes bya ba la/ gyen du zug pa zhes bya ba'i nad ni de las bzlog pa ste/ gzhang dang pho mtshan gyi gnas nas lte ba gyen du zug cing na ba la gyen du zug pa zhes bya'o/ /sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang/ 'drangs pa
171b7(mdo 'grel): mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas pa/ /spo zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus/ /skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad/ ces bya ba la/ mi gang la skran nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni sgregs pa mang po yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur?
172a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bshad ba 'gags shing sri ba dang/ 'drangs shing tshim par za mi nas pa dang/ sgyu ma sgra dang bcas shing mi gsal ba'i sgra krul krul zer ba dang/ sngo zhing lto rgyas la hen langs pa dang/ me drod zhan pas kha zas 'ju bar mi
172a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa ste/ de dag ni skran ring po mi thogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin par slob dpon gyi bstan 'di bshad pa yin no// /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'brel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya
172a3(mdo 'grel): ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las nad bzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnyam par 'grel pa'o// //de nas dmu rdzings kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'di ni khong 'bras la sogs pa dang
172a4(mdo 'grel): 'dra bas 'di brtsams pa yin no/ /nad kun me drod nyams las skye/ /lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing/ /ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas/ /dri ma sogs las skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang pho ba'i me drod
172a5(mdo 'grel): nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin mod kyi/ khyad par du 'am/ lhag par dmu rdzing gis nad ni/ pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du ma 'ju ba rnam pa bzhi dang/ dri ma can gyis zas rul pa dang/ zhag lon
172a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khangs? po dang/ 'dren ma la sogs pa skyon dang ldan bsten pa dang/ de bzhin du/ nad kyi dri ma yun ring sogs shing 'phel bar gyur pa las/ dmu rdzing gi nad kyi zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni nad kyi rgyu bstan pa yin no/ /nad
172a7(mdo 'grel): kyi chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa/ steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni/ /srog dang thur sel la gnod de/ /bags pa sha yi bar gnas dang/ lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzings bskyed/ ces bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis chu 'am/ bad kan gyi tshogs rgyu ba'i rtsa lus
172b1(mdo 'grel): kyi steng 'og tu rgyu ba bkag nas rgyu des srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pas gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas pags pa dang sha'i bar na yod pa'i nad drangs te/ lto ba bkang nas dmu rdzings bskyed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no/ /de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te/ nad gzhi tha dad lus
172b2(mdo 'grel): mtshar ba/ /dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang/ zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing de lad grangs kyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gyi nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang/ gsum chang 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang/ mcher ba las byung ba dang/
172b3(mdo 'grel): rgyu ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzings dang/ rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzings dang/ chu'i dmu rdzings ste rnam pa brgyad do/ /des gzir rkan dang mchu skams shing/ /rkang pa lag pa gsum ba skrangs/ spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs bri/ skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la/ me ni yi
172b4(mdo 'grel): dags gzugs can 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing gi nad des gzer cing nyen pa'i mi ni rkan dang mchu skams par gyur pa dang/ rkang pa dang lpags pa dang lto ba skrang pa dang/ lus kyi spyod pa nyams pa dang/ kha zas za ba'i rtsol ba nyams pa dang/ lus kyi nyams
172b5(mdo 'grel): stobs bri zhing zad pa dang/ skems zhing sha dang khrag zad pa dang/ gsus pa cher skyes shing rgyas par 'gyur te/ mdor na mi de yi dags kyi gzugs can lta bu 'am/ 'chi ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag /bkres pa med cing zas kun ni/
172b6(mdo 'grel): ring nas tsha zhing rgyur bcas 'ju/ /'ju dang mi 'ju mi shes la/ /'drangs par za yang mi nus shing/ /stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur/ /cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde/ /bshad pa 'phel zhing 'gag par byed/ /rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang/ /chu sor na zhing zas yang pa
172b7(mdo 'grel): cu zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas/ /rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig /ces bya ba la/ dmu rdzing de nye bar 'byung ba'i mtshan ma 'am sngar byung ba'i tshul ni zhes ma zos kyang bkres pa'i ?  sha med pa dang/ ro drag? dang ldan pa'i kha zas kun kyang tsha ba dang bcas shing
173a1(mdo 'grel): skyur bag gi rnam pa ring zhig lon na gdod 'ju ba dang/ zas zos pa zhu bar gyur tam/ zhu bar ma gyur tam/ zhu bar ma gyur pa'i blos rtogs shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang/ 'drangs par za zhing longs spyad par mi nus pa dang/
173a2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi stobs nyin mtshan rtag tu zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang/ lus skyod pa'i g.yo 'gul gyi bya ba cung zad byas kyang/ dbugs mi bde zhing rtseg pa dang/ bshang ba nang du 'phel zhing sogs la phyir mi 'byung bar 'gags par dang de bzhin du
173a3(mdo 'grel): rkang pa grang pa nas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig cing mi snang ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dmu rdzing nang ni thams cad la/ snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang/ dri ma sri zhing ma dred chud/ /tsha zhing skrang la gsus pa spo/ /'jug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
173a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni snyom pa la sogs pa yin te/ snyoms pa ni gnyid kyis myos pa nyams du lus/ 'dzin par mi nus pa'o/ /tsha ba ni lus tshab 'ur 'ur pos khyab pa'o/ /dmu rdzings de dag thams cad kyi 'jug gam
173a5(mdo 'grel): mthar ni lto ba'i nang du chu 'byung zhing nges gang bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad chu med par rab tu smug /skrang med khur ltar lci ba yin/ /rtsa 'dra'i skar khung ris khebs/ rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer/ /rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zug /shugs bskyed nad ni 'jig
173a6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /snying ga lte ba rked pa dang/ /gzhang dang chu so na bar byed/ /rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu/ /bshang ba 'gag cing gci ba nyung/ me drod chung min skam pa min/ /khar ni ro bro mad pa yin zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing gi nad thams cad ni/
173a7(mdo 'grel): dmu chur ma gyur bar sha mdog smug cing dmar bar snang la/ skrang ba'i tsha ba mi tsha zhing cung zad skrang pa dang/ /khur bu ltar shin tu lci ba ma yin pa dang/ rtsa 'dra ba'i tshogs kyis skar khung ltar g.yogs shing khabs pa dang/ rtags tu
173b1(mdo 'grel): dus thams cad du khong pa'i nang na sgra 'ur 'ur por grag cing bar snang gi 'brug ltar sgra grags pa dang/ rlung lte ba dang rgyu mar zung zhing na bar byed pa nas/ /sgrag shugs bskyed cing byung nas 'jigs te mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang rlung gi snying ga la
173b2(mdo 'grel): sogs par na zhing zug par byed pa dang/ yang rlung da lto ba'i nang na sgra dang bcas shing rgyu zhing phan tshun 'gro ba dang bshang ba 'gags shing skri? bar byed pa dang/ gcin gyi tshogs nyung par byed pa dang/ /bong pa'i me drod shin tu chung ba ma yin pa dang/
173b3(mdo 'grel): skam zhing zas lag du ba ma yin pa dang/ kha'i nang na ro bro ba med pa yin te/ /ro dang bcas pa yin no/ /de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni/ /rkang lag rlig pa lto bskrangs/ lto ba rtsi ba logs rgya ba na/ /tshigs rnams byed snyam du sems/ /lud ba skam zhing yan
173b4(mdo 'grel): lag snyom/ /ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gags/ pags pa la sogs gnag la smug /glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'dri/ /gsus par zug cing na ba dang/ rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas/ /brdab na rkyal bar bugs kyis ni/ /gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang
173b5(mdo 'grel): lan na/ /'dir rlung dang nad rang sgra ra bcas pas/ /thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed/ /ces bya ba la/ de la dmu rdzings rnams kyi nang nas/ rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings ni rkang ba dang lag pa la sogs pa skrang par 'gyur ba dang/ lto ba la sogs pa na
173b6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba dang rus pa'i tshig na zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang/ lud pa bad kan med par skam por 'byung ba dang/ yan lag snyoms shing grugs pa snyam du sems pa dang/ lus kyi ro smad/ rtsi zhing gdeg dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang/
173b7(mdo 'grel): bshang gci dri ma 'gag cing sri ba dang/ pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang lce dang bshad ba la sogs pa mdog gnag cing smug par snang ba dang/ rgyu med par glo bur da de'i lto ba ched 'ga' 'di bzhing ched 'ga' 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang/
174a1(mdo 'grel): zug cing shas cher na ba dang/ rtsa ran gyi tshogs nag pos khyab cing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang/ lto ba la lag pa la sogs pas brdabs shing pa bsnun na kyal pa dbu kyis gang ba la mnan pa lta bu'i skra dang ldan pa dang/ /dmu rdzings 'di la
174a2(mdo 'grel): rlung nang dang sgra drag pa dang bcas par thams cad du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa yin no/ /mkhris pa'i dmu rdzings rims 'phrel ba rgyal/ /lus tsha skom dang kha rog/ /mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs/ /ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo/ /rtsa mi dmar ser
174a3(mdo 'grel): dag gis khyab/ /rdul dang tsha bar bcas pa bsregs/ /dang 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang/ myur du smin cing nye rab tu 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings ni rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang/ pags pa dang sen mo la
174a4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa mdog ser ba dang gsus pa'i mdog rtsa snga bar snang ba dang/ rtsa'i mdog dmar po dang ser po dag gis khyab cing khebs pa dang/ lus rdul zhing tsha ba dang bcas pas me ltar bsregs par byed pa dang/ ngad 'byung zhing du ba 'thul ba lta bu
174a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang/ myur du smin cing chos par mi 'gyur ba dang/ nye bar gdung zhing sreg par 'gyur ba yin no/ /bad kan dmu rdzings lhu tshig na/ /tshor ba med cing skrang la lci/ /gnyis che slon zhing yi ga 'chus/ /lud
174a6(mdo 'grel): ba dbugs mi bde ba gas sogs/ /skya zhing lto ba mkhrang la snun/ /rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che/ /ring na 'phel zhing sra ba dang/ /reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci/ /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni yan lag gi lhu tshigs na zhing snyom
174a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ba dang skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang pags pa nas bshad gci'i bar du skya zhing dkar ba dang/ lho ba sra zhing rem rem por 'dug pa dang/ rtsa ris kyi bra ba mdog skyabs khyab
174b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ che zhing spom pa dang/ ring zhing gnas 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ rdo ltar sra ba dang/ reg na drang zhes gsol ba dang/ gsil ba dang/ gsus pa lci zhing brtan pa yin no/ /gnas gsum 'khrugs pa de'ang de/ /bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul/ /dbyibs dug dug sogs?
174b2(mdo 'grel): kyis gnod 'gyur/ /khrag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni/ /ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de/ kha skam mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i/ /rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed/ /myur du smin cing mi bzad na/ /de ni bar? du rlung dang char/ /phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur
174b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum kyed? par byed pa'i rgyu nad thams cad kyis nad gzhi'i skabs su bshad pa rnams mang po de dang de dag dang/ de bzhin du bud med kyis dbang du byas pa'i phyir/ /srog chags kyi yan lag las byung ba'i skra la sogs pa'i dri ma dang
174b4(mdo 'grel): rdul 'byin par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du dbyig dug dang dug la sogs pa byin pas gnod par 'gyur bas khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi dri ma bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lto bar song zhing/ phyin nas gnod pa'i nad bskyed
174b5(mdo 'grel): cing 'byung bar byad de/ de kha skam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzings nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa bskyed par byed pa ni myur du smin cing brnag par dka' bar mi bzad par na ba yin no/ /yang dmu rdzings kyi nad de ni grang ba
174b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dang phrad pas shin tu gnod cing nad 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang/ gzhon pa khrag tu 'gro ba dang/ las lam nyal po drags pas dub/ /skyug sman drags dang nad kyi skem/ /g.yon logs gnas
174b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i mcher ba ni/ /gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang/ yang na dangs ma sogs pas khrag /rgyas byed de ni 'phel 'gyur dang/ /de ni gtun bu bzhin rab sra/ de nas ru sba la rgyab 'dra ba/ /rim gyis 'phel bar gyur nas ni/ /lto bar dmu
175a1(mdo 'grel): rdzings chags par byed/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dang/ /kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing/ /lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs/ /sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la/ /brgyal zhing blon par byed pa dang/ /tsha zhing myos dang ldan par
175a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rtsa mdog dmar ba 'am mi sdug pa 'am/ /sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas/ /zhes bya ba la/ mang du zos shing ha cang 'drangs brags pas bskyod pa dang/ rtag dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i gzhon pas drags tu bskyod cing 'gro ba dang/ las dang
175a3(mdo 'grel): lam gyis nub pa la sogs pas g.yon logs nas gnas pa'i mcher ba gnas las 'phos te 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang/ yang na dangs ma sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyis khrag 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa'i dbang
175a4(mdo 'grel): gis mcher pa de 'phel bas gnas las 'phos pa 'am/ rang gi gnas nyid du 'phel bar gyur la/ /de nas ni mcher ba de dang po gtun bu ltar sra bar 'gyur la/ de nas ni de'i 'og tu ru sbal gyi rgyab 'dra bar rims kyis 'phel
175a5(mdo 'grel): zhing rgyas par 'gyur gyi/ cig car 'gyur pa ni ma yin gyi/ de ltar lto bar dmu rdzings chags par 'byung bar byed la de yang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas rtsa ris sngo zhing ser ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de la rim gyis nang rnams
175a6(mdo 'grel): ni bshad 'gags nas dang lto spos dang/ /rmongs bag skam tsha rims kyis 'debs/ /lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus/ /zhes bya ba la/ mcher pa'i skran de la rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni rims bzhin du bshad ba 'gag pa la sogs
175a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de yang bshad pa 'gags pa dang na ba dang/ lto spos pa las ni rlung yin par shes par bya'o/ /rmong pag dang skom dang tsha ba dang rims kyis 'debs pa las ni mkhris pa
175b1(mdo 'grel): yin par shes par bya'o/ /lus lci ba dang lto sra ba dang yi ga 'chus pa las ni bad kan yin par shes par bya'o/ mcher pa lta bur mchin na g.yas logs/ /gnas 'phos dmu rdzings skyed shes bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ ji ltar mcher ba g.yon logs na 'dug?
175b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ rgyu'i khyad par gyis 'phos shing lhung nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mchin pa g.yas logs na gnas pa g.yas na gnas pa yang 'phos shing thur du ltung la 'phel bar gyur nas dmu rdzings skyed par shes bya'o/ /bya sgro spu dang bcas
175b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i zas/ /zos pas bshad lam gnas 'gags te/ /gzhang 'brum dang na rtug skabs dang/ /rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang/ /thur du sel cing rlung 'khrugs te/ /bshad pa bad mkhris bkag nas ni/ /lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/ /des
175b4(mdo 'grel): ni tsha skom rims sprid 'gyur/ /lud pa dbugs su mi bde brla na/ /glal snying lte ba gzhar kha na/ /dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus/ /lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed/ /brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug /rtsa ris snang ba 'am mi snang 'gyur/ /phal cher lte
175b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i gong du ni/ /ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ bya sgro phra mo dang spyi'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zas zos shing longs spyod pas bshang pa'i lam gyi gnas 'gas shing 'byung du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhang 'brum gyi gzhang
175b6(mdo 'grel): 'gags par byas pa 'am/ rgyu mar chags shing thogs par byed pa'i zes sran ma dang/ zar ma la sogs pa zos pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ bshang ba la sogs pas bkag nas lte bar dmu rdzings tshags par
175b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ ltor 'khyil cing dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzings de/ nad pa la tsha zhing som pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ lto bar rlung la phyi? ma te rlung phyir 'byung bar mi byed cing nang du 'khyil par byed pa dang/ brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
176a1(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa dang/ yang dmu rdzings de ni phal cher mang du lte ba'i gong du dbyibs ba lang gi mju? ma 'dra bar 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rus sogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas/ /zos sam shin tu drag zos pa/ /rgyu ma brdol ta mags? gyur nas/ /bu
176a2(mdo 'grel): ga de nas ma zhu bar/ /phyir 'dzag bshad lam las 'byung zhing/ /bshad bcas nyungs shas nyungs shas ni/ /sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni/ sbyin bag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs/ /dmu rdzings mi bzad skye bar 'gyur
176a3(mdo 'grel): de ni lte ba man chad rgyas/ /chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur/ /nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan/ /dbugs mi bde skom mgo 'khor khyab/ /chu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de/ /gzhang dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer/ /zhes bya ba la/ rus pa dang rtsa dang tshar ma dang rdo dang
176a4(mdo 'grel): rwa dang shing gi tshal pa la sogs pa'i zas zug rngu dang bcas pa kha zas zos par 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na shin tu drags shing shas che zos pas gang gi rgyu ma brol cing bu ga dang bcas par 'gyur ba 'am/ gas par gyur nas brdol ba 'am/ gas pa'i bu ga de nas
176a5(mdo 'grel): phyir 'dzag cing zas ma zhu ba kho nar phyir 'dzag par gyur cing bshad pa'i lam nas 'byung bar byed la/ de yang bshad pa dang bcas par nyung shas nyus shas 'byung zhing/ 'byung ba de yang she rul te mi ro 'dri ltar shin tu mnam par 'byung zhing//
176a6(mdo 'grel): shing shalma li'i thang chu ltar sbyin zhing 'byar bag tu gnas pa la/ /mdog dmar zhing gser bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bshad pa'i lam las byung ba'i lhag mas ni lto ba 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas dbu dmu rdzing gi nang mi bzad cing brnags par
176a7(mdo 'grel): bka' ba skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la/ /dmu rdzing de ni lte ba man chad rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur la/ de yang lto ba chus gang ba lta bu'i chu'i dmu rdzing du myur zhing ring por mi thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ni nad kyi tshul shas che zhing nad kyi rtags stobs dang ldan
176b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i tsha bas bo che dang ldan pa yin la/ dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pas kyang khyab cing zil gyis mnan pa yin no/ /dmu rdzing de ni rgyu ma brdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/ /zhes slob dpon gyis bshad de/ /drang srong gzhan dag ni dmu rdzings de yongs su 'dzag pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o//
176b2(mdo 'grel): zhes zer ro/ /snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni/ /'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa 'am/ me drod bri ba 'am ha cang ni/ /skom pas chu mthungs drag pa las/ /rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chung 'dres/ /chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas/ /de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur/
176b3(mdo 'grel): de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa yin/ /de nas dmu rdzing de las ni/ /skom dang rkub tu chu 'jag bcas/ /dbugs mi bde lung yi ga 'chus/ /sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab/ /rkyal pa chus gang reg pa 'dra/ /bskyod na sgra grags lus 'dar la/ /dmu rdzing chen po che zhing
176b4(mdo 'grel): snum/ brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum/ /zhes bya ba la/ mi gang zhig snum 'thungs par gyur pa dang/ sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas skyugs sman dang/ bkru sman la sogs pa byas shing btang zin pa'i rjes la 'phral du te ring po ma lon pa nyid du chu skrang bskol ba ma
176b5(mdo 'grel): yan pa 'thungs pa dang/ /yang na chu grang la sogs pa 'thungs drags pas pho ba me drod bri zhing nyams pa dang/ yang na ha cang skem ches pa ste/ zas bcad pa la sogs pa rus pa dang rgyus pa bcad par gyur pas chu 'thungs drag te/ gnod pa de'i rgyus rlung
176b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur ba dang/ bad kan kyang 'khrugs par gyur nas chu rgyu ba'i lam gyi rgyun srad bkag cing/ rlung dang bad kan de gnyis lto bar gnas shing chu de nyid de'i gnas shing de las 'phel rgyas par gyur pas/ de'i 'og tu chu'i dmu rdzing
176b7(mdo 'grel): tu gyur pa yin no/ /de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzing de skom dang la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ rkyal pa chus gang pa la reg pa dang 'dra bar chu'i dmu rdzings de phan tshun bskyod na sgra grag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang/ lte ba kun nas zlum zhing?
177a1(mdo 'grel): 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin can du gnas pa yin no/ /thams cad yal bar bor na ni/ nang ni rang gnas la sogs te/ smin pas sla zhing zags gyur pa/ tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag /phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rdul 'byung/ /'gags na thad? kar
177a2(mdo 'grel): 'khyil zhing gnas/ /chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur gang/ /sbyin bag gyur nas de'i tshe ni/ /lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum/ brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing/ /mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la/ /lto ba dang ni rgyab tu 'gro/ /de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye/ /lto bar
177a3(mdo 'grel): 'phel zhing de las lhag /rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni/ /dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing de thams cad kyang yal bar por zhing gso ba ma byas na/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi gnas nas 'phos nas rang gi gnas
177a4(mdo 'grel): spangs te/ gnas gzhan du song nas smin cing gsher bas sla zhing rnags zags par byed par 'gyur bas tshigs dang rtsa'i sgo nas kyang zags shing 'byung bar 'gyur la/ phyi rol gyi rtsa'i sgo ba spu'i bu ga nas rdul 'byung ba 'gags shing 'byung
177a5(mdo 'grel): du mi ster bas/ thad kar 'khyil cing yan man du 'gro bas gnas la sngar gnas pa'i chu de nyid 'phel zhing gsogs par byas nas sbyin pag tu byed pa la/ de nas de'i 'og tu de'i tshe ltod lci ba la sogs par 'gyur la/ /lag pas brdabs na yang sgra
177a6(mdo 'grel): mi 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur la de nas de'i rjes la dmu rdzing der chu'i dmu rdzings 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur te chu de lto bar lci zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang/ rtsa rnams nub cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang/ chu'i dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid
177a7(mdo 'grel): skom dang rkub chu 'dzag bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher/ /'dus pa chu yi dmu rdzing rnams/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' / /zhes bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i dmu rdzing ni phyi ma
177b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du gso bar dka' ba yin te/ rlung gi dmu rdzings las ni? mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing gso bar dka' ba yin la/ de bas bad kan gyi dmu rdzing gso bar dka' bas na/ /chu'i dmu rdzing ni shin tu gso bar dka' ba yin no/ /gzhan dag phal cher zla phyed gsod/ /ces bya ba la/ dmu rdzing de las gzhan pa gnyis
177b2(mdo 'grel): po dri ma 'gags pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing dang/ /rgyu ma rdol ba las byung ba'i dmu rdzing dag ni/ /phal cher te mang du zla ba phyed lon pa dang nad pa de gsod cing 'joms par byed pa yin no/ /thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas las/ las bshad bla gnyan ldan pa dang gsod?
177b3(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba la/ dmu rdzings thams cad de rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa kun kyang chu skyis pa ste/ /chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang/ de bzhin 'chi ltas las bshad pa'i bla gnyan dang ldan pa ste/ /sna dang mig dang mtshan ma yo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang
177b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i dmu rdzing yang gsod pa yin no/ /skyes nas dmu rdzings gyur pa dag /phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad/ /stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur cing/ /gsar du 'byung ba 'bad pas gso/ /zhes bya ba la/ skyes nas byung ba'i dmu rdzings su gyur pa gang
177b5(mdo 'grel): yin pa de thams cad kyang gso bar dka' ba yin no/ /mi stobs dang ldan zhing na tshod dar la bab pa la dmu rdzing de skyes par gyur cing/ chur ma gyur te gsar du byung ba dag ni gsor rung mod kyi/ /spyir gso bar dka' ba'i nang yin pas 'bad pa dang ldan
177b6(mdo 'grel): pa kho nas gso bar bya'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ /tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnams
177b7(mdo 'grel): par 'grel pa'o// //de nas skya rbab? dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi'i 'og tu skya rbab kyi nad gzhi bshad pa ni dmu rdzing gnad skyes na nad gzhi'i 'og tu skya rbab kyi nad gzhi bshad
178a1(mdo 'grel): pa ni dmu rdzing gi nad skyes na skya rbab la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/ /ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pa/ /mkhris pa lhag par ldang gyur pa/ /de la rlung ni stobs che bas/ /snying
178a2(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni/ /gtor te rtsa chen cu nang bkram/ /lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas/ /bad kan pags pa sha khrag la/ /gnod byas rab tu gnas nas ni sha dang pags pa de dag las/ /pags mdog de dag dkar ba dang/ /ser
178a3(mdo 'grel): zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur/ de las skyes pa'i shas che bas/ de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ nad rnams ji skad bshad pa'i kha ba dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sog pa'i nad gzhi ldang ba'i rgyus 'khrugs shing
178a4(mdo 'grel): ldang bar gyur la/ /mkhris pa lhag par shas che ba ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur na skya rbab kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la nad de rnams kyi nang nas rlung gi nang gang yin pa de ni stobs dang ldan nus pa shin tu che ba yin pas snying gar
178a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i mkhris pa gang yin pa de gtor zhing byed par byed la/ /des na mkhris pa de snying la brten pa'i rtsa bo che bcur bkram? zhing phyin par byas nas lus ma lus pa kun la khyab cing byed bar gyur nas bad kan la sogs pa la gnod
178a6(mdo 'grel): bar byas nas de'i pags pa dang sha gnyis kyis bar du gnas te/ mkhris pa de pags pa'i mdog rnam pa tha dad cing du mar gyur pa skya zhing dkar ba dang ser po ljang sngon du byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdog de dag las gang gi phyir skya zhing dkar
178a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i shas che ba na rgyu de'i phyir nad de la skya rbab kyi nad ces bya'o/ /zhes/ drang srong dag gi bshad do/ /nad des lus ni lci ba dang/ lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang/ mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur cing/ /de las khrag dang tshil chung ste/ /
178b1(mdo 'grel): snying po med cing dbang po lhod/ /yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing/ /snying ni zag pa snyam du sems/ /mig phrugs skrangs shing nyams pa na/ mchil mang skad gdang dma' ba dang/ /zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod/ /spu phyi med drod nyams pa dang/ /ro smad bying zhing
178b2(mdo 'grel): rims kyis 'debs/ /dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod/ /mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ skya rbab kyi nad des lus kyi khod lci ba dang/ dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lhod cing gcig tu 'dus pa zhig pa dang/ mdangs kyi yon tan
178b3(mdo 'grel): gang dag yod pa de zad cing nyams par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyu de dag gis mi'i khrag dang tshil chung ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang/ snying po ni yum? kyi stobs la bya ste/ re med par 'gyur ba dang/ dbang po'i tshogs rnams lhod cing bya ba'i sbyor ba las nyams ba
178b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ lag dar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams brdungs pa snyam du sems shing/ na bar 'gyur ba dang/ snying zags shing 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang/ mig gi phugs skrang zhing rlo ba dang/ mig nyams shing mi sdungs pa dang/ mchil ma mang ba
178b5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ ro smad bying zhing nang du zhug par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus/ sa zhag zos las rnam lngar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/
178b6(mdo 'grel): skya rbab kyi nad de rnam pa lnga yang de nad bzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa gsum dang/ gsum chad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang sa zhag zos ba las gyur pa ni lnga pa yin no/ /'di ni sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing/ pags pa rtsub par gyur
178b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /yi ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser/ rdul med khong pa'i me drod nyams/ lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin/ zhes bya bar/ /skya rbab kyi nad 'di'i sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni/ snying cung zad 'phar ba dang/ la lar pags pa rtsub par
179a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de la rlung gyur lus na zug /rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams/ mdog gnag rtsub la 'dar ba dang/ skrang spo kha yis ro mi tshor/ brtug skam rtsi ba logs klad pa na/ zhes bya ba la/ skya rbab kyi nad de
179a2(mdo 'grel): rlung las gyur pa ni lus na zhing mi bde ba dang/ khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang/ rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog dmar shing rtsub pa dang/ lus 'dar ba dang/ skom dad la sogs pas nyen par 'gyur pa yin no/ /mkhris las rtsa dang
179a3(mdo 'grel): sen mo la sogs ljang sngo rims 'debs mun thebs byed/ skom dad rdul brgyal bsil ba 'dod/ lus mnam kha na kha ba dang/ 'khru zhing sgregs pa skyung la tsha/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni/ rtsa dang sen
179a4(mdo 'grel): mo dang mig dang bshang ba dang/ gci ba ljang sngon la sogs pa'i mdog tu snang ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan la sogs dkar ba dang/ /slong zhing kha nang lan tshwa bro/ /ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags
179a5(mdo 'grel): la/ lud pa lu zhing slon par byed ces bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar ba dang ba spu ldang zhing brtse ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no/ /'dus 'gyur mtshan ma 'dres brnag dka' 
179a6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid 'dres ma dang ldan la/ de yang brnags shing bzod par bka' ba yin no/ /sa zhag bska bas rlung bskyed la/ /tshwa bro mkhris pa mdar bad kan/ /
179a7(mdo 'grel): dangs ma la sogs gnod gyur cing/ /rtsub pas zas zor rtsub gyur nas/ zhu bas rtsa skabs 'gags byas te/ snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed/ /de nas lte ba rkang pa dang/ /kha dang pho mtshan skrangs par byed/ /bshad ba srin bu dang
179b1(mdo 'grel): bcas ba khru/ /bad kan khrag dang bcas par 'byung/ /zhes bya ba la/ sa zhag zes na de'i ro bska bas ni rlung bskyed cing gnod par byed la/ lan tshwa bro bas ni mkhris pa skyed par byed/ /mngar bag las ni bad kan bskyed par byed cing/ dangs ma la sogs pa'i
179b2(mdo 'grel): lus zungs rnams la yang gnod cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang/ de'i rtsub pa'i rgyus kha zas zos pa rtsub por gyur nas sa zhag de zhu bar gyur pa dang/ /des rtsu spubs kyi sgo bkag cing rgyur mi rung bar byas ste/ rtsa spubs de dag snga ma bzhin du skya rbab kyi
179b3(mdo 'grel): nad skyed par byed do/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lto ba la sogs pa skrang bar byed pa dang/ bshang ba srin du bcas par 'khru zhing 'byung ba dang/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i bad kan kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gzhi ga skya rbab nad kyis btag /de yis
179b4(mdo 'grel): mkhris skyes zas zos pas/ khod pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas/ /gshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed/ /ces bya ba la/ skya rbab kyi nad dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig mkhris pa bskyed cing 'phel bar byed pa'i zas dang/ skom la sogs
179b5(mdo 'grel): pa bsten cing zos pas/ mi de'i khong pa dang yan lag la brten cing gnas pa'i mkhris pas mig ser skyed par byed do/ /ci zhig byas nas bskyed par byed ce na/ /khrag dang sha bsregs shing tshig par byas pas/ mig ser skyed par byed do/
179b6(mdo 'grel): des ni mig dang pags pa gdong/ /bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser/ /lus tsha skom dad zas mi brdu/ sbal 'dra dbang po nyams chung 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la/ mig ser gyi nad kyis mi'i mig la sogs pa mdog ser bor 'gyur la/ de bzhin
179b7(mdo 'grel): du lus tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ sbal pa ser po lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa dang/ dbang po rnams nyam chung zhing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa yin no/ /de ni mkhris pa'i shes che nang?/ /skya rbab nad med par de 'byung/ /zhes bya ba
180a1(mdo 'grel): la/ mig ser gyi nad 'di ni mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po bsten pa dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin shas che bas mkhris pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur bas ni/ skya rbab kyi med par yang khod pa dang yan lag la brten pa'i mkhris pa mig
180a2(mdo 'grel): ser skyed par byed do/ /yal bar bor na cher skrangs te/ /gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ mig ser gyi nad de nyid gso ba ma byas par yal bar bor na che bas cher skrangs par gyur pa de ni mig ser 'or thams cad zhes bya ste/ /
180a3(mdo 'grel): de ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin no/ /ha li sa ni ljang nag ser/ /rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dad che/ /bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs/ /khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri/ /hi la sa ka khrag ngan 'gyur/ /chu ser can
180a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ gang gi tshe skya rbab kyi nad mkhris pa'i shas che bas ldang zhing gnas la ser bar gyur la/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas che las mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang/ rims cung zad tsam gyis 'debs
180a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te/ nad de'i ming ni ha li sa ka zhes bya ba khrag ngan las gyur pa dang/ de bzhin du chu ser can zhes bya'o/ /zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/ /de rnams kyi ni bla gnyan sngar/ /'or nad gtso bo
180a6(mdo 'grel): yin par bshad do/ /de phyir de nyid bshad par byed/ /zhes bya ba la/ skya rbab kyi nad de rnams kyi bla gnyan sngar 'chi ltas le'u yi skabs su 'or nad skrangs par kho na gtso bo yin bar bshad cing bstan pas de'i phyir 'or nad skya rbab kyi
180a7(mdo 'grel): 'og tu bshad cing bstan par bya'o/ /de yang skya rbab 'or nad bcas pa dang/ /mig dang sen mo ser por snang/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no/ /rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang/ khrag dang mkhris pa phyi
180b1(mdo 'grel): rol rtsar/ /'phros byas de yang rgyun srad 'gags/ /pags pa sha la gnas gyur te/ /'or nad mthong zhing skrangs par byed/ /ces bya ba la/ rlung 'khrugs shing ldang par gyur pas bad kan dang khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol gyis rtsa 'phros shing bye bar byas nas bad kan la sogs
180b2(mdo 'grel): de dag kyang phan tshun 'gro ba'i rgyun srad 'gags pas pags pa dang sha la gnas te 'or nad du 'gyur zhing mtho zhing ma brad par gyur pa'i skrangs pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/ /de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ rgyu de bas na 'or nad thams cad ni
180b3(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi gsum 'dus las gyur pa yin no zhes rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/ /rgyu rnams kyi ni byed brag las gzugs 'byed dgu yi bdag nyid can/ /nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun/ /snang dang dug gis phog las byung
180b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la/ 'or nad kyi rgyu so sor nges ba'i bye brag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba rnam pa dgu'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur te/ /de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa gsum dang gnyis gnyis 'des pa las gyur pa gsum dang/
180b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste/ de ltar bdun dang/ snang pa las gyur pa dang/ dug gis phog pa las byung ba gnyis te spyir dgu yin no/ /yang na glo bur gnyis yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis/ /zhes bya ba la/ yang na 'or nad ni rnam
180b6(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis te/ nad? na rang la yod pa'i nyes pa'i gzhi las byung ba dang/ glo bur ba'i nyes pa dug dang snod pa las byung ba ste gnyis so/ /yang rnam pa gnyis te lus kyi yan? lag kun skrang ba'i 'or nad dang/ yan lag gi phyogs gcig tu 'byung ba'o/ /khyab dang mtho
180b7(mdo 'grel): bar? mdud pa yi/ /dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du 'ang 'dod/ /ces bya ba yang 'or nad de ni khyab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin par drang srong rnams 'dod cing bshad de/ khyab pa ni rgya che ba'o/ /mtho ba ni grog mkhar ltar pags kyis mtho
181a1(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /mdud pa can ni mdud pa ltar rdog rdog par 'dug pa'o/ /de ltar na khyad par de dag gis 'or nad ni rnam pa gsum yin par 'dod do/ /'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu/ /nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid/ /nad las smyung sogs kyis nyan chung//
181a2(mdo 'grel): myur du lhag par zas las 'byung/ /zhes bya ba la/ lhan cig skyes pa dang blo bur ba'i 'or nad thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi rgyu ni 'og nas bshad pa yin la/ nad gzhi las byung pa'i 'or nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu'i khyad par lhag pa gzhan yod de/ /de
181a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du glo bur ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad dang skyugs sman la sogs pa'i las dang/ smyung ba byas shing zas bcad pa dang/ /sogs pa zhes smos pa las kyis du ba la sogs pa nyam chung zhing ring par gyur pa'i mis myur du ste/ de'i mod la
181a4(mdo 'grel): zas drags par zos na 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang/ /skyur dang snum bsil lan tshwa dang/ /thal sman rnon po tshwa ba dang/ /mya ngan chu nyid drags dang yar/ /zas zos sha lci sha skam dang/ /ma zhu ngal dang bud med grags/ /
181a5(mdo 'grel): rkang gis lam du 'gro ba 'am/ /gzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ de nas gzhan yang nad med par gnas pa dag gis kyang zas dang skom lci ba la sogs pa cha shas cher drags pa bsten pas 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro/ /
181a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pas nad skyed pa yin no/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde tshwa 'khru/ /gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni/ /mngal nas khrag 'dzag rims kyis btab/ /gsung dang chu ser slon nyes dang/ /sbum ma dang ni me dpal gyis/ /nad dang skya rbab
181a7(mdo 'grel): dag gis btab/ /gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i/ /nad de brang du gnas na ni/ /stod skrangs chu sor gnas smad skrangs/ /dbus na gnas par rab tu skrang/ /nyid lag la brten de skyed byed/ /ces bya ba la/ lud pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang/ de
181b1(mdo 'grel): las gzhan pa'i nad rnams legs par gsos shing sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gsos pa gyur na 'or nad kyi rgyur 'gyur te/ rgyu des rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrug par 'gyur ba de grang na gnas pa lus kyi ro stod kyi cha skrangs par byed/ /
181b2(mdo 'grel): chu sor gnas na gang la gnas na chu so man chad kyi ro smad skrangs par 'gyur ro/ /dbus te/ lte ba dang sked pa'i phyogs su gnas na lus kyi phyogs su skrang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab par gnas na thams cad skrang par 'gyur ro/ /yan lag re re'i nying lag
181b3(mdo 'grel): la gnas na gang la gnas pa'i nying lag nyid skrang par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sngon tshul rtsa rnams che/ /yan lag snyoms par byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ 'or nad kyis sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni mig la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu mi bzad par tsha ba dang
181b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag rnams snyom zhing na bar byed pa yin no/ /rlung las skrang pa 'pho zhing rtsub/ /spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang/ pags 'khums 'dar rtse reg na na/ /na zhing zug la bem bem po/ /myur bar ldang zhing myur bar zhi/ /skrangs pa mnan na dma' bar 'gyur//
181b5(mdo 'grel): snum dang dro bas mnyes na zhi/ mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che/ /pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis/ /bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed/ /ces bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni 'pho zhing gnas ma nges pa dang/ /reg na rtsub pa dang/ spu rtsub par gnas pa dang/
181b6(mdo 'grel): mdog smug cing gnag pa dang/ /pags pa 'khums shing gnyer ma yod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ de bzhin du myur du ldang zhing 'byung la/ myur du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ skrangs pa'i phyogs lag pas mnan na dma' zhing krung? krung por
181b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ /snum bskus shing drod pag tu byas te mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtshan mo skrang pa 'bri zhing chung la/ nyin mo skrang pa che zhing 'phel ba dang/ /pags pa yang yungs kar btegs pa'i 'di gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed
182a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /mkhris ba rtsa ser dmar la gnag /spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang/ /gyur dang ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur/ /dang por dbus su gyur dang srab/ /skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul/ /mnam zhing 'dul la
182a2(mdo 'grel): snum mgo 'khor/ /gsil bag 'dod pa'i thur du 'khra/ /dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni mdog ser po la sogs par snang ba dang/ spu'i mdog dmar ser du gyur pa dang/ myur du ldang zhing 'byung
182a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ zhi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ thog mar dbus kyi phyogs nas skrang zhing mchod pa dang/ pags pa srab pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ /reg na mi bzod cing na la 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin no/ /bad kan g.ya' spu lpags pa dkar/ /mkhrang
182a4(mdo 'grel): zhing bsil la ci ba dang/ snum zhing 'jam la brtan zhing 'thos/ /gnyid tsha slon zhing me drod nyams/ /mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing/ /zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che/ /'od ma btsags bu sogs dral yang/ /khrag mi
182a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar spyi bag 'dzag /dri dang reg pa la mngon dga' / zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni skrang pa g.ya' ba dang/ /spu dang pags pa dkar zhing skya ba dang/ mkhrang zhing spa ba dang/ snum pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing/ /gnyid
182a6(mdo 'grel): che ba la sogs par byed pa dang/ mnan na 'bying zhing spo bar mi byed pa dang/ ldang zhing skye ba dang zhi bar dka' mtshan mo skrangs tsha bas che zhing nyin mo skrangs tshabs chung ba dang/ 'od ma'i tshal ba dang/ btsag bu la sogs pas dbral ba/ yang khrag
182a7(mdo 'grel): mi 'byung bar ring zhig na sbyin bag nal nal po 'byung ba dang/ /dro ba la dga' ba dang/ reg cing byugs na dga' ba yin no/ /gnyis byung gsum por ji bzhin pa/ /rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dran ma yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ nad gnyis las byung ba'i 'or nad
182b1(mdo 'grel): gsum ni rgyu dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma 'dren mar dang ldan pa yin no/ /'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i bdag can yin no/ /mtshon la sogs pas nad gyur cing/ /bcad dam
182b2(mdo 'grel): dbral lam smras la sogs/ /kha ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung/ /bas rtsi ka pi ka chu yi/ /khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas/ /skrang pa mched par 'gyur pa yin/ /shin tu tsha zhing dmar bar snang/ phal cher mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /zhes bya ba la/
182b3(mdo 'grel): mtshon cha la sogs pas snang cing rmad rma phyung las bcad pa dang dbral de dang rma phug pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'or nad dang/ sogs pa smos pas brdungs pa dang/ bcag pa dang/ bsnun pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ bcings pa dang/ dkris pa la sogs
182b4(mdo 'grel): pa bsdu'o/ /de bzhin du kha bas phyis pa dang/ mes tshig pa dang/ de bzhin du rgya mtsho las byung ba'i rlung gis phog pa dang/ bse shing gi me tog dang thang chus phog pa dang/ ka pi ka chu'i zhes bya ba kha srel phre'u ad ma kub ta ces bya ba'i gra ma
182b5(mdo 'grel): reg na yang skrang par 'gyur zhing/ /skrang ba de phan tshun mched cing byed bar 'gyur ba dang/ shin tu tsha zhing dro ba dang/ mdog dmar por snang ba yin la/ phal cher te mang du mkhris pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no/ /dug skyes srog chags
182b6(mdo 'grel): dug can ni/ /lus la sa dang gcin gyis phog /srog chags dug med pa yi yang/ /so dang mche ba sen mos zug /gcin rtug khu bas dmes pa dang/ /dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg /dug gis rlung la reg pa dang/ /dbyig dug phye mas reg
182b7(mdo 'grel): las byung/ /mnyen zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang/ /myur gsod cha zhing na bar byed ces bya ba la/ dug las skyes pa'i 'or nad ni sprul las byung pa'i srog chags dug can gyis reg cing lus la song ba dang/ de bzhin du de'i gcin gyis phog pa
183a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /srog chags dug med pa dag gis yang gcin dang rtug pa phog pa dang/ yang zhes smos pa ni dug dang bcas pa bsdu bas te/ de dag gi so dang mche ba dang sen mos zin cing zug pa dag kyang 'or nang du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gcin dang
183a2(mdo 'grel): rtug pa dang khu chus dmes par byas pa dang/ de bzhin du dri ma dang bcas pa'i gos kyis reg pas kyang 'or nang du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dug gi shing la reg pa dang/ dug dang 'dres pa'i rlung la reg pa dang/ de bzhin du dbyig dug sbyar mar byas pa'i phye mas
183a3(mdo 'grel): reg pa las kyang 'or nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /skrangs pa de ni mnyen zhing 'dzam pa dang/ g.yo zhing 'pho ba dang/ 'phyang bag tu gnas pa dang/ myur du gsod bar byed pa dang/ tshwa bar byed pa dang/ na bar byed pa yin no/ /'or nad gsar byung bla gnyan
183a4(mdo 'grel): med/ gso sla zhes bya ba la 'or nad gsar du byung zhing skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang/ bla gnyan gyi nad gzhan gyis ma gtses pa dag ni gso bar bla zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par nus pa yin no/ /gso dka' sngar bshad zin/ /zhes
183a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba la/ 'or nad gso bar mi rung pa ni sngar lus kyi 'gyur ba bshad pa'i le'u'i skabs su/ bla gnyan du mar ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad cing bstan zin pa yin no/ /me dbal nad rnang snang ba'i bar/ /gnod pa'i
183a6(mdo 'grel): 'or nad mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba la/ me dbal gyi nang ni nad gzhi so so dang gnyis 'dres pa dang/ thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ snang pa'i bar las byung ba ste/ /me dbal rnam pa brgyad yin no/ /de bzhin du gnod pa rlung
183a7(mdo 'grel): dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no/ /de ni phyi nang gnyis ka ste/ gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad/ /ces bya ba la/ me dbal de ni phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa
183b1(mdo 'grel): gsum yod do/ /zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad de/ la la ni phyi rol na gnas pa yin la/ la la ni nang na la la ni gnyi ga na gnas pa yin no/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' zhes bya ba la/ me dbal de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso zhing bcos par dka' ste//
183b2(mdo 'grel): de yang phyi rol na gnas pa bas ni nang na gnas pa rab tu gso bar dka' la/ nang na gnas pa bas ni gnyi ga na gnas pa mchog tu gso bar dka' ba yin no/ /de la nad ni ji bzhin du/ /'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la/ /khyad par du ni tshe ba
183b3(mdo 'grel): yis/ lus la myur du mched par byed/ /de yang nang gnas nang du mched/ phyir gnas phyir mched gnyis kar gnas/ /gnyis gar mched par byed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ me dbal gyi nad de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang rang gi rnam pa ji lta ba
183b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'khrugs shing/ g.yos par 'gyur ba'i rgyu kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus ldang bar 'gyur la/ khyad par du ni tsha zhing sreg par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sman dang zas dang/ spyod lam gyis ldang zhing nad des
183b5(mdo 'grel): lus la myur du mched cing rgyas par byed do/ /de yang ji ltar mched ce na/ nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni nang na mched cing rgyas par byed la/ phyi rol tu gnas pa ni phyi rol nyid du mched la/ gnyis kar gnas shing rten pa ni phyi dang nang gnyi
183b6(mdo 'grel): gar mched cing rgyas par byed pa yin no/ /de la nang na gnas pa ni/ gnad rnams tsha gdung myos par byed/ bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang/ /skom dad rab che gcin nad sogs/ /mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang/ /me drod myur nyams las shes
183b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ zhes bya ba la/ de la nad na gnas pa la sogs pa'i me dbal gyi nang nas/ nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni gnad rnams tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las shes shing rtogs par bya ste/ snying la sogs pa'i gnad rnams tsha zhing
184a1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal gyis gdungs ba dang/ myos shing rmongs bag tu byed pa dang nang du bu ga'i sgo rnams la gnod cing gzir la khyad par du skyod pa dang/ de bzhin du skom dad lhag par rab tu che ba dang/ bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i shugs
184a2(mdo 'grel): mi snyoms shing legs par mi 'byung ba dang/ khong pa'i me drod dang lus kyi stobs shin tu myur bar nyams pa las shes shing rtog par bya'o/ /phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin zhes bya ba la/ phyi rol tu gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid ni nang na gnas pa'i me dbal gyi
184a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid las go bzlog par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /de la rlung me dbal ni/ /rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra/ /skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang/ /yan lag snyoms zhing ba spu rtse/ /zhes bya ba la/ de la me dbal gyi nad rlung las gyur pa ni
184a4(mdo 'grel): rlung gi rims dang na ba'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin par shes par bya la/ yang de bzhin du me dpal de de ni skrang ba la sogs dang yang ldan pa yin no/ /mkhris gyur myur du mched cing 'gro /mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar/ /zhes bya ba
184a5(mdo 'grel): la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal ni lus la myur du mched cing khyab par byed pa dang/ mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid/ ji skad smos pa'i rtags dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu shas cher dmar ba yin no/ /bad kan las g.ya' reg
184a6(mdo 'grel): na 'jam/ /bad kan las byung rims 'dar na/ /zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las byung ba'i me dbal ni shas cher g.ya' ba dang/ reg na 'am pa dang/ bad kan las byung ba'i me dbal dang rims dang tshul 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no/ /me
184a7(mdo 'grel): dbal sogs kun yal bar bor/ /rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur nas/ /de ni smin rtol rang rang gis/ /me dbal rma'i mtshan nyid yin/ /zhes bya ba la/ me dbal thams cad yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na/ rang gi nad rlung la sogs pa'i
184b1(mdo 'grel): tshul bags shing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis ni rlung gi me dbal 'phel bar 'gyur la/ mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni mkhris pa'i me dbal 'phel zhing gsogs par 'gyur la/ bad kan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni bad kan gyi me dbal la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /de
184b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du smin cing rdol pa ste/ dang por smin nas phyis rol bar 'gyur ba yin pas na smin cing brol ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rang rang gi rma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de 'dzin cing 'phyang bar byed de/ rma'i le'u las/ de las rlung las sngo nag smug pa
184b3(mdo 'grel): dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas smos pa yin no/ /rlung mkhris las ni rims 'debs smon/ /brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/ /rus tshigs chags snyam me drod nyams/ /mun zhugs
184b4(mdo 'grel): snyam sems yi ga 'chus/ /yan lag thams cad mi 'dag ni/ /'bar bas khyab pa lta bur cha/ /phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched/ /khyab pa'i yan lag de dang de/ /me mdag zhi ba ltar gnas pa 'am/ /sngo ba 'am dmar bas khyab byed la/ me bsregs lta bur
184b5(mdo 'grel): mched cing 'byung/ /myur du mched cing khyab par byed/ /nad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni/ /de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung/ /yan lag na zhing dran pa stor/ /gnyid yang dbugs kyi rngam pa drag /skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'o/ /gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur//
184b6(mdo 'grel): sa dang ma la khri stan sogs pa/ /gang du 'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing/ /'greng zhing sdug bsngal myong pa dang/ /lus sems ngal las byung ba yi/ /gnyid kyi rmong bag sad dka' ba/ /de na me 'dri'i me dbal yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung dang mkhris pa las ni? me
184b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra ba'i me dbal du 'gyur la/ de yang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang lus kyi yan lag thams cad me mdag 'bar bas khyab cing gtor ba lta bur rab tu tsha ba dang/ yang me dbal de lus kyi phyogs gang dang gang du mched cing
